!Screenshot from 2020-04-09 13-22-12.png!
 * *Code: app/workers/cron_job/auto_cod_scan_contactc3_worker.rb*
 ** app/services/auto_cod/scan_contact_c3.rb : {color:#d04437}*Worker đó gọi file này, em thấy có 2 list contact được lấy ra*{color}
{code:java}
update_fail = Contactc3.where(:owner => OWNER::AUTO_COD, :status => STATUS::EXPORTED,
                              :auto_cod_process => true, :auto_cod_status => AUTO_COD_STATUS::AUTO_COD_GET,
                              :created_at => start_time..Time.now.send(:-,30.minute)).pluck(:id)
update_fail_return = Contactc3.where(:owner => OWNER::AUTO_COD, :status => STATUS::EXPORTED,
                                     :auto_cod_process => true, :auto_cod_status => AUTO_COD_STATUS::RETURN,
                                     :created_at => start_time..Time.now.send(:-,30.minute)).pluck(:id){code}
{color:#d04437}*Vậy là phải thêm điệu kiện vào cả 2 lần query này đúng k anh ?*{color}

Và em nghĩ cũng ko cần thiết lắm vì bản chất tất cả các hệ thống internal của EVN đều fai login bằng email @topica.edu.vn nhân sự đã nghỉ việc thì đã bị khóa mail rồi nên trường hợp vẫn vào được hệ thống thì em chưa từng gặp case này trước đây nên ko rõ là có cần thiết nữa hay ko. [~khanhnn]: còn trường hợp những người có account dạng tự tạo (ko phải dạng login = gmail topica) thì sao? Anh ví dụ 1 số case cụ thể giúp em anh nhé. Các hệ thống của edumall ngoài đuôi email @topica.edu.vn ra thì ko vào được anh nhé, trừ các hệ thống liên quan đến giảng viên và học viên thì có thể đăng nhập bằng gmail và đuôi @edumall.vn thì đấy là bắt buộc r anh.  em dùng tính năng đăng ký tài khoản (xem ảnh), có thể nhập link email bất kỳ có đuổi @topica.edu.vn, sau đó tự nhập user/password khi đăng ký.

nếu user này được phân quyền thì vẫn vào đươc bình thường mà chẳng cần có tài khoản email thực tế, kể cả có nhưng nếu tài khoản gmail @topica.edu.vn bị khoá vẫn vào được bình thường.

a đã tự đăng ký sử dụng 1 tài khoản email không tồn tại của topica là test@topica.edu.vn, sau đó a vào bằng tài khoản admin rồi phân quyền cho tk test@topica.edu.vn, như vậy tài khoản test@topica.edu.vn ko # gì tài khoản ảo (ko có thật) vẫn login vào xem data được.

[~lytk]:
1. E xem attachment nhé
2. E có thể lấy từ data warehouse bằng query:
{code}
SELECT
    bb.id                   AS bifrost_buyer_id
    , bb.email              AS bifrost_buyer_email
    , bb.mobile             AS bifrost_buyer_mobile
    , bt.combo              AS bifrost_transaction_combo
    , bt.`method`             AS bifrost_transaction_method
    , hours_add(bt.received_at, 7) AS bifrost_transaction_received_at -- In +07:00 timezone
FROM
    bifrost_transactions bt
INNER JOIN bifrost_buyers bb ON
    bt.bifrost_buyer_id = bb.id
WHERE
    status = 'success'
    AND (
        (
            combo IN (
                "Combo_DuongLT.04_DuongLT.14_DuongLT.17"
            )
            AND hours_add(received_at, 7) BETWEEN '2020-03-05' AND '2020-03-24' -- BETWEEN 2020-03-05 00:00:00 AND 2020-03-24 00:00:00
        )
        OR(
            combo IN (
                "Combo_Book_DuongLT8khoa"
                , "ComboSACH_DuongLT.04_DuongLT.17"
            )
            AND hours_add(received_at, 7) > '2020-03-24'
        )
    )
    ORDER BY bt.received_at ASC;
{code}

[~khalezin.d] updated:

 After changing TTL settings on the CF side, the hit statistics did not improve.* The local CDN [riq9s8ju3f.cdn.hostvn.net|http://riq9s8ju3f.cdn.hostvn.net/] which is used for Vietnam takes data directly from the S3 bucket.
* There are a lot of requests from IP of that CDN host in the requiests logs for the S3 kelly-lecure-video-out(parsed for 12 hours):
Number of requiests     IP
595110           118.69.83.75* It is necessary to check CDN caching settings of [riq9s8ju3f.cdn.hostvn.net|http://riq9s8ju3f.cdn.hostvn.net/]. Is there ana hit/miss and requests statictics for the Vietnam CDN?
* Another strange issue: there are a lot of requests serveed by CloudFront which are from Vietnam:Тут скриншот по статистике из Въетнама.* Part of cloudfront log for 17.04.2020Count|IP|locatiuon|City|cache status|ACF location|

/k-57e4def8ce4b145a1020dbf9/20181228-hanhpt03-281218/b16mp4/k-57e4def8ce4b145a1020dbf9/20181228-hanhpt03-281218/b16mp4_1080_44.ts* I checked and downloaded video from [https://edumall.vn/] - [https://lms.edumall.vn/home/my-course/learning], and I didn't find any url for stream which leads to the cloudfront, all of them use Vietnam CDN.* Another interesting point I checked statistics transferred data from S3 to internet.Transferring data and cost

139.45GB  754.9GB

What do you think if we move this data to glacier after n-days?kelley-lecture-video:
s3 standart  Standard-IA
22.03 TB        47.71 TBDoes it store source video files? Do we need to store them? If so - is it possible to move the to glacier too?
The same question fot the next bucket:pedia-lecture-video
Standard-IA    4.99 TB (edited)  [~khalezin.d] after viewing your results, I have some comments:
 * Edumall VN is using hostvn.net CDN. This CDN will use S3 as its origin.
 * I've audited some systems and seen some reasons that made videos were still requested from Cloudfront:
 ** They use a backup method for video player, if it can not request chunk from hostvn.net CDN, it'll request from Cloudfront.
 ** When uploading and transcoding videos, if some problem happen, for example video is not transcoded successfully, video will be played from Cloudfront, in mp4 format.
 * About moving data to glacier layer, we need to evaluate carefully to make decision because this layer is used for only store, not for retreave.
 * Pedia-lecture-video and kelley-lecture-video are origin of Edumall Vietnam and Edumall Thailand. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cg8VKTXDGJvJ8Jaj04Fd3xLxYhLl68OiYFtAEzEQ4CI/edit?usp=sharing [~ducla5]

I researched CDN and here's what I think.

* Cheap CDNs do not have POP in the regions we need, but their use significantly reduces cost the delivery of content, such as bunnycdn.com or cdn77.com.

* A good option in my opinion is cloudflare.com, CDN use for free, Business account for $200. But for large data transfers it is better to contact cloudflare support for more information about the cost.

Also very interesting variant with the use of Cloudflare stream streaming service, using this service we can remove transcoding infrastructure, remove the use of cloudfront, remove the local CDN in Vietnam, because CLoudflate has its POP in this location, remove the use of S3 for video storage.


What do you think of this? 

How hard will it be to implement?

Here is more detailed information on CDN prices.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1cg8VKTXDGJvJ8Jaj04Fd3xLxYhLl68OiYFtAEzEQ4CI/edit?usp=sharing

For this question - "if it supports S3 private buckets"
I don't quite know what you mean. [~khalezin.d]:
 * About changing CDN provider, it's not difficult. All we need is seting up a new CDN link and changing link play in LMS system.
 * I don't know if Cloudflare support VOD in 200$ price layer. Kevin has said that it's not cheap if we used their VOD CDN service. So we need to know detail about that. We've already had Cloudflare account and we're using its service.
 * About my question  "if it supports S3 private buckets" because: now, Edumall is using public S3 bucket origin for CDNs, it's unsecure for videos, people can download them so if CDN providers can support private S3 bucket (S3 ready support) is better. [~ducla5]

Cloudflare Stream looks very good for our purpose, but we need to calculate the length of all the videos and their view numbers. Only after that, we can have an objective assessment of the cost of using this service.

If the cost will be okay for us, we can stop using the following services:
 # Cloudfront 
 # Vietnamese CDN, since Cloudflare has its POP in Vietnam
 # S3 and the data transfer to Cloudflare storage
 # Infrastructure for transcoding video, as Cloudflare will take over this function

In addition, we will be able to protect content using Signed URLs service. 

Switching to Cloudflare is a quite complicated process and we will not be able to migrate to Cloudflare quickly. 

We can use a cheap CDN as an interim option. 

For example:
 * https://gcorelabs.com/
 * POP in Thailand 
 * ~$2000 for 50 TB
 * VOP support
 * No Private S3 support

 * https://cdn77.com
 * No POP for Thailand
 * ~$580 for 50 TB
 * VOP support
 * No Private S3 support 

If this option suits you, we can start the implementation of the integration (using the testing staging to test it before).  

CDN providers usually have a test period, so we can connect the CDN to an S3 bucket. On the staging environment, we will be able to integrate a new URL for videos and test the CDN operation.

What do you think about that?  Let's me discuss with Kevin about pros and cons of these solutions.

I'll confirm in this late afternoon. [~khalezin.d]:

Edumall VN has 205663  videos with average length is 10 minutes.

  [~Yann], thank you!  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UzNfqCofUfuHbMbvXAqVGJ2vSmRmp1P7/edit#gid=71443666 instead of https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LWESTpQXRcDgG2pxY-bNl0FWEX4S-YDJ/view?ts=5e99d943 Hi [~janeto] [~kirill], let me update for what we found yesterday

1/ I finished the data flow for OP ETL [https://www.lucidchart.com/invitations/accept/9983814c-bb1e-4f99-8eff-4456ba5026ce] and working on some sample data to make sure the workflow
 2/ Currently  found that
 - The OP processing code: still there is no problem with it, the user can purchase success with Omise (if charge success, status = complete, charge failed status = failed..)
 - The main problem currently is in the UX & OP workflow, because of unclear status on Minerva (which connected to jackfruit_contactc3s database)
 - Some unclear status on the database

*Why?*
 a) The ratio of timeout & incomplete is so high.

Below is the data compare with Total Landing page & Chinese LP (with launched for re-open OP this week)

!image-2020-04-25-12-57-04-672.png|width=513,height=289!

Assumption:
 - User doesn’t have any other option when they access to epayment, they might close the browser (or back), so that the incomplete of cod_credit is quite high, and which the current sale process, the sale team will call the customer to convert them for purchase. So when we make a report, the number of failures from OP will be high.

 - The problem when Omise gateway with our system, so the payment is taken more than 10mins (our limitation on session payment timeout)

b) Normally, a user has _id in contactc3s that have siren_id in bifrost_transaction, but some contacts don’t have that. My wonder is because of a contactc3s _id related with a siren to mapping the lead with payment status, so if don't have siren_id, how can they map the data?

!image-2020-04-25-13-07-22-676.png|width=573,height=260!
 c) The jackfruit_paymentc3s may have some problem when create _id, some id_ is created almost the same time, in my exp it maybe because of the 2-time press on the button.

!image-2020-04-25-11-49-42-709.png|width=845,height=272!

*Next step* 
 With a) we will integrate the GTM & GA event, try to capture the customer’s event & action on the LP, so we can figure out how many users close the browser, or back. Meanwhile, the sales team will call the customers to figure out why they do not buy instead of a call to convert them. [~Yann] [~saran@topica.asia] in charge of this

 With a) Continous with A/B testing on Landing submit button [~saran@topica.asia] is working on it

With b) we need to check why some fields in siren_id of bifrost_transaction don't record the _id of contactc3s [~kirill] can you help on this? This can check by check look into the _id in jackfruit_contactc3s, to see how it's created.

With c) We need to check is it because of the duplicate submit button or not? if yes, fix it, if no, check why 1 customer has 2-row contact id at the exact same time [~kirill] team
  
  Hi guys,

Latest update

1/ I set up the tracking on LDP with a form submission, on payment 

Currently, we don't have tracking on thankyou page, working on it

Problems
 * I found that we lost the tracking on epayment, I just update it last night, so need ~ 1 days to collect the data

2/ I tried to reproduce 2 case
 * Timeout session

I can reproduce this case by

Step 1) Go to the LDP with OP option [https://chinesetoday-english.edumall.co.th/]

Step 2) Input the information

Step 3) Choose OP

Step 4) At the epayment, I don't input anything, wait for > 10 mins

Step 5) Input the information

Expected: at step 4) I should get the notice session timeout

Actual: I don't get any notice, the Omise gateway still process my information but in contactc3s, it recorded me timeout already

So, it's not centralized between the User's process and Database process
 Detail here, row 6

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1_2ZPJQn5FNWdAflJyrPuGupkw14FycYZjqCuIvXSfX4/edit#gid=0]

 

So my suggestion is that we need to implement the session count down here and prevent the user's confusing when they're in epayment.

I found that the system counts the user duplicate when the phone number and the course (combo) is the same (not check email or others information)

Object \{ type: "networkError", details: "manifestLoadError", fatal: true, url: "[https://riq9s8ju3f.cdn.hostvn.net/k-5768aeb1047c995f75fdbf6b/20180719-vietnd14_19_7/13_1mp4/master.m3u8]", loader: \{…}, response: \{…}, context: \{…} }". !image.png|thumbnail! [~khanhtv]:
 # Mã course id cho các khóa lẻ được lấy trực tiếp từ các đơn hàng, có nguồn gốc từ việc setup các landing pages.
 # Khi thiết lập landing page cho các khóa lẻ, luôn luôn sử dụng loại id này, không sử dụng course code (vd: CamNT.01...).

==> Việc eros xuất ra loại mã course_id cho những khóa đơn như vậy là logic lâu đời, không phải vấn đề / bugs của những sửa đổi gần đây.

 

E confirm lại giúp t là muốn thay đổi chức năng của việc xuất dữ liệu đối với những đơn hàng khóa lẻ: Thay vì xuất ra course id sẽ xuất ra course code. Thanks

Anh giúp em với ạ  [~minhnt6]:

+ Sửa chức năng xuất dữ liệu này hộ t nhé: Ktra các đơn hàng nếu là khóa lẻ thì xuất ra course code, với đơn combo thì giữ nguyên giá trị như cũ

+ Đơn hàng là khóa lẻ nếu target == 'course'

+ Function:
{code:java}

!Screen Shot 2020-04-24 at 21.07.27.png! [~azat17] I see this error when click Play button.

!Screen Shot 2020-04-27 at 11.46.17.png! I chased for this error locally and in the end the result seemed to be the same as i supposed earlier. The error appears because in preview.js script at the line 46 it gets the url value from href attribute like so var href = $(this).attr('href') and tries to do this replacing action href = href.replace(/d1mjfb268gelin.cloudfront.net/g, "daevt1q1a24kq.cloudfront.net").  This action are being taken on the element with class equal to .lecture-preview. But its content can either have or not have the href attribute based on its asset_type field. When asset_type field's value is other than 'Video' then the .lecture-preview element remain without href element and replacing function is executed on the href attribute which's null.

 

!Screen Shot 2020-04-27 at 14.44.54.png! FYI the test staging for Kelley is http://kelley2-staging.edumall.io/ [~azat17]: in case lecture does not have video url, we should display an error notification. It'll help user avoid confusing when use.

  [~Yann] [~ducla5] after spending some time today finding where expiration status is set to Contacts as for now i couldn't clarified this moment, tried to find Scheduled Jobs in Minerva and Siren_tl but there are no workers related to that logic. [~azat17] I've updated info about timeout workflow of contact:
 * Step 1: When user register in LDP, his info will be saved in Marol system.
 * Step 2: User is redirected to epayment.edumall.co.th
 * Step 3.1: if user submits payment form, online payment is done in payment backend
 * Step 3.2: if user does not submit, online payment backend can not save anything. In mean while, Marol system will has a cronjob to scan to find out timeout c3 contact to update

Please see this workflow in here:

[https://itwiki.topica.vn/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=IEMM&title=Contact-Follow]

  Marol project:

[https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/marol]

payment backend project:

[https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment]

  Expected functions:

We need to implement 2 features:
- In frontend, we need allowing user can choose payment method, like COD, Credit card, ATM,…
- Create a timeout mechanism. In frontend, we create a countdown. After this countdown ends, if users does not submit payment form, they will be redirect to a page that notify session timeout. In the mean while, our backend must update this contact status to `timeout` [~ducla5] As i understood you the Marol holds the contacts registered in Landings and updates their statuses to timeout providing they don't do anything in epayment.edumall.co.th during the first 10 minutes. But what time this 10 minutes should be counted from? I suppose after 10 minutes user should be redirected to a page of Marol? I suggest to make a call with [~kirill] [~gen1us2k] and me on Monday to discuss this subject because it seems to me that payment process involves multiple steps including several microservices. We should made clear the communications between these services  !epayment-tl.png!

https://epayment.edumall.co.th/payment-option-v5.html?domain=testlandingpageit06.edumall.co.th&cid=5ea4069a450173000d000000&course_id=BC.hungdv2.test.01

 

domain: is domain of LDP

Cid: customerId

course_id: is course’s id

 

How it works:

- User click submit form in LDP.

- Redirect to epayment

- Countdown 10:00 minutes (if user does not click submit button)

- After expiring, payment will notify payment is expired and after user click “Ok” it will return to LDP domain

How payment works:

- User has 2 options: online payment and COD.

- If user clicks on Online payment, an online payment form will be displayed

- If user clicks on COD, nothing display (default option).

- After user chooses payment option, he can click confirm button

+ If user choose COD —> redirect to thankyou page (epayment.edumall.co.th/cod-v2A.html)

+ If user choose Online payment: 

How to click Submit:

- See setSubmitEvent function in main.js

- If user choose COD —> go to epayment.edumall.co.th/cod-v2A.html

- If user choose Online payment, see event handler of credit button

How to display contact info:

- Call this request https://epayment.edumall.co.th/contact/view?cid=5eacf0f788ae030009000910

How to display order info:

- See loadCourseData function in main.js I going to add radio box that lets user to choose between Online Payment and COD. If COD is chosen than user directly redirected to thank you page if Online payment is chosen then the payment form is shown and user continues to fill the it. The count down starts right after a user is redirected to epayment page and after 10 minutes are expired a user gets alert saying that payment is expired, if user clicks "Ok" he gets redirected to a landing page. 
 
  1) Countdown - 30m-1h

2) Radio button - 30m-1h

3) Information block in right section - 1h LDP to Test E-Payment System
https://testlandingpageit06.edumall.co.th

To use org schema for Organization on homepage with more detailed information, please fill in store information here Stores > Configuration > general > general > store information. + stores > Configuration > general > store email address > general contact
By default it will show url and logo of organization

Fill in this fields:
Name, Address Line, Country, Region, City, Facebook link (I found just this social media on the website), Phone, Postal code, email.
if you don't have some of this fields, you can leave it. email is required field to fill in  [~r.krasnov] [~kirill] [~alec@topica.asia]

MongoDB script for getting info about time from each collection of db. It should be executed in MongoShell only because only it contains everything needed for that script
{code:java}
var i=0;db.getCollectionNames().forEach(c => {
    var cr = db[c].find({},{_id:1, updated_at:1,created_at:1}).sort({_id:-1}).limit(1);
    var count = db[c].count();
    if(!cr.hasNext())
    print(c + ",No Data," + count); 
    while(cr.hasNext()) {
        var obj=cr.next();
        if(obj["_id"] && obj["_id"].getTimestamp){
            print(c+',' + obj["_id"].getTimestamp().toISOString()+',' + count);i++;
        }
        else if (obj['updated_at']){
            print(c+',' + obj["updated_at"].toISOString()+',' + count);i++;
        }
        else if (obj['created_at']){
            print(c+',' + obj["created_at"].toISOString()+',' + count);i++;
        }
        else  print(c + ", No Date available"+',' + count); 
    } 
});print("Got date for " + i + " out of " + db.getCollectionNames().length);
{code} Here is the list of all Mongo databases from our main account summary table:
[^mongo_db_databases.xlsx] MySQL query for getting info  about time from each collection of db. You need to *set db variable* to schema you wish to execute it on before using.

 
{code:java}
SET @db = 'schemaName';

SET SESSION group_concat_max_len = 10000000;

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(qry SEPARATOR ' UNION ALL ')
INTO @sql
FROM (
         select CASE
                    WHEN
                            exists
                                (SELECT 1
                                 FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                                 WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'updated_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                            AND
                            exists(SELECT 1
                                   FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                                   WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'created_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                        THEN CONCAT('SELECT ', '\'', table_name, '\' AS table_name,',
                                    'COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(GREATEST(MAX(created_at),MAX(updated_at)), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ''), \'No Data\') AS last_time,COUNT(*) AS rows_count  FROM ', @db, '.',
                                    table_name)
                    WHEN
                        exists
                            (SELECT 1
                             FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                             WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'updated_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                        THEN CONCAT('SELECT ', '\'', table_name, '\' AS table_name,',
                                    'COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(updated_at), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ''), \'No Data\') AS last_time,COUNT(*) AS rows_count  FROM ', @db, '.', table_name)
                    WHEN
                        exists
                            (SELECT 1
                             FROM information_schema.COLUMNS
                             WHERE COLUMN_NAME = 'created_at' AND TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME)
                        THEN CONCAT('SELECT ', '\'', table_name, '\' AS table_name,',
                                    'COALESCE(DATE_FORMAT(MAX(created_at), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ''), \'No Data\') AS last_time, COUNT(*) AS rows_count  FROM ', @db, '.', table_name)
                    ELSE CONCAT(
                            'SELECT table_name AS table_name, DATE_FORMAT(GREATEST(CREATE_TIME, COALESCE(UPDATE_TIME,\'1900-01-01\')), ''%Y-%m-%dT%TZ'') AS last_time, TABLE_ROWS AS row_count FROM information_schema.tables where table_name =\'',
                            TABLE_NAME, '\'')
                    END qry
         FROM information_schema.TABLES t
         WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = @db
     ) a;

SET SESSION group_concat_max_len = 1024;

PREPARE dynamic_statement FROM @sql;
EXECUTE dynamic_statement;
DEALLOCATE PREPARE dynamic_statement;
{code}
  Here is the list of all MySQL databases from our main account summary table:
[^mysql_databases.xlsx] Discussed with [~Yann] what else we need for successfull completion of a task and decided that we also need *rows_count* We have problem with getting such info for PostgreSQL.
Turned out that for it this task is pretty problematic due to engine not saving info for dates. 
It can be achieved through stats of files of tables, but there we have more problems with access privileges due to AWS not giving such and not being available to find anybody with such accounts for old dw.  Updated code and files to include rows_count as third column [~Yann], as we decided that these databases are enough, should we close this issue?
Em đã cập nhật điền ở trên file rồi anh nhé
-
Ducal said the DB need the VPN to connect, checking with NA There are some problems now for connecting to new database via power bi Found out the source of the problem - Power BI connectors doesn't have certificates for connections for AWS RDS, so we need to include them manually.

To do this we need to *download* [^rds-combined-ca-bundle.p7b], *right-click* on this file, press *Install certificate* and follow Certificate installation wizard without any additions. At the step of *Certificate Store* you need to choose *Place all certificates in the following store* and using *Browse* button use *Trusted Root Certification Authorities,* so this window should look like this:
!image-2020-05-07-14-00-10-917.png!  . Then you need to click *Yes*  for all certificates when there would be a question about trusted source

Tested this on Nhat's computer and it works as intended
-
(just for the history. may be helpful in the future)
 * Table `customer_entity_text` contains customer attributes (custom attrbiutes) and has ~30gb of data on production. If site continue to grow it easily can hit 100gb+. The solution here to check why it was designed this way and prospose improvements.
 * Table `mageplaza_smtp_log` has ~17gb of data on production. Just need to turn on auto clean in admin panel.
 * Edumall/Theme/view/frontend/templates/html/catalogProduct/catalog.product.review.phtml takes 1.5-4sec to load on first hit. Few requests to LMS happens inside. Requests are cached, but will be better to load this block through ajax in separate request or implement magento-to-lms data sync via cron job.
(this activities will not improve system performance in general) Server side is ok. FPC in magento was fixed and it improved response time, but we can't use it in prod now, because some blocks with user data are rendered on server in the same request as main page. It will be fixed in next iteration.
-

!image-2020-05-05-14-10-06-190.png! Ok Khoa mình cảm ơn 
*FAQ How to Clear Cache on Power BI Query Editor:*

  1. Open Query Editor in Power Bi using Transform Data Button on Main Screen 

!image-2020-05-06-13-02-19-834.png!!image-2020-05-06-13-05-28-599.png!  

  2. In opened window of Query Editor press File button

!image-2020-05-06-13-07-57-230.png!

  3. In opened list press Options and Settings and then Options

!image-2020-05-06-13-10-31-069.png!
 !image-2020-05-06-13-12-35-214.png!   4. In opened Options window you can see opened Data Load menu, on the right side use two Clear Cache buttons
 !image-2020-05-06-13-16-46-433.png! *FAQ How to filter column list for table in Power BI Query Editor without preloading all columns:*
 # **Add new query in window of Query Editor using right click on empty space in list of Queries and choose proper data source:

!image-2020-05-06-13-27-12-788.png!
 # In opened Navigator window choose data table needed on left side and click OK on right side

!image-2020-05-06-13-33-05-693.png!
 # In main Query Editor new query should have been opened. And now we need to manually modify query field of it. For it we need to press on main query field
!image-2020-05-06-13-38-11-692.png!
And wrap value that was automatically generated in additional structures.
For getting full list of columns we should use *Table.Schema(table).* 
In this example, It should look like *= Table.Schema(MAROL_Schema\{[Name="CAMPAIGNS",Kind="Table"]}[Data])*
Hiting enter would provide list of all cloumns that we can use with types and all information available
!image-2020-05-06-13-45-07-857.png!

Now when we know what columns are available and what columns we want to you, we need to wrap around auto-generated query with *Table.SelectColumns(table, \{"COLUMN1","COLUMN2"}*
In this example, it should look like *= Table.SelectColumns(MAROL_Schema\{[Name="CAMPAIGNS",Kind="Table"]}[Data], \{"_ID", "NAME"})*
!image-2020-05-06-13-52-45-464.png!
And now in Preview WIndow there would be only columns we selected and this query would return only them. I found out that this issue was arised because of two problems:
 *  connection with marol seems to be a little bit slow
 *  orders table contains too much columns(108 to be exact)

Every time we tried to get data from Orders table it tried to load preview of 1000 rows with 108 columns, due to not very fast connection it was failing by timeout and trying again and by this it trashed cache.
To solve this problem I :
 * cleared cache of query editor because failing orders connect trashed it too much
 * added Table.SelectColumns to step of getting data from orders_table, so power bi now takes only columns you need instead of all 108
 * restored connection properties to odbc driver
 * wrote FAQs for cache clear and table.selectcolumns usage Hi, 

I can do it by myself, thank you so much

!image-2020-05-06-21-42-28-907.png!

{code} [~ducla5] As for now do you know some more info about this error appearing during transcoding? ssh ubuntu@54.169.216.89{code}
Please remember this is a spot instance so its ip address maybe change anytime so if you can not connect please report to me, I'll re-update for you. [~ducla5] okay, thanks [~ducla5] I have some questions.

1) I researched logs in VIS production server, found errors that could be related with transcoding and tried to reproduce them in my local machine. Firstly i quickly went through the code that runs the transcoding commands. I tried to reproduce them in rails console manually running there the code of transcoding and found that 
Open3.popen3(some ffmpeg commands) call which is used to catch error data from Stderr stream of Linux the example is here https://git.edumall.io/tcs/vis/blob/master/lib/ffmpeg/movie.rb#L73 . If follow this link and look at the code you'll find stderr object that should contain an error, but official documentation of ffmpeg says "ffmpeg sends all diagnostic messages (the "console output") to stderr because its actual output (the media stream) can go to stdout and mixing the diagnostic messages with the media stream would brake the output." - which lead to that as i figured it out even if we get errors or success stderr contains exactly the same structure of an object except that a message can be different (in case of error a message will contain error explanation) and it makes it hard to differ completed steps from failed ones. That's why i think the previous developer set "try catch" block in "perform" function https://git.edumall.io/tcs/vis/blob/master/app/workers/output_worker.rb#L48 to catch all errors of any type appearing in this worker responsible for transcoding. No matter if this error occurred because of other errors or transcoding. The data in logs refers to that "try catch" block. And the question is - can we send notifications to Admin in that try catch block considering that errors wouldn't always be exactly related to transcoding cause it could be any bug appearing in that worker ? 
2) Can i get the the video lessons after uploading which there have been transcoding errors? I want to dive a bit deeply into what could be wrong because i tried to transcode some videos from my computer in my local vis and i didn't get errors, except when i tried to transcode let's say PDF or word files to video formats. [~ducla5] i also need a gmail account from which these error messages would be sent. I configured smtp settings in the app. I only need to paste email address of that account to app's settings and also need to login to that gmail account and turn on the option that enables sending letters from third party applications.  [~ducla5] Do we have staging for Vis ? [~azat17] Vis does not have staging enviroment, no server, no S3 bucket so I think you should build yourself.

About gmail account, I'll request from Admin to get an account.

I've checked source code of VIS and see that they only call ffmpeg's command, but I think if we can get the output code of this command to know its status?

With this task, I have 2 options:
 * Check if it has transcode error.
 * Check if  it create Mpegts successfully. Why we must do this job? Because I've seen that there were a lot of video that VIS reported it transcoded successfully but client still can not play. The reason is it did't complete transcoding process so we can check by trying to download m3u8 file. [~ducla5] As i understand you it seems like that try catch block doesn't always catch an error happening during transcoding. In our case sometimes transcoding falsely completes an action which results in incorrect video file,  right? Can you give me please some videos that ended up broken after transcoding, i would work with them as a real data to reproduce relevant occasions, because i couldn't reproduce an action where we get an incorrect video despite that transcoding completes successfully, i just managed to reproduce a scenario when during transcoding ffmpeg throws an error  which is being catch by try catch block. !362_1.png|thumbnail!
was fixed in scope of EVAB-511
Problem was in that DSN for connect was created as User and not System.
Turned out Power BI uses its own user for queriyng data from sources, so it cannot access User DSN to add credentials for it. 
Schemas of database and table were available because they are stored in config file of DSN connection, so for them there were no actual connection to database
Need to change after sign in path to current environment home_page
Research after sign in path url getting from user's cookies Deployed changes to staging, need to change .env file HOME_PAGE_URL variable, ask [~ducla5] for it [~ducla5]

it can be tested on
[http://staging-sso.edumall.vn|http://staging-sso.edumall.vn/]
with an incognito-tab or with clear cache

we can deploy it on prod if everything is ok I confirm it works in staging. [~ducla5]

"When the deployment is started"

Gitlab server is outdated and there is no standard functionality for it for alert when pipeline started. 
We need to make scripts for that. 
At the moment, we can trigger an alert when we're in the push or MR

"When the QA tests are failed or success (with the number of tests passed or failed)"

There is no standard functionality for this. We need to write our integration, and you also need to optimize the tests to get the report. 

We can do it later, when we have time for it.

I've decided to give up on AWS DMS due to several reasons:
 * bad configuration in terms of control
 * a lot of strange behavior (task can be completed without any result, can be completed with errors with full result)
 * documentation doesn't cover such cases, no logic in what and why happening
 * cannot be used in terms of "set-up and forget" which we thought it can
Document located at https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/qa-auto/blob/master/runme.md
[~leonov.rs@gmail.com] Hi! I have added itemList on category page.
 I added summery type (only item, position and url) because our courses are not located on one page but on different.
 All-in-one page type should be presented on one page, identified ids.
 I tried to do all-in-one but got an error from google structure data testing tool.
 I have checked the example of Coursera website [https://www.coursera.org/browse/business] and see that there are summery markup type on the category pages.
 Our product pages already has detailed schema org markup [https://developers.google.com/search/docs/data-types/carousel#item-list] [~leonov.rs@gmail.com] Please see my result on local machine on the screenshot [~leonov.rs@gmail.com] The screenshot with error, it is my attempt to use all-in-one type It's good. This is copypasted Slack message from [~79635781274al]:

Hello.

During my work Im finished small review of current mobile app. And I got few problems, which we need to solve ASAP.

* First important bug is that cart do not work correctly or works very slowly. When I add any course to cart - badge do not updated (pic.1)
* When I click to Cart icon - I do not see nothing exclude endless preloader
* When I click to Cart menu section - same story, endless preloader. No matter Im logged user or not-logged
* When I switch view to Cart section - app do not verify, is user logged and I cant validate unathorized error

Other staff:

* When I click to categories, images came very slowly. I see a simple list without any images, only text labels. After random time (if view reloaded) list changing to multicolumn type. And I cant manage it - time really random.
* Issue, which not affected my work directly, but very important - too much hardcoded values into app, like passwords, keys, etc. Im not sure, that such values will be "on the stone" perennially
* Because we do not have normal CI/CD process for mobile app delivery - I cant manage test runs here. 

I mean, that only one way we have:

* Developer make build locally
* Developer send me .apk
* I fix (if needed) test cases for activities, app name end version, et cetra
* Test finally executed
* Tests failed
* I call to developer, send him tests log
* Developer fix something
* He send me .apk
* ...
* Somewhen app go to Play Market

As you can see - this is unbearable process. We need autobuilds and CI here, 200%

* Right now I have problem that version which provided to me more older that located on Play Market (at least because I see a message about it). Who knows how it works? I mean versioning process
* Some elements do not have resourceID values - I will prepare list soon
* And I do not touch iOS version - Im not sure that situation there will not be same [~kirill] all unfinished subtasks frozen because backend of cart not working for now Got access to the play market, downloaded the release apk, and sent it to [~79635781274al].

[~denis.petrov] need to pass this check, make it green.

!image-2020-05-22-17-28-17-594.png|thumbnail! [~puzanov@gmail.com], Pagespeed simply checking above the fold content and % of styles it uses during rendering. Let's say we have 100kb of styles, above the fold content uses only 10kb. This tool suggests to write 10Kb of css inline and to load 90Kb later. There are a lot of stylesheets in magento in different modules, need to manually check every single one of them, find places which is used in above the fold content, and move them to inline. This is a lot of work. What I can do quick, it just load entire css later, but in this case, site will look in a following way while styles loading: 

!417_1.png|thumbnail!!417_2.png|thumbnail!
As a result, we will have green mark, but the score will not change, as well as load time for user. In magento projects, styles usually remain as they are - 100 KB is not a problem since 2010. Css duplicates have been removed. Merge service now works properly on the category/product/search page.

!417_3.png|thumbnail! seems working

[~kirill] can u make some manual tests to ensure that everything is OK?
[~ducla5] [~Yann]
Hello! I would like to ask you give me an access to production admin of Magento or that you do the following by yourselves.

Normally js bundling is not enabled because it produces big js files (can be configured manually), which more harm than good, especially on mobile. But looks like js bundling processor from this module works better than native in magento. While it still significantly reduces number of requests, it keeps bundle size relatively small. (new errors appeared in the console nonetheless)
||key||requests||bundle size||
|disabled (current)|~300|0|
|native|~120|~2.5 mb|
|module (good)|~140|~400Kb|

This feature may help to improve GPS score.  Frozen for now, we get back to it later

Notice that Magento token should present on staging server, otherwise you'll get 503 response code with the following message: "wrong number of arguments (given 3, expected 4)" It is very strange situation - I got such link on mobile app. As far as I know - same links using on prod. Therefore - we need to solve something on backend part. Manual POST or GET do no be an a helper here. Could you please compare code from prod and stage?  Further to receipt of new details I investigated the case and discovered that magento token constant missing for .env template file. I assume that this could cause errors that happened for all magento services on staging.

I added the constant and created MR: [https://git.edumall.io/tcs/pikamon/merge_requests/873] [~ducla5] To solve the problem I would need to access the staging server and ensure that correct magento token constant exists. My next step is to discover logs (https://log.tsts.edumall.io/) and find why pikamon responses with 500 error to mobile apps First discovered problem: pikamon cannot make request to *backend-sol-web-staging.ingress.v3.cloud.edumall.io*, it fails with the following error:

*SocketError: Failed to open TCP connection to backend-sol-web-staging.ingress.v3.cloud.edumall.io:80 (getaddrinfo: Name does not resolve)*

[~khalezin.d]'s help needed to fix the problem.

 
  Even after changing the url (see above) all requests to Magento staging were failing.

With DevOps Dmitrii we found that magento staging didn't implement any logging. That was blocking. I decided to double check the token because nothing else could be the case.

I investigated that I can find actual magento token at [https://admin-staging.edumall.vn/admin/admin/]. I compared it with existing token at [https://env.edumall.io/] and found that they were different. I replaced it with the correct one and that helped.

NOTICE: Redeploy needed when changing env variables at [https://env.edumall.io/].

We the team we decided to update staging db with the current production db, because it is the most quick and effective solution.

[~ducla5] Researched reset password functionality. Checked it in staging and prod. There appears an error in both Prod and Staging. After clicking on "Forgot password?" link I was redirected to AccountKit page. Researched AccountKit service. I turns out that AccountKit is the Facebook's service for authentication without using passwords. AccountKit's workflow is as follow it uses emails and phone numbers where it sends codes, after which a user should enter that code and if the code is valid a user gets redirected back to their page where special callback handlers handle the data with user's token. If everything in that workflow is ok the page for changing password is opened and a user will be able to type new password.
  But this service AccountKit is no longer supported, it's deprecated henceforth. These are some official acrticles on that
 [https://developers.facebook.com/blog/post/2019/09/09/account-kit-services-no-longer-available-starting-march/]
[https://developers.facebook.com/docs/accountkit/]
That's why we had better to replace it with something another. For restoring passwords via SMS send to phone numbers we can use Twillio service which's one of the most popular and the best ones . But Oleg said that Twillio has some problems with Vietnamese phone services and may be we had better to use something Vietnamese. Can you suggest something regarding this issue? Or we can use Twillio? [~ducla5] 

Started implementing the reset password functionality via email. The worklow is as follow after users fill email address and click on "forgot password" link users there will be sent the letter to users' email addresses with the link by click on which users will be get redirected to our site with the form for updating a password where they'll be able to set their new passwords. Completed all steps except updating new passwords from the last form. 
Need to get the gmail account to set it in smpt setting of mailer [~ducla5] we use gmail for sending letters but gmail restricts us to send 500 letter in a day. I consider we should choose mailing services such as SendGrid. But as for now gmail should work fine but it's going to restrict us further. 
 
  I'll create a SendGrid account for you. {code:java}

 Remove _ga and _gid params from request The progress so far.

We fixed problem with not set/ not set source with not sending cs and cm params when we have no data.

The main problem was with _gid param. We were sending it from bifrost and yesterday we had assumption that we need to remove it because it expires in 24 hours.

Today we have organic and direct data in GA.

Will check it later with [~leonov.rs@gmail.com] and we will schedule a working session if anything will go wrong Here is the summary of our call and conclusions for current status with Enhanced Ecommerce on 25.05.2020: 
 # We have compared last several days with bifrost database and it fits in general numbers (revenue, quantity of transactions etc)!
 # GA EE in EVN works with data discrepancy 3-5% (or even 0% in some cases)

What problems do we have: 
 # Because bifrost doesn't see referrer (dr parameter = url source of traffic, if it doesn't have UTM). That's why our organic / SEO traffic goes to direct / none
 # We don't see refunds in GA, but we found last records in database in 2017. It seems not so critical
 # We don't see promocodes in GA, we need [~Yann]'s help to understand how promocodes look in our database

These problems are not critical because we can: 
 # Track paid traffic sources and efficiency
 # We see real transactions and revenue

For the closest 3-4-5-6 months this solution is acceptable, but in future it would be great to improve it solving these problems. 

 

But we have another big problem: one problem that we have is mess with UTM terms that marketers use now. And internal database see traffic sources in another way.

-
There are a lot of JS files that are not minified and not merged. Actually I would like to have all JS files minified and merged in 2-5 files (or more), but not 100+ like we have now, this is insane. Also I see some js files loading but they are the same. 

We can use the plugin we have bought, or internal Magento solution, or both solutions combined. But I am not ready and agree to have this JS mess untouched.  default bundling/merging/minification (+10 points on average)

!merge_and_bundle.png|thumbnail!

APO module (+20 points on average)

!apo.png|thumbnail!

======

Default behavior can be improved, but it require more work than initially expected.

APO module better then default, but currently, we need to manually run optimization after each deploy + execute several commands from command line to make it work. Regarding js optimizarion, I suggest to use builtin functionality. I performed bundle optimization and resulting bundle size is 2 times lower then with standard settings. Total number of js requests changed from 200 to 20. With this approach we will not rely on 3rd party solution, which is always good, since it not increase overall system complexity - less possible bugs, less dev time wasted.

!505_2.png|thumbnail!!505_3.png|thumbnail! [~denis.petrov] agreed

In this case do we still need to make some kind of manual works after deploy? If yes - need to have a doc in readme for this Talking about the score, avg result will be between what we have with default setting(50), and with APO module(65). So between 50-65.

!505_4.png|thumbnail!!505_5.png|thumbnail!!505_6.png|thumbnail!!505_7.png|thumbnail!!505_8.png|thumbnail!!505_9.png|thumbnail!!505_10.png|thumbnail! [~puzanov@gmail.com], no, with built-in functionality we do not need to perform any additional work. Everything will be done automatically during deployment. From time to time, we may notice that the score is lower/higher than usual. Let's see why this is happening.

 

*48* The sequence of screenshots in report shows that some images from cdn took longer to load, than usual, which affected "Largest Contentful Paint" and lowered the score.

!505_11.png|thumbnail!!505_11_1.png|thumbnail!!505_11_2.png|thumbnail!

 

*75* The sequence of screenshots in report shows that PageSpeed Worker stopped the task before loading all the images, which affected the overall size of request (~3mb vs 7mb) and increased the score.

!Снимок экрана 2020-05-19 в 11.43.12.png|thumbnail! Rescue error with redirect
Deployed to staging
[~ducla5] can you please specify all possible source for such info in meta_data except source_url? what we do is copy the value of source_url field of meta_data column and update it to source_url column if it's empty.

We don't know all posible source from this field
Payment flow:
 # add product to cart -> go to checkout -> Thanh toán Online -> Thanh toán bằng thẻ Visa, Master, JCB,.. -> Đặt mua -> magento creates order
 # magento takes payment URL from config at
{noformat}
stores -> configuration -> sales -> payment methods -> edumall -> Thanh toán online{noformat}
which points to *thanhtoan.edumall.vn*, and sends POST request with following body
{noformat}
Array
(
  [callback_url] => http://local.edumall.vn/payment/order/online_payAfter/
  [price] => 679000
  [email] => denis.petrov@example.com
  [name] => denis1 petrov
  [user_id] => 5eb59a7e7a071b56ee5e6312
  [one_pay_type] =>
  [source] => edumall-eCommerce
  [source_url] => http://local.edumall.vn/mobile-app/lap-trinh-android-tu-co-ban-den-nang-cao
  [coupon_code] =>
  [courses_data] => Array
  (
    [1701] => Array
    (
      [id] => 56e24fe1d8b7311b47f3376c
      [price] => 679000
      [combo] =>
    )
  )
  [order_id] => 98113
  [partner] => one_pay
){noformat}
 # thanhtoan.edumall.vn returns real payment URL -> magento redirects to this URL 
{noformat}
https://onepay.vn/vpcpay/vpcpay.op?AgainLink=https%3A%2F%2Fthanhtoan.edumall.vn%2Fgateway%2Fpayment%2Fdo&Title=Bifrost&vpc_AccessCode=9B192313&vpc_Amount=39900000&vpc_Command=pay&vpc_Customer_Email=denis.petrov%40neklo.com&vpc_Customer_Id=5eb59a7e7a071b56ee5e6312&vpc_Locale=vn&vpc_MerchTxnRef=1590115405171&vpc_Merchant=TOPICAEDU&vpc_OrderInfo=Edumall+-+g+-+4125736&vpc_ReturnURL=https%3A%2F%2Fthanhtoan.edumall.vn%2Fgateway%2Fpayment%2Fdr&vpc_TicketNo=4125736&vpc_Version=2&vpc_SecureHash=858BD4123EDAB69510A96A6C6D0AF1D37EFF9912E8B248AD2CE2AFDE0E9C95DA{noformat}
 # user enters credit card data -> submits payment -> gateway redirects user back to magento
 # depending on the results of the prev step, user sees a success/fail page

==============

1. Price should use ISO 4217 (VND) 
 2. Item subtitle - in the template it uses correctly, added category name length 10 - 30 symbols;
 3. Item description -  it is product description too, but these attributes will be shown in ads, so length should be 10 - 30 symbols.  

*Example*:
Item Title: Sedan; 
Description: Best Selling Sedan
Subtitle: At your Tempe dealership

The check for validation from apple is sent from the application to the backend, if for some reason the check didn’t reach the backend, I think that the user’s money will be withdrawn and of course, it’s not bought, then we need to check and fix it.
  Added handlers for recording and storing failed purchases.
Added request of validation of purchases upon entering the start application and opening the screen for viewing purchased courses. Added removing on logout stored failed purchases which not validated from the backend. Create the 3.1.3 (1000) staging config build.
I still see problems with IAP 2:
1 - The course is not marked as purchased and can be bought many times
2 - The check for validation from apple is sent from the application to the backend, if for some reason the check didn’t reach the backend, I think that the user’s money will be withdrawn and of course it’s not bought, then we need to check and fix it.
  Tried to add non-renewable purchase, as it turned out, it is impossible to make purchases with the same bundle identifier, but then we can restore the purchase through the apple.

Trying to research another way to restore the purchase if backend didn't receive the receipt. There are 2 solutions to the problem:
1 - Implement a check record from the application side if it has not to send validation and then send it to the backend. If the user has a bad Internet connection, then processing will not be executed.
2 - On the backend side, have the entire flow of the payment. - In my opinion a good solution to the problem. Tasks by the points

[~puzanov@gmail.com] also managed to complete a test purchase. I have not found a solution for the successful testing of IAP.

  There was a question with a choice of type of purchase in apple, consumable/ not consumable.

The pluses of a consumable payment is that we attach the rate to the amount and register it in apple, and adding only new amounts in the IAP.
The cons of a consumable payment, cannot be restored, can be bought again from the IAP.

The pluses are not consumable payment, you can restore, you can not buy again, with a second purchase, apple says that the purchase was completed.
The cons of a not consumable payment, you need to register each course with apple, and each time keep the list of courses that should be registered with apple up to date. I successfully bought the course from IAP purchases, and now disable buy button until we make sure that everything worked successfully.

1 - Created new variables to specify staging API links in the EnvConfiguration.plist file

Variable rootUrl:
// let envPath = "Environment-staging" - staging path - used API http://tcs-pikamon-web-staging.ingress.v3.cloud.edumall.io/

// let envPath = "Environment" - production path - used API https://mobile-api.edumall.vn/

Variable rootM2Url:
// let envPath = "Environment-m2-staging" - staging path - used API http://ecommerce-magento-mobile-api-gateway-staging.tsts.edumall.io/

// let envPath = "Environment-m2" - production path - used API https://middleware-mobile-api.edumall.vn/

RootM2Tracking variable:
// let envPath = "Tracking-m2-staging" - staging path - used API https://cdp4-rodan-gateway-web-staging.tsts.edumall.io/

// let envPath = "Tracking-m2" - production path - used API https://cdptrack.edumall.io/ Added centralization of staging and production directions in the AbstractAPI class.
 I also transferred variables to the AbstractAPI class that were also responsible for API links. (areaUrl, flashSaleUrl, homePageBaseUrl)
 Created a function isProduction true / false which controls the variables:

Variable rootUrl:
 // "Environment-staging" - staging path - used API [http://tcs-pikamon-web-staging.ingress.v3.cloud.edumall.io/]

// "Environment" - production path - used API [https://mobile-api.edumall.vn/]

Variable rootM2Url:
 // "Environment-m2-staging" - staging path - used API [http://ecommerce-magento-mobile-api-gateway-staging.tsts.edumall.io/]

// "Environment-m2" - production path - used API [https://middleware-mobile-api.edumall.vn/]

Variable RootM2Tracking:
 // "Tracking-m2-staging" - staging path - used API [https://cdp4-rodan-gateway-web-staging.tsts.edumall.io/]

// "Tracking-m2" - production path - used API [https://cdptrack.edumall.io/]

Variable areaUrl:
 // "Environment-area-staging" - staging path - used API [http://ares-staging.edumall.io/]
 // "Environment-area" - production path - used API [http://ares.edumall.vn/]

Variable flashSaleUrl
 // "Environment-flash-staging" - staging path - used API - https://mothership-falcon-web-staging.ingress.v3.cloud.edumall.io/api/v1/campaign/present
 // "Environment-flash" - production path - used API - https://falcon.edumall.io/api/v1/campaign/present

homePageBaseUrl

  After checking the code, it turned out that IAP was already configured in the application, and hiding the buy button in the cart was implemented, the cart tab was removed.
 The category tab has been removed and replaced with the course tab.

Already changed end points for course listings
 *"api / v1 / courses / preview / filter_by_category /"* instead of *"api / v1 / courses /* filter_by_category /"
 *"api / v1 / course / preview / detail"* instead of *"api / v1 / course / detail"*

For purchase

Added remote configuration from Firebase which enables the IAP purchase on the app and disables Buy button.

iapDisabled - Enable or Disable In App Purchase for production

buyButtonIsEnable - Display or Hide Cart button for production

 

staging_iapDisabled - Enable or Disable In App Purchase for staging

staging_buyButtonIsEnable - Display or Hide Cart button for staging

* FPC has been fixed.
 * Added css minification and merging.
 * Reduced number of HTTP requests by JS bundling & merging. An advanced approach has been used. Bundle size is ~4.5 times smaller than with standard settings.
 * Some bugs fixed: css merging, inappropriate widgets initialization, jwplayer and others Thailand and Vietnam now have the same optimizations, but TH score is still lower then VN (~30 vs ~55). Let's see what the difference is and what needs to be done.

!85_2_th.png|thumbnail!!85_2_vn.png|thumbnail!
 # Remove yandex metrica or disable unused features. It occupies CPU for 3sec.
 # Figure out what is https://edumallth.api.useinsider.com/ins.js?id=10003632. It occupies CPU for 1sec.
 # Figure out why TTFB on TH is 2 times higher than on VN (400-600ms vs 180-300ms). I remember we had similar problem on VN in the past [~khalezin.d]

||site||3rd party script||CPU Time||Script Evaluation||
|VN|[https://mc.yandex.ru/metrika/tag.js]|71 ms|57 ms|
|TH|[https://mc.yandex.ru/metrika/tag.js]|2,884 ms|2,312 ms|
|VN|https://edumall.api.useinsider.com/ins.js?id=10002141|398 ms|265 ms|
|TH|https://edumallth.api.useinsider.com/ins.js?id=10003632|1,009 ms|748 ms|

Summary: ins.js and ynadex metrika takes 4 seconds, which is 200% of time needed to process all javascript in magento.

I checked Meduza in case if it's that service but it isn't. Also reading the code i found that some part of the payment are being made in that service so i need to know it and look at it's code. In main.js at 200 the line there is a call to complete a payment.

  A few updates. Found that data of courses that the site receives are being taken from meduza. Also figured out that discount amount exists in that data. Also figured out that this [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment] java service gets parameters from lending to complete a payment and that params include Omise token and the rest of the payment process is handled by [e-payment|https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment]  service. All that we need to do is go send that discount to [e-payment|https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment]  service as an additional parameter and change the amount of the price considering that discount.

In your screen it's 50. Does it mean that we should deduct 50 from the price ? [~peerapat] we also currently do not have discount information displayed on the page . I think we should display it somewhere, right? If so, can you please suggest where it should be. For example for chinesetoday-english.edumall.co.th it's 50.    [~azat17] 
The discount is in THB currency 

Basically we set up the discount in the Medusa (lp.edumall.co.th)

the discount will work only when the customer choose to pay online (credit/debit card)

 

for example, original price is 2,799 THB

and we provide 65% discount on the ldp = 990 THB

and if customer select to pay online, the system should give extra 50 THB discount = 940 THB

First of all, full bug list landed here: [https://jira.topica.vn/issues/?jql=labels%20%3D%20apps]

 

During tests of both mobile apps I found a lot of bugs. I grouped it by Priority and user's affecting:

Hight-level issues, which blocked users:

EVAB-577 When I register a new user and put to email field any symbols (like +, -'-', etc) or upper-case letters (like TestUser@..) I got green check on mobile screen, but when registration is completed - user do not created and I can't login into app. 

EVAB-578 - As I understood, banners is a marketing tool. But no one banner not clickable - just images 

EVAB-623 - When I open course with broken video - app go to freeze and I can't return to courses catalog. 

EVAB-609 - Sometimes learning screen not working. When I click on second button (about profile) - black splash screen do not hided and app go to freeze. I can't do anything more - courses not open, cart not working, et cetra

EVAB-610 - Learning screen showing randomly on part of test executions. 

EVAB-621 - One of ugly problems. When I want to finish my order into cart and try to fill address form - I can't select no one input, it is blocked for me. 

Medium-level issues:

EVAB-567 - Some part of code send error (provided on ticket description) to log, but it is not affected program execution

EVAB-568 -  When I add 3 courses on list I see such case - wrong align and spaces around last course

EVAB-565 -  For example, when I enter into course detail and request to backend failed - I can share link

EVAB-579 -  On desktop I see full list of sub-topics of course, which consist of full counter and FULL list of topics. But on mobile always 3 chapters showing. Total time and count of parts do not showed too

EVAB-580 - No one item into cart not clickable. On desktop I can move to course page

 

Low-level issues:

EVAB-564 - Developers who made app do not implemented connection issues exceptions, and when I switch off mobile/wifi connection - no one message not showing, app working badly 

 

Finally. Right now application have a lot of minor and major bugs. This things does not allow us to conclude that this application will be useful and effective for end users. Perhaps we will get a certain number of failures due to non-working functionality. The overall experience of using both applications is bad. [~Yann] [~ducla5] FYI Also please note, that Alex was mostly ignoring small and low priority bugs (UI, markup, etc), there even more of them, so we won't suggest to use the apps in this state for any promotional activities, they really need some improvements and work to put into it.
-
One of the problem that can arise while connecting to big data sources is PowerBI trying to load all data localy to use.
To solve such problem you need to use DirectQuery instead of Import on step of creating data source in Power BI
[~ducla5] [~Yann] We found some discrepancy in transactions with coupon codes between 25 may and 31 may. Some transactions that exist in database doesn't appear in GA dashboard. We consider that it happened because google analytics has limit for length of names of coupon codes. GA validates and doesn't allow for too long names. 

That's how that coupon codes' names look like

!image-2020-06-02-17-54-45-275.png!

 And the question is which services send the data with that coupon codes to bifrost ? How and where we can actualize that names, because some of them looks invalid ? Also if you take a look some coupon names look so strange containing user's personal info :)))

We need to break this task to small tasks:
 * Create DW instance.
 * Tool to update data
 * Tool to calculate data. For this task I need mainly about 5 days and about 2 days in reserve:
- Creating DW instance would take couple of hours, though I don't know we need need additional instance apart from our main
- Adapting tools and migrating data would take 4-5 days in normal pace
- I don't know what is current state of ETL databases and data and it is hard to say now what can happen wrong, so additionally 2 days would be good for problems that can arise [~Yann] can you provide what table we need to collect in ETL? I'll start with common tables. [~Yann] if you need something special, it would be helpfull if you would share I finished everything on etl branch [https://git.edumall.io/tcs/redshift-dw/tree/etl]
Haven't tested though because of abscence of time Import guideline:
 # We need to get DDL for table that we want to import. For Mongo it is best to use varchar(max) as a type for all columns, for SQL databases you can simply use create queries that database server can generate.

{code:java}
CREATE TABLE jackfruit_user_get_course_logs (
    _id varchar(max), 
    course_id varchar(max), 
    created_at  varchar(max), 
    updated_at  varchar(max), 
    user_id varchar(max)
);
{code}

 # With that DDL you need to create table on Redshift
 # You need to export data from database to local csv file

{code:java}
mongoexport --uri="mongodb://jackfruittl:jackfruittl.edumall%40topica@sgdbsector20.edumall.vn:27017/jackfruittl" --type=csv --collection=user_get_course_logs --out=etl_jackfruit_user_get_course_logs.csv --fields "_id,course_id,created_at,updated_at,user_id"
{code}

 # Upload file on s3

{code:java}
aws s3 cp etl_jackfruit_user_get_course_logs.csv s3://dw-data-lake-integration/etl_jackfruit_user_get_course_logs/etl_jackfruit_user_get_course_logs.csv{code}

 # On Redshift run copy command from s3
 
{code:java}
copy etl.jackfruit_user_get_course_logs
from 's3://dw-data-lake-integration/etl_jackfruit_user_get_course_logs/' 
ACCESS_KEY_ID 'AKIAVDEOU636FKDVEPF3'
SECRET_ACCESS_KEY 'H9+hW5Grpqr/VwPfOiA3dIgZu0t2DmBm40uhDryC'
delimiter ',' IGNOREHEADER 1 
ACCEPTINVCHARS
CSV QUOTE '\"' 
NULL AS '\0' 
emptyasnull
blanksasnull
TIMEFORMAT 'auto'
maxerror 10
FILLRECORD {code}
You can find all code I used on https://git.edumall.io/tcs/redshift-dw/tree/etl

[~ducla5], [~Yann] can you check? Do you need anything 
Regarding today's problem in bifrost_tl. Few points to mention. As i understood the problem solved by removing foreign_key associated with _transaction_id field of transaction_deatils table and making it being nullable
 If you look here [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/bifrost_tl/blob/master/db/schema.rb#L69]
 [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/bifrost_tl/blob/master/gateway/app/models/gateway/transaction_detail.rb#L4] you can see that _transaction_id field of transaction_details table refers to id field of transactions table but it's being made on active record level not in database level.

Looking at Rails migrations we have this migration [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/bifrost_tl/blob/master/db/migrate/20160413035230_transaction_details.rb#L11] where references :_transaction, index: true - that just creates _transaction_id field and creates an index without creating foreing_key on database level.
 In order to foreign key to be created for that column we should have also added "foreign_key: true" option to that line of code but it wasn't. Apart from it there are no any other migrations which could create a foreign key for _transaction_id column. 

Also i looked at db schema locally from master branch which should be exactly the same as in production
 apart from data. And there is a following scenario:

 

!image-2020-05-29-19-14-50-405.png!

!image-2020-05-29-19-14-59-489.png!

There are no *existing foreign keys on database level* as it can be seen in both screenshots. Which fully corresponds to what we have in Rails migrations.

All that information lead us that this foreign key was created directly from mysql shell, which couldn't be done accidentally :)) , and also is bad for the following reason. 
 All foreign keys should be created via ActiveRecord migrations it's Rails way of doing things.
 For more info how this may have happened mysql logs have to be investigated.

 

 
-
-
[~saran]  [~Yann]

Can you please describe this task, where we can see the issue and what is the end result here? There are two main type of lead (C3) shown in Minerva, c3_cod and c3_credit.

Another dimension is "e-payment status" which has 4 main status including incomplete, complete,failed,timeout.

 

Normally, c3_cod will have only one status which is "incomplete"

Other status were created for c3_credit (for Online payment status).

 

However, I've found that there are some c3_cod leads that have "incomplete" status.

 

My question is what is the meaning of c3_cod with complete status?

 

  Explored the code, looked for all pieces of code that could change e-payment status of c3_cod leads. Looked at Minerva and Marol. And found that such operations could be done in Marol, all other places doesn't seem to be related to it. Especially found update_payment_status method in app/controllers/contact_api_controller line 73. Third party services can change the type of the contactc3 by sending request to that action method passing the id and status of the contactc3 in parameters. If we send "complete" status for a contactc3 there will be a check for if there are other contactc3s with the same email, course_id, in case there are then all that contactc3s will have their statuses changed to "completed" and some of them may have type equal to c3_cod. That's what i managed to find [~azat17] Do we know what is the third party service that you mentioned? [~pornprapa] see the message above please [~saran] it's e-payment backend service, e-payment landing the ones i know so far
 
  Is it the same e-payment service that we are currently using?

If yes, I believe it should not change the status of c3_cod since it is not the e-payment contact (c3_credit).

If no, what is it? where is it coming from?

[~azat17] [~saran] Yes, it's the same we are using now. Also i'm not fully sure if other landings may or may not send this request to change the status.

But what i've found now is that this ticket's behavior may appear when some contactc3's status is changed and at the same time there are other contactc3s which have the same course_id and email as that contactc3 which had its status changed and in that case their (duplicated contacts)) statuses also will change.  [~azat17] Any suggested solution to prevent this, I think it is not correct to have c3_cod with complete status in our database.  [~saran] we can add a clause in that request by which not to take duplicated contactc3 which have c3_cod type . Such way i can prevent status updating of c3_cod leads in that request and further see if we get any c3_cod with complete status or not. [~azat17] Sounds good.

However, please help me make sure it is not affecting other flow. [~saran] I will not affect other flow. It mustn't do that As I discussed with [~azat17], I think this ticket is ready to deploy.

Thank you.

  [~saran]Are there any emails failed from tomorrow? From Yesterday until now, we have 0 case related to this issue. Let's update again next week to finalize the issue. 
[~dsalamau] [~saran]Sure, thank you [~dsalamau] Until today, we did not found any case so I think we can close this ticket.

Thank you very much.
Normally, Lead type "c3_credit" has 4 main e-payment status.  (Ideally, it should be like to logic below)
 * Incomplete: First status since the customer submit the form (Sales will not be able to get (to Telesales system) Lead type = c3_credit & e-payment status = incomplete)
 * Complete: When customer successfully paid via online payment (Sales will not be able to get (to Telesales system) Lead type = c3_credit & e-payment status = complete)
 * Failed: When customer fail to pay via online payment  (Sales will be able to get (to Telesales system) Lead type = c3_credit & e-payment status = Failed)
 * Timeout: When customer does not finish the payment within 10 minutes, the status will be changed from "incomplete" to "timeout" by the system(Sales will be able to get (to Telesales system) Lead type = c3_credit & e-payment status = timeout)

However, some of the leads (c3_credit with incomplete status) do not changed from "incomplete" to "timeout" after 10 minutes.

Problem: Sales team cannot make a call to the leads that the status are not changed.

 

Here is the list of leads that has an error: [Incomplete Leads Performance|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/14mtyUnrkp_Jxm-Kr8KqoC_h7yxStqYjd2FoHfszy_GA/edit?pli=1#gid=381675780] Went through Minerva, Marol and e-payment applications. Didn't find any code, especially background jobs (crons) that would handle functionality of changing statuses. Found schedulers in e-payment java service and started to investigate it, it also has requests to Marol. But figured out that requests are for changing Ibanking status. Still need to look for this functionality

[~Yann] can you please help, do you know where approximately could be placed that functionality of changing statuses of ContactC3? Maybe you have information that can speed up the process  [~Yann] FYI. A few updates.  

Found the rake task and cron that's in charge of changing status functionality. It's in Marol, lib/tasks/update_status_c3.rake and in config/schedule.rb line 11. 
 Explored the logic behind them and one of the clauses which's being considered to take leads is their priorities. It takes contactc3 with priority from 0 to 2, but the contactc3s from the linked doc have priorities equal to 3. Also i found that in database all contactc3s which haven't been given timeout status they all have priority equal to 3. Maybe we can solve that problem making priority 3 one of those under which contacts3 are being chosen for timeout status. Also we need to make sure that i found relevant crontabs which in my opinion most likely correct. For that purpose let me change the priority of some of those contactc3s from the doc i see if they appeared in Sales system. Please let me know when you'll be able to look at the sales system, then i'll change priority of the some contacts [~azat17] Please note that this issue occur only a few percent. Most of the contacts status were changed correctly. 

From your update, I wonder why *"contactc3s from the linked doc have priorities equal to 3"* ? What make it different from the rest of contacts? Had a call with Saran. Regarding this task as i mentioned before the problem of updating statuses occurs because some Contactc3s have priority equal to 3. Found that js landing ([https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate]) sends a request to change priority to 3 when Omise returns failure response when a user does payments. I consider that some percent of contactc3 had an error returned from Omise. It can happen when the submitted data is incorrect or outdated (card number, cvv, expiration date) or when there isn't enough money on the card

I can reproduce this issue using prod db in local env. Issue related to quote items of this particular user. Since this user complains via phone that he can't login to his account on production, we can clean his quote manually through database as a quick solution.

The same reason as in https://jira.topica.vn/browse/EVAB-647
Current magento project depends a lot on 3rd party services. Today, LMS was not stable, so non-cacheable/cached pages took 30-60 sec to load, or did not load at all (both stage and prod).

When 3rd party services are up and working properly, loading time of user menu will be the same as for mini-cart/wish list.

 ** All scripts in task are run by hand before. We should implement it to update data to `sale_details` table
 * Why are there two create table statements with the same table name?
 ** I’ve re-updated it. It’s `temp` table, not `sale_details`

 ** These queries are run by hand. Our update script has not implemented that. Now Yann’s team want our update script must do this. About how our update script do, it’s up to you.
 * How do you run this query now?
 ** How they use it:
 *** Every day, when they want a report, they delete `sale_details` and re-run these queries to have updated data in `sale_details` table. [~dmitrii] can you finish this task today? Committed all my works on this issue. Passed to [~ducla5] for review and deploy I've tested and seen we have a bug:

*Report:*

Starting working on the task by checking the endpoint:
 * http://ecommerce-magento-mobile-api-gateway-staging.tsts.edumall.io/api/v1/course/preview/detail

*Next Step:*

Find the problem
   

*Next Step:*

Connect to staging db and check if the course belongs to user *Report:*

Mysql db on staging used by magento-mobile-api is empty.

I found that magento-mobile-api doesn't store any information about courses.

It calls [https://magento-staging.edumall.vn/rest/V2/mobile/customer/product-owner?middleware_test=timestamp_in_milliseconds] instead.**

Request example:

POST [https://magento-staging.edumall.vn/rest/V2/mobile/customer/product-owner?middleware_test=timestamp_in_milliseconds]

Headers: Authorization / Bearer MAGENTO_TOKEN

Params: access_token / [TOKEN from mobile request to magento-mobile-api from Authorization header]

 

Request returns empty []

*Next Step:*

Investigate why does the request return empty array.

Cooperate with IOS dev Pavel so we could buy a course and try with new token
  *Report:*

Event with the new token POST request to [https://magento-staging.edumall.vn/rest/V2/mobile/customer/product-owner?middleware_test=timestamp_in_milliseconds] returns empty array *Report:*

I went through each line of code for endpoint [https://magento-staging.edumall.vn/rest/V2/mobile/customer/product-owner?middleware_test=timestamp_in_milliseconds]

and found that it compares user's courses list with the received courses list from Magento.

It receives an empty array from Magento atm that's why *is_owned* attribute equals *false* now and button in mobile apps showing as unbought.

I extended the existing task for Magento developers with the case above.
