# Course promos are set in Magento admin panel
# Promos are set for some date ranges (for example, from 13th to 15th of May)
# SOMETIMES these promos just stop working and the price is returning to the original (it occurs after Magento deployments)
# The default price is coming from Kelley
#In this case, the content team is trying to clean the cache

How re-index is going: 

# Index: Magento admin > System > Index management
# Clear cache: Magento admin > System> Cache management
# Clear cache for mobile app: http://ecommerce-magento-mobile-api-middleware.tst.edumall.io/swagger-ui.html#!/cache45controller/clearCacheDataForProductTeamUsingGET Promotions are set here: https://admin.edumall.vn/admin/catalog_rule/promo_catalog/index/filter/bmFtZT0xMyUyRjUmZnJvbV9kYXRlJTVCbG9jYWxlJTVEPWVuX1VTJnRvX2RhdGUlNUJsb2NhbGUlNUQ9ZW5fVVM=/form_key/hkxWkG0YhDEEPBcc/

 There was a problem with identities of "Edumall Product Section Widget". The problem has been fixed. No longer need to manually clear the cache to see new prices on the home page.

Cần làm càng sớm càng tốt. Trong tối nay or muộn nhất là sáng ngày mai phải xử lí xong để trả lời cho thầy. [~khoant2]: Lượng thông tin trong ticket chưa đủ để tìm hiểu. Nhờ thanh niên làm việc với business để làm rõ các vấn đề sau:

1. Viêc đối chiếu ghi nhận doanh thu đang được thực hiện như thế nào?

2. Để thực hiện đối chiếu đã phải trích xuất dữ liệu từ hệ thống nào? Và bằng cách nào? Cho khoảng thời gian nào?

3. Giao dịch (records) nào trong dữ liệu trích xuất ra đang bị cho là sai? Expected là gì (cần biết được lý do tại sao lại có expected value đấy) và actual là gì?

[https://edumall.vn/kien-truc-noi-that/thau-hieu-suc-manh-thanh-thao-render-trong-revit-2017-1475488301?utm_source=teacher&utm_medium=teacher_sell&utm_campaign=HungPS&utm_content=HungPS.01]

đang được cho là bị sai bởi linh có source = [Affiliate|https://edumall.vn/kien-truc-noi-that/thau-hieu-suc-manh-thanh-thao-render-trong-revit-2017-1475488301?utm_source=Affiliate&utm_campaign=Instructor&utm_content=HungPS.01] và [teacher|https://edumall.vn/kien-truc-noi-that/thau-hieu-suc-manh-thanh-thao-render-trong-revit-2017-1475488301?utm_source=teacher&utm_medium=teacher_sell&utm_campaign=HungPS&utm_content=HungPS.01] là link được tạo bởi GV và đúng luồng thì ghi nhận người bán là GV, nhưng thực tế hệ thống ghi nhận là Topica em gửi lại mã vận đơn: 
4107915: đơn 927k
 
4092754: đơn 229k thanks, [~thaopp7].

Hiện tại 2 giao dịch trên được ghi nhận trên hệ thống BIFROST như sau:

|| Giao dịch || Method || Price || source_url || Seller ||
|  4092754 | gateway | 229000.0 | https://edumall.vn/kien-truc-noi-that/thau-hieu-suc-manh-thanh-thao-render-trong-revit-2017-1475488301?utm_source=teacher&utm_medium=teacher_sell&utm_campaign=HungPS&utm_content=HungPS.01 | teacher |
| 4107915 | gateway | 927000.0 | https://edumall.vn/kien-truc-noi-that/thau-hieu-suc-manh-thanh-thao-render-trong-revit-2017-1475488301?utm_source=Affiliate&utm_campaign=Instructor&utm_content=HungPS.01 | topica | em gửi lại link hướng dẫn: [https://hoptac.edumall.vn/huong-dan-giang-vien-tao-link-tu-ban-khoa-hoc.html] [~nganp], [~thaopp7]: Như trao đổi:
1. Giao dịch *4092754* đã được BIFROST ghi nhận hoàn toàn đúng do *teacher* bán.

2. Giao dịch *4107915* được BIFROST ghi nhận do *topica* bán là đúng theo logic hiện có, do *source_url* (https://edumall.vn/kien-truc-noi-that/thau-hieu-suc-manh-thanh-thao-render-trong-revit-2017-1475488301?utm_source=Affiliate&utm_campaign=Instructor&utm_content=HungPS.01) không có utm_medium=teacher_sell như yêu cầu.

CC: [~tuanlq], [~alec@topica.asia]. [~thaopp7], [~nganp]: Theo logic hiện có của BIFROST, một giao dịch sẽ được coi là do *teacher* bán nếu thỏa mãn 2 điều kiện như sau:

1. *transaction.source* là *edumall-eCommerce-mkt* hoặc *edumall-eCommerce*
Mặc định các giao dịch xuất phát từ eCommerce edumall.vn đều thỏa mãn điều kiện này.

2. *transaction.source_url* phải chứa *utm_source=teacher* hoặc *utm_medium=teacher_sell*
Như vậy, link giới thiệu về khóa học của giao dịch 4107915 {color:red}*không thỏa mãn điều kiện này.*{color}

Các bạn update lại nội dung hướng đẫn trên https://hoptac.edumall.vn/huong-dan-giang-vien-tao-link-tu-ban-khoa-hoc.html cho đúng nhé. Thanks.

CC: [~tuanlq], [~alec@topica.asia], [~khoant2]

Downloaded the app from the Play market, and this course displaying with a discount.
  [~denis.petrov]

Our assumption is the Magento cache is breaking some how this logic. Here is the flow:
 * mobile app is calling java service [https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/magento-mobile-api]
 * this Java service is calling Magento REST API. Here is the list of all endpoint for Mage [https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/magento-mobile-api/blob/master/eco-run/eco-api-middleware/src/main/java/vn/edu/topica/eco/api/middleware/constant/MagentoConst.java]
 * The real base URL example is this: [https://edumall.vn/rest/V2/mobile/categories]

If there is cache enabled for /rest/* route, then please disable it.  *Example:*

Request details:
 * POST [https://magento-staging.edumall.vn/rest/V2/mobile/customer/product-owner|https://magento-staging.edumall.vn//rest/V2/mobile/customer/product-owner?middleware_test=1591600637]
 * HEADERS: Authorization / Bearer rsiqzug3252sh6wperwsy0ekv54pzh65
 * PARAMS: access_token / 5cbef1ba9ec1360985000a581591011492f132

Course details:
 * code: HienNT.01
 * id: 11

User details:
 * id: 5cbef1ba9ec1360985000a58
 * email: [uiza18050423@edumall.vn|mailto:uiza18050423@edumall.vn]
 * phone_number: 0948170098

 

With [~Pavel Pushkarev] we have bought a course() on staging using IOS app but after the successful payment it still was looking unbought.

I checked magento-mobile-api service used by IOS app and found that it made a request(see above) to Magento. magento-mobile-app tried to get bought courses for user(user token is in params section above), but Magento responses with an empty array, that's why course looked unbought in the app.

 

In magento-mobile-api I also found the following related to all Magento links:

[https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/magento-mobile-api/blob/master/eco-run/eco-api-middleware/src/main/java/vn/edu/topica/eco/api/middleware/model/support/config/MagentoConfig.java#L26]

 

Please follow up with this case. Magento is working correctly. After applying new rule, both frontend and api will send old prices until reindexing occurs. Magento re-indexes invalid indexers every minute. Indexing time of catalogrule_rule and catalog_product_price depends on: number of active price rules, rules complexity, number of products, server resources. In local env it takes 2 minute to complete.

So this could happen if magento-mobile-api and/or mobile application requested prices from magento before the new rule was applied or during reindexing, after the new rule was applied. And stored this request in a local cache for some time. [~Yann], [~alec@topica.asia], [~anvt4@topica.edu.vn]

[~kirill] Now you can disable blog links from admin panel. So just go to the Content > Better Blog > Configuration > General
There you can find 2 options:
1. Show Blog Link in Top Menu
2. Show Blog Link in Footer links

Set them as Yes to show blog links or No to disable.
 !screenshot.png|thumbnail! 

There are 2 different footer blocks in magento. One was created in admin panel and the socond in codebase. So the configuration in admin panel just disable it in codebase.
To disable second footer we need to go in admin there Content > Elements > Blocks > Find block with id "footer" and delete there the link for blog.
Please see my screenshots.

[~leonov.rs@gmail.com] [~alec@topica.asia] [~kirill] [~minhnh3@topica.edu.vn] to show the blog as required in this ticket and here https://jira.topica.vn/browse/EVAB-784 (related ticket) Please do the following in Magento Admin:

1. Go to the *Content > Better Blog > Configurations > MAGEPLAZA EXTENSIONS > Better Blog* and set up this:
    1.1 *Display author* as *No*
    1.2 *Date format* as *d/m/Y (19/06/2020)*
    1.3 *Blogs per Page Allowed Values* as *12*
2. On this configuration page open tab *Monthly Archive* and set the field *Enable Monthly Archive* as *No*
3. If you want to get rid of all topics and not to show them, please delete all of them here *Content > Better Blog > Manage Topics* .

See my screenshots to understand better:

Checking the flow of COD and exploring how java e-payment service handles it.  [~saran] [~pornprapa] I found that landing payment service after choosing COD sends requests to
/epayment/cod to java backend e-payment service after a user clicks on Buy button. Need to check whether the status of contactc3 is being changed there or not, or there's an error during that request which should be made. Looking at the code i found that there is a http service that makes that request. Need to debug it Thank you [~azat17].

Is there any CTA for us to help you check? [~saran] thanks. I think i'm going to handle it on my own. I found that an error appears before the request to the contactc3's status. I manage to fix that error then contacts' statuses should work corretly During debugging the request of changing type of contactc3 i found that the request itself works fine. But for some landings there appears an error because ContactLDP becomes null. It happens sometimes during parsing price of courses. But the most funny part of this functionality was that if a user chooses COD payment and clicks on submit button they always would be redirected to cod-v5.html "thank you" page, no matter if the payment was successful or failure and users would think that everything is all right. I now changed that logic in frontend and it shows error page with error messages

!image-2020-06-10-19-37-58-016.png!

 

!image-2020-06-10-19-38-04-892.png! [~azat17]

 I believe when the user click on COD option and submit, they should always get successful message. The reason is the payment four COD option will be confirmed by our Sales team and we just need to collect the customer information. However,I would like to understand more flow your logic. What should be the case that the user will get an error message (for COD option)? Had a call with Saran where we discussed current state of this ticket.

We now always get redirected to Success page right after clicking the submit button. Saran said that the flow of COD is such that users can't get the error page. But i found the despite being redirected to success page under the hood there appears an error in e-payment java service during the creation of LDP(analogue of Contactc3) data. Noticed that it doesn't always happen.  Saran said that marketing team don't rely on LDP data from java e-payment service they rather rely on Minerva's Contactc3. It's strange error but i found quick solution updating contactc3's type after user get's redirected to success page sending requests to Marol directly from JS landing.   The status was changed to c3_cod correctly.

Thank you very much [~azat17] You are welcome! Does that mean that i can close this issue ? [~azat17] Issue closed.

  *Report:*
 # Today I started from production thai admin magento [http://admin.edumall.co.th/admin/admin/] and got online payment url: [https://epayment.edumall.co.th/ecommerce/checkout]
 # From the url I found that it was [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate] service
 # I checked staging thai admin magento and replaced online payment url with the correct one: [http://edumalltl-etl-epayment-gate-web-staging.tsts.edumall.io/ecommerce/checkout]
 # Next, I had to investigate how code works in [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate]
 # I replaced some urls to correct ones and made a little refactor: [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate/merge_requests/257/diffs]
 # Next, I had a call with devops Dmitrii because direct request was failing with 400 error. We discovered that 
 # [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment] and [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate] have very similar namesapces and I was wrong in changing one url. I put the correct url back: [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate/merge_requests/261/diffs]
 # Further on, I had to investigate how [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment] works with Omise provider.
 # I aslo checked all ENV variables for [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment], [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate] and replaced urls for related services with the correct ones
 # Next, I asked developer Azat to provide me an access to Omise dashboard and compared API keys. The keys were correct.
 # I checked Omise dashboard logs and found that no requests came to the service.
 # I added an extra logging to the [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate] and found that request to the /epayment/chargeEcom endpoint for [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment] fails with 500 error.
 # I manually sent the request to the endpoint and found that fetching user from Magento failed.
 # After checking the codebase I found that credentials for Magento were incorrect. I put correct creds and redeployed the service [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/e-payment]. Online payments became operational.
 # I removed extra logging from [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate]: [https://git.edumall.io/edumalltl/etl-epayment-gate/merge_requests/264/diffs]

   Steps to QA:
 # Login to [http://magento-staging.edumall.co.th|http://magento-staging.edumall.co.th/admin]. I used gmail account.
 # Choose any course
 # Choose online payment
 # From the [https://www.omise.co/api-testing] take any card code that suits you best. Only card number makes sense. Cardholder, expiration date, cvv don't matter. Notice, that according to the provided doc some card numbers may return fail result.
 # Submit the form. You should see success result

Component created. Awaiting deployment to test it on staging. I postponed execution of GTM/Freshchat/Insider on our staging. Number of requests on initial page load reduced from 370 to 300 and transfer size from 5.4Mb to 3.2Mb (staging is working in developer mode, so js optimization is not active). GPS score changed from 35 to 48.

  *GTM*: stores -> configuration -> weltpixel -> google analytics enhanced ecommerce -> general configuration -> Google Tag Manager Javascript Code

before: 
{code:java}
<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
<script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-MTJQ4QW');</script>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
{code}
after: 
{code:java}
<!-- Google Tag Manager -->
<script>
require(['Edumall_Common/js/postpone-execution'], function(execution) {
execution.ready(() => {
(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
})(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-MTJQ4QW');
});
});
</script>
<!-- End Google Tag Manager -->
{code}
_(Be careful with GTM-MTJQ4QW, it can be different on staging/production)_

*USERINSIDER*: content -> design -> configuration -> \{choose row without empty cells} -> html head ->  Scripts and Style Sheets

before: 
{code:java}
<script async src="https://edumall.api.useinsider.com/ins.js?id=10002141"></script>
{code}
after: 
{code:java}
<script>
require(['Edumall_Common/js/postpone-execution', 'jquery'], function(execution, $) {
execution.ready(() => {
$.getScript('https://edumall.api.useinsider.com/ins.js?id=10002141');
});
});
</script>
{code}
_(Be careful with [https://edumall.api.useinsider.com/ins.js?id=10002141], it can be different on staging/production)_

*FRESHCHAT*: content -> design -> configuration -> \{choose row without empty cells} -> footer ->  Miscellaneous HTML

before:
{code:java}
<!--Start FreshChat-->
<script src="https://wchat.freshchat.com/js/widget.js"></script>
<script>
window.fcWidget.init({
token: "7d4520b6-f0b2-4146-8187-7f96167e861c",
host: "https://wchat.freshchat.com"
});

if (window.insider_object!=undefined){
// To set email
window.fcWidget.user.setEmail(window.insider_object.user.email);
// To set user name
window.fcWidget.user.setFirstName(window.insider_object.user.surname);
}
</script>
<!--End Freshchat-->
{code}
after:
{code:java}
<!--Start FreshChat-->
<script>
require(['Edumall_Common/js/postpone-execution', 'jquery'], function(execution, $) {
execution.ready(() => {
$.getScript('https://wchat.freshchat.com/js/widget.js', () => {
window.fcWidget.init({
token: "7d4520b6-f0b2-4146-8187-7f96167e861c",
host: "https://wchat.freshchat.com"
});

if (window.insider_object!=undefined) {
// To set email
window.fcWidget.user.setEmail(window.insider_object.user.email);
// To set user name
window.fcWidget.user.setFirstName(window.insider_object.user.surname);
}
});
});
});
</script>
<!--End Freshchat-->
{code}
_(Be careful with token "7d4520b6-f0b2-4146-8187-7f96167e861c", it can be different on staging/production)_
Image optimization from Google Page Speed Optimizer will not work in current project. Images on homepage/category/product/etc are not optimized, because someone turned off *existing* optimization features through admin panel a few days ago. I turned it back on.

Committed all changes. Problems that we had:
- 10 minute timespan generated too much itrations
- because of timezone setting we got all data from mongo 7 hours before needed
- sizes of objects vary too much -  from 20b to several Mb
- a lot of possible solutions were cut off because of server version/driver version/account permissions
- Mongo and PHP documentations are very bad
Тикет создавался на иос, на в росе мы убрали все баджи от Зендеска и теперь там никакой бадже не отображается именно в зендеска, но этаже проблема есть в андроиде, буду разбираться и переименован тикет  на платформу андроида Починила отображение баджей [~Aisa Tashmatova]
Постоянно отображаемый бадж пропал. Но появилась другая проблема:

1. Написать в чат зендеска
2. Получить сообщения от оператора
3. Удалить приложение или почистить его кеш \ данные
4. Открыть приложение, пройти заново регистрацию - отображается опять бадж сообщений, которые ранее были уже прочитаны.
 [^VIDEO-2019-11-01-16-05-52.mp4]  https://pm.maddevs.co/browse/NT-10832?focusedCommentId=66710&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-66710 [Aisalkyn|https://app.slack.com/team/UB42A8YAF]  [4 days ago|https://maddevs.slack.com/archives/GBQBCU58U/p1572603150003100?thread_ts=1572431516.001300&cid=GBQBCU58U]

Постоянно отображаемый бадж пропал. Но появилась другая проблема:

*1. Написать в чат зендеска*
2. Получить сообщения от оператора
3. Удалить приложение или почистить его кеш \ данные
4. Открыть приложение, пройти заново регистрацию - отображается опять бадж сообщений, которые ранее были уже прочитаны.получается вы зашли в Зендеск написали, потом вышли скачали заново? и у вас сали отображаться сообзения с  чата ОКК?
!https://ca.slack-edge.com/T1ZU01GSG-UB42A8YAF-f8adca7eaea7-48!

вы же это на стейжинге делали?

[@Aisalkyn|https://maddevs.slack.com/team/UB42A8YAF] на проде Закрываю тикет, потому что это обычное поведение приложения и баджей от ОКК, так работает приложение с самого начала создания прилы
Предупредить команду заранее что staging.swift.kg будет не доступен  

закоментировать крон , что бы телефонные записи не пытались копировать на отключенные NFS

{noformat}
[Mon Nov 04 16:00:16] root@voip1.swift.kg: /etc/freeswitch
# cat /etc/cron.d/freeswitch_cron  | grep mover
*/1 * * * *   root    /etc/freeswitch/tools/calls_mover.sh
{noformat}


Что бы опен впн работал У менеджеров
ssh infra.swift.kg
nano +29 /etc/init.d/openvpn 
Поменять директорию на /etc/openvpn_back

{noformat}
#CONFIG_DIR=/etc/openvpn_back
CONFIG_DIR=/etc/openvpn
{noformat}

service openvpn restart

После переноса сервера вернуть все в исходное состояние  

и проверить ресурсы 
https://staging.swift.kg/
https://userguide.namba.taxi/
https://namba.taxi/ 
проверить openvpn на infra.swift.kg 
проверить телефонные записи 

так же восстановить раздел docker-shared  Можно написать Малику что подготовилтись к выключению серверов g2 и backup-server (Телеграм Малика daitepiva) 
уточнить дату когда они начнут что бы мы могли сделать вышие описанные действия перед выключением.  
Сервера находятся в 270 vlan, после  включенения убедиться что они доступны для нас и проверить работа способность как выше описано
I explored the possibility of using php-fpm as server backends for php.
The problem is php-fpm processes only php files, for distributing statics you will have to run the nginx container and forward the volume, or copy the statics to the nginx container.

We decided to make a choice on apache.
The new version of debian: buster cannot be used, since it does not have php7.0 support
I took the php: 7.0-apache-stretch image as a basis, assembled the container launched, there was a problem, links are not available. I need to figure this out. Two new variables are added, they need to be copied to the .env file
APACHE_SERVERADMIN=mail@mail
APACHE_SERVERNAME=[local.slate.lumici.co.uk|http://local.slate.lumici.co.uk]

To start the project, you need to rebuild the api container

docker-compose down --remove-orphans
docker-compose up -d --build remove env variable 

APACHE_SERVERADMIN=mail@mail
APACHE_SERVERNAME=[local.slate.lumici.co.uk|http://local.slate.lumici.co.uk/]

 Could you please, put here how to run task manually and how to add them to the crontab for a docker host?
I'll investigate the issue. Connect to server


{code:java}
ssh ec2-user@52.56.186.127
{code}

Login to root

{code:java}
sudo -i
{code}


Create file


{code:java}
nano /etc/cron.d/backend_crons
{code}


Add this tasks to file backend_crons



{code:java}
*/5 * * * * root docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.search_providers'" >> /var/log/backend/search_providers_cron.log

0 23 * * * root docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Provider.remind_to_review'" >> /var/log/backend/remind_to_review.log

0 0 * * * root docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.remind_to_review_job(7)'" >> /var/log/backend/remind_to_review_job-7.log 

0 11 * * * root docker exec -i backend sh -l -c  "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.remind_to_review_job(3)'" >> /var/log/backend/remind_to_review_job-3.log 

0 10 * * * root docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.remind_to_review_job(1)'" >> /var/log/backend/remind_to_review_job-1.log

{code}


Change permissions 


{code:java}
chmod 0600 /etc/cron.d/backend_crons
{code}



Run tasks manually 


{code:java}
docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.search_providers'"
{code}



{code:java}
docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Provider.remind_to_review'"

{code}


{code:java}
docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.remind_to_review_job(7)'"

{code}


{code:java}
docker exec -i backend sh -l -c  "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.remind_to_review_job(3)'"

{code}


{code:java}
docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.remind_to_review_job(1)'"
{code}
 0 9 * * * root docker exec -i backend sh -l -c "bundle exec rails runner -e production 'Job.job_completion_deadlined'" >> /var/log/backend/job_completion_deadlined.log

!Screenshot at 2020-05-01 15-49-48.png! Magento staging and general changes.

https://magento-staging.edumall.vn/

1. Fixed the staging deploy, reworked pipilene. 
2. Removed the CRON instance, now the cron tasks is running on ADMIN instance. 
3. Added a rule for /sitemap.xml, when requesting sitemap get to the ADMIN instance , this is need this to ensure that when generating a new sitemap file was available from a single instance - ADMIN. 
4. Now when building changes Radik are available immediately. 
5. Made IAM role to the describe ec2 instance.
6. Updated the ssh keys in the base image. 
7. Made a script to get IP for staging instances
8. Added Radik to the staging bastion. 
9. Turned on the CDN, images started loading faster.
10. Understood with Radik why changes in the admin panel are not available.

New production
https://newprod.edumall.vn/
1. Created redis for new production 
2. Created a temporary base for production from the snapshot for May 2.
3. Created a temporary Elastic Search
4. I've prepared the pipeline for the production deploy
5. Prepared a new packer config for production. 
6. Changed variables in packer-json, added variables in Gitlab-ci.
7. Updated ASG. 
8. Created LA, TG and rules to redirect from http to https, sitemap and admin.
9. Created a bastion to the new production
10. Created gitla-runner for production, set up a gitlab-runner, installed composer, php7.2 and a bunch of packages, patch, jq, added a key for repository. 
11. Changed the current prod branch to prod_old 
Deploy for production will be from this branch. 
12. Directed the domain newprod.edumall.vn to the production LA
13. Fixed it up and deployed a new production. 
14. Created a user to check the admin panel
15. Turned on the CDN.

What must be done is mandatory and as soon as possible. 
1. Write a plan to migration old production to new production
2. Figure out why the error in the logs
[2020-05-03 17:04:39] main.CRITICAL: The contents from the "/srv []
2. Need to remove two more disks from the base image.
3. Figure out how to deregister old AMI, but leave the last two commits. 
4. Figure out how to remove snapshots, but leave the last two commits. 
5. Find a way to remove LC, but leave the last two commits. 
6. Write documentation on deploy, flow and so on. Lms staging: [https://lms-staging.edumall.vn|https://lms-staging.edumall.vn/]
Thresh production: [http://thresh.edumall.io|http://thresh.edumall.io/]
Amun staging: [http://backend-amun-web-staging.tsts.edumall.io|http://backend-amun-web-staging.tsts.edumall.io/]
P/s: To find out domain of system you can follow these methods:
- Find it in Cloudflare with [edumall.vn|http://edumall.vn/] or [edumall.io|http://edumall.io/]
- Check in CI/CD pipeline, you click on production or staging step and see something like this:
NOTES:
1. Get the application URL by running this command (DO NOT use this URL for Production environment):
 [http://backend-amun-web-staging.tsts.edumall.io|http://backend-amun-web-staging.tsts.edumall.io/]

I installed an open source APM solution on the server for testing.
 It's a good thing the services use docker, deploy the service is no problem. 
 But debugging and configuration is a complicated process. 
 2. There are problems when trying to install an agent. 
 [https://github.com/naver/pinpoint-c-agent].
 php module cannot be built because of the different versions of gcc, debugging this is quite complicated. 
 3. The Pinpoint service is very complex to set up and maintain and will take a long time to maintain.

4. It can be set up, but it takes time that we don't have right now. 

 

Alternative solutions SaaS 
 1. Newrelic
 2. Datadog

 
 # The service provides a ready-made solution for APM
 2. Setting up agents is not a problem. 
 3. Enough useful metrics to debug magento, for example 

!Screenshot at 2020-05-13 19-16-46.png!

2 Datadog

1. The service provides a ready-made solution for APM 

2. Setting up agents is not a problem. 
 Price ~ 160$ for three production host use APM 

!Screenshot at 2020-05-13 19-28-45.png!

 

*Result*
 *The cost of essential version services newrelic only for the production magento ~ 562 $*
 *Datadog cost only for APM ~ $100. (APM per host $31)*

 
 # A little hack to use new relic and not paying huge bills. 
2. Sign up for a hack, add a card, create a single dino application, and add a new relic APM adon. We can purchase a Drake license and connect our 6 servers to the Drake and it is sold for $99 per month. 
This way we get great savings.

And we have a great tool at hand to monitor and detect problems.

The only downside is the transition to a new relic from heroky...

 

  I think we need to consider the staging too, so we need x2 of the price.

[~khalezin.d] please add account for email [developer@topica.edu.vn.|mailto:developer@topica.edu.vn.] This account will process payment [~ducla5]
1. Sign up for heroku 
https://signup.heroku.com/login
2. Create a new application 
https://dashboard.heroku.com/new-app 
You can create a free app
3. Add your card for payments
https://dashboard.heroku.com/account/billing
4. Add newrelic extension
https://elements.heroku.com/addons/newrelic
5. Choose an Add-on plan
Drake - $99
Specify the name of your application that you created in step 2
6. Add me to access the https://dashboard.heroku.com/apps/APP-NAME/access application. [~ducla5] oh, sorry. better you create a new one and add [~khalezin.d] there, he will integrate it.  [https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/accounts/accounts/subscription-pricing/account-pricing-billing-options]

CUs are calculated as follows:
!https://docs.newrelic.com/sites/default/files/thumbnails/image/Accounts_CU-calculation_0.png|width=483,height=73!
The maximum size of a given host (CPUs + GB RAM) is capped at 16.
 
We use t3.2xlarge 8 vCPU - 32 gb RAM for web instance 
We use t3.xlarge 4vCPU - 16 gb RAM for cron instance

Hello. 
 We want to use your service. 
 We want to use Infrastructure, log management and APM. 
 We use autoscaling from AWS, two instances are constantly running, but sometimes the number of instances grows to 4 or more, the lifetime of such instances is 30 minutes to several hours.

Could you please tell us how the cost of the service will be considered in this case? 
 As far as I understand, the cost is not counted by hours ?

For example, we have two instances for which the following services are included 
 Infrastructure - 18 x 2 = 36 $/month
 Log Management - 1.91 × 2 = 3.82$/month
 APM - $36 x 2 = 72$/month
 Total: ~ 111.82$

But if the number of instances temporarily increases from 2 to 4, how will this affect the monthly cost? 
 Thank you so much for your help.
Please take a look. [~khalezin.d]

Here's our assumption at the moment. 

Looks like there is no access from LMS to the DB:

{code:java}
telnet sgdbsector63.edumall.vn 27017
Trying 139.59.102.30...
^C
{code}

If you check the logs, you can see the information about the blocking: 

{code:java}
May 31 06:35:50 sgdbsector63 kernel: [69311094.258068] [UFW BLOCK] IN=eth0 OUT= MAC=a2:7c:8b:39:e0:4c:84:c1:c1:81:09:30:08:00 SRC=178.128.84.62 DST=139.59.102.30 LEN=60 TOS=0x00 PREC=0x00 TTL=61 ID=63444 DF PROTO=TCP SPT=60193 DPT=27017 WINDOW=29200 RES=0x00 SYN URGP=0
{code}

And when we allowed the access:

{code:java}
ufw allow from 178.128.84.62

telnet sgdbsector63.edumall.vn 27017
Trying 139.59.102.30...
Connected to sgdbsector63.edumall.vn.
Escape character is '^]'.
^C^C
{code}

But it is helping after all, so we continue to investigate.
 Checked all sidekiq workers whether they consume too much resources or not. Sidekiq was fine and we didn't notice huge memory consumption by it. We checked unicorn server and its configs. During the timeout we didn't see that unicorn consumes too much memory however it wasn't giving a response so afterwards we decided to increase the number of unicorn workers to 9 and reduced the request timeout speed from 600 sec to 30 sec. It helped now. If this issue happens again we're going to increase the number of unicorn workers and see how it affects the memory and plan our next steps 
  
   confirm.

When this problem happens, we don't see any highload problems on instance.

We need to monitor it until the end of today.

If we can not find the root cause, we need to increase the number of instance for this service to avoid bad user's experience. [~ducla5] yeah, right. I hope we find the root. It couldn't have appeared from nothing because it used to be ok in previous weeks

Проблему с прячущимся календарем я решал, видимо не загрузили этот билд на стейджинг еще. 
А вообще, [~alex_say], перед подобной проверкой желательно попросить Кирилла, чтобы он загрузил последний билд. 
Иначе возможны лишние движения. Отлично. Связался с Кириллом, попросил загрузить последний билд на стейджинг. Как загрузит, посмотрю еще раз. [~tamara] [~deceptikon] Действительно, проблема с прячущимся календарем решена в новой версии билда. Теперь остается поправить багу в мобильной версии. исследовал имеющиеся средства на этот случай.
Как выяснилось, средства перекраски картинок крайне ограничены и поддерживаются далеко не повсеместно.
[https://caniuse.com/#search=mask-image]
[https://caniuse.com/#search=fill]
[https://caniuse.com/#search=hue-rotate]

Это три способа, которыми мы можем покрасить свг-шку, при этом, чтобы использовать fill, нам надо несколько переделать верстку, а это нежелательная трата времени. 
С остальными способами все быстрее.

Если поддержка перекрашивания в IE некритична, можно сделать эту задачу. Иначе - хз.

Take into account a case when we delete a conversation component from the canvas but it still persists in the template comments component.

Sentry cli files uploading:
https://docs.sentry.io/cli/releases/#upload-files

Source maps are being uploaded through sentry cli with the following command:
node ./tools/generateBuild.js
It generates new build number and calls sentry cli command  Useful links:
https://npm.taobao.org/package/@plrthink/webpack-sentry-plugin
https://medium.com/@msuixo/configure-sentry-for-vue-js-project-6aa07efe2c80
https://docs.sentry.io/clients/javascript/sourcemaps/
https://docs.sentry.io/platforms/javascript/sourcemaps/generation/
https://docs.sentry.io/platforms/javascript/sourcemaps/availability/ The only thing that is left is to configure sentry server or nginx proxy to allow uploading files of a bigger size. Once the whole bundle uploads, source maps should work out of the box.

Currently, slate.js bundle does not upload with the “response status: 413“ error. I have spoken with Marat regarding it. Have discussed the remaining work to be done with Marat. Have created a ticket for him, https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-991. Will continue the ticket after Marat will prepare fixes on his end. After Marat has added config to the CI/CD setup, have updated metadata. Now, every new metadata will be uploaded to sentry server on production build. Closing this ticket.

[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] FYI
[~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c] можно тестить решение на [https://dev.teacherly.io/teacher|https://dev.teacherly.io/teacher]
New params in env:

*AWS_ENDPOINT*
Domain with a subdomain. Used to upload files to AWS. 
After file upload, this parameter will be used to search and clean final URL received from AWS.

Example of param in env file:
{code:java}
AWS_ENDPOINT=https://s3.amazonaws.com
{code}

----

*STATIC_URL*
The value used to get file URL. If not set the next scheme will be used: 
{code:java}
AWS_ENDPOINT .  S3_BUCKET . $asset_path_from_db
{code}

Example of param in env file:
{code:java}
STATIC_URL=https://s3.amazonaws.com/dev-server-resources
{code}

[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c]  есть различия в логике:



в HR когла меняешь аватар, запрос сразу срабатывает. Фронт обращается на бэк за Presign url, получает урлы, и идет на AWS, сохраняет там картинку и шлет запрос на сохранение ассета на бэк 



в Тичерской → когда меняешь аватарку, запрос не идет, различие в том, что тут бэк работает с AWS. Фронт отсылает файл на бэк только после нажатия на кнопку Save(), там уже бэк сам работает с AWS  


Если надо чтобы в тичерской работало также как в HR(по хорошему надо\!\!\!), давайте планировать, работы фронта тоже есть. 



А так все синкается без проблем, проверила прод, стэйджинг, локально  On the sync decided to improve User avatar upload logic, created issue [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-4466|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-4466|smart-link] [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] 
Checked sync of subjects and curriculums between Teacher and Hr dashboards, sync works. Checked on staging and production. 

Checked Assign subjects logic in Teacher Admin, logic works differently from Teacher and HR: 

* subjects that were assigned in Teacher Admin, stores in *subjects_teachers_join* table 
* subjects that were assigned/checked as Preferred Subjects in Teacher&HR User profile page are stored in the *user's* table in the data field

I have a question about registered users. Do we consider registered users as those who have registered on the page [https://teacherly.io/signup|https://teacherly.io/signup]  or all users who have themselves registered and have registered teacher-admin accounts?

----

We can track login users (and registered users, which register on [https://teacherly.io/signup|https://teacherly.io/signup] page) with Google Analitycs.  To do it, we should set the targets by pressing the buttons.

Pros: 

# GA already integrated

Cons: 

# Third-party system
# We can’t track logged in users (yesterday teacher filled out the form and authorized today and today he just opened the site and was already authorized).

----

Dashboard in the super-admin panel with daily notifications in slack (or e-mail). Or count in the backend login and send daily-report in slack (or e-mail).

Pros:

# Notifications
# Familiar interface
# Ability to build data analysis with charts

Cons:

# Need to develop frontend and backend parts for the tool;

For example [https://forums.phpfreaks.com/topic/130624-solved-php-session-or-mysql-users-online-count-and-users-viewing-page-list/|https://forums.phpfreaks.com/topic/130624-solved-php-session-or-mysql-users-online-count-and-users-viewing-page-list/]

[https://www.sitepoint.com/real-time-apps-laravel-5-1-event-broadcasting/|https://www.sitepoint.com/real-time-apps-laravel-5-1-event-broadcasting/]

----

ELK stack to parse access logs and build graphs in Kibana.

[https://www.elastic.co/what-is/elk-stack|https://www.elastic.co/what-is/elk-stack]

Pros:

# Ready stack to be installed and set up

Cons:

# Additional infrastructure to be maintained.

[~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c] на бекенде оптимизировал сортировку фаз и секций при их перемещении. Теперь значительно меньше запросов в базу данных происходит.

Проверил наличие лагов на стейжинге - не обнаружил.

Но есть два момента, на которые обратил внимание:

* Создается пустой слайд при перемещении фазы из секции в секцию
* Перед тем как перетащить фазу, нужно ее зажать.

Показал это в луме  - [https://www.loom.com/share/3f9af28007f64433aabba3f21bf3ecf2|https://www.loom.com/share/3f9af28007f64433aabba3f21bf3ecf2]

ОК ли эти моменты, если нет, то нужно создать задачи на фронтенд разработчиков. [~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c] , ping ☝️  [~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c] 

Пустой слайд - особенности работы drag-n-drop, но возможно порешать думаю

Перед тем как перетащить фазу нужно ее зажать - это обязательное условие, поскольку иначе не будет работать перетаскивание и скролл на тач-девайсах. Ивенты работают так: двигаем пальцем - скролл, зажали на 150мс - слайд взялся и пошло перемещение. Я долго разбирался как это можно сделать лучше и то, что сейчас - наиболее оптимальный вариант We decided to remove delay. [~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6] made a demo to me. Everything is working as expected

[~Madina] поправила заголовок, чтобы было понятнее. Нужно подредактировать описание, лучше его начать с глагола, а затем уже описывать, какие страницы это затрагивает и как должен работать фнукционал. Желательно еще добавить, зачем этот функционал нужен. 
Часть функционала данной задачи, а именно обращения к апи, реализованы в рамках задачи EL-461, код пока в ветке EL-452_payments_api, смержим, как решатся вопросы с апи
Добавил скринкаст с попыткой ввода заблокированной суммы при привязке карты. После 3х неудачных попыток ввода суммы, карта должна быть удалена из списка, а она не удаляется. Я могу вводить сумму сколько угодно раз. Если будут дополнительные вопросы по багу, пишите. [~galaxxif]

В некоторых случаях при неуспешной транзакции отсутствует описание платежа ( не всегда ). Такое поведение обусловлено возвращением API пустых полей service_title и account_no, при помощи которых мы формируем описание платежа. Возможно, в таких ситуациях приходит другое поле, которое нужно отображать. Спрошу у Кирилла.

Golang Client Library - [https://pkg.go.dev/google.golang.org/api/classroom/v1?tab=doc|https://pkg.go.dev/google.golang.org/api/classroom/v1?tab=doc]

I am curious on how to properly make authorized API requests to Google.

So they have {{option}} package which we can use to configure our client to authorize via Credentials [https://pkg.go.dev/google.golang.org/api/option?tab=doc#WithCredentials|https://pkg.go.dev/google.golang.org/api/option?tab=doc#WithCredentials] 

Credentials we will get from Auth Code from Teacherly Web Site request.

[~accountid:5cee2d23919eaf0f2135ac64] , correct me if I am wrong 
Can’t reproduce bug on local latest production branch.
Need confirmation from staging, mb bug was fixed via another work flow (i can’t reproduce on staging too). Tried to reproduce on staging but faced problem with not beeing able to share created lesson - [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-7587|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-7587|smart-link]  Couldn’t reproduce localy and on staging. Also checked by writing feature test. Probably it was already fixed. [https://www.loom.com/share/f5d54e6df5214cb68028714199bb4978|https://www.loom.com/share/f5d54e6df5214cb68028714199bb4978] [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] надо тянуть зашаренные уроки учителя со всех орг, верно?  [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] yes.

Issues fixed. Thank you.
We don’t need actually Google SSO, we need to figure out how to sign-in  through google account from GSuite. Need to add G Suite domain entity to organization.

When we need to integrate [google sign-in|https://developers.google.com/identity/sign-in/web/backend-auth] for teachers ([https://slate.teacherly.io/teacher/login|https://slate.teacherly.io/teacher/login])

In sign-in process gets the user [hosted domain|https://developers.google.com/identity/sign-in/web/reference#googleusergethosteddomain] and if we have organization with such domain we auto add new teacher account with Name, Family Name and mail to it. In otherwise respond with meaningful error message. Access to Classroom API enabled by default for all teachers.

[https://support.google.com/edu/classroom/answer/6250906|https://support.google.com/edu/classroom/answer/6250906] Oauth2 scoops for Classrooms API [https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/oauth2/scopes#classroom|https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/oauth2/scopes#classroom] In existing backend we have to implement [Google Sign-In|https://developers.google.com/identity/#google-sign-in]. Basic profile information is not enough, so in {{scope}} parameter we need to specify desired scopes of Classroom API. 

Google Classroom API has [list of scopes|https://developers.google.com/classroom/guides/auth] with different levels of usage, that can require extra verification process. 

Need to figure out how to properly implement further requests to API from our service. This [video|https://youtu.be/zZt8SFivjps] explains how authorization process works. 

So we need to:

# Get permissions (scopes) on Teacherly web site and retrieve Auth Code from Google
# Send it to new service with a request to import classroom data
# In new service we have to exchange Auth Code to Credentials from Google
# Make API requests with these credentials.

Also Google recommends:

* to grant user with each scopes separately when these scopes are needed, not directly after authentification.
* to store credentials after each API requests

On Teacherly web site side after authentification we have to validate Audience and Issuer parameters from obtained ID token.

1 сделал путем, того что на viewdidload мы проверяем и загружаем из кеша список (т.к. в это время экран создан и еще не показан и только собирается показаться, и при показе сразу список будет готов без показа лоадера), и потом на viewdidappear когда экран уже открылся и список все равно пуст, то идет запрос на получение списка.

2 лоадер на центре экрана появляется когда список пуст. но когда тянем вниз то выходит только из верха который. Т.к. если сейчас переделывать все на 1 лоадер который вверху то уйдет куча времени на переделку.

Тикет взял на себя Саша.
1. Зачем добавлять это поле ?
2. Куда добавлять это поле ?
3. Какую проблему решит добавление этого поля?

[~turtemirova.zhanyl] Добавь пожалуйста описания и контекста для данной задачи Обновил документацию https://pm.maddevs.co/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=43122906

Добавил данное поле в https://gitlab.com/microphotographer/api/commit/169f8cf6ed1cb903d450fc4437ae9e2a196a14d5
Смена и сброс пароля это разная логика. 
Судя по скриншоту ты запросила именно смену пароля (т.е. ввела новый). Потому и нет ссылки.
Что-бы получить письмо с ссылкой надо запросить сброс пароля.
С локальной машины письма в 90% случаев будут приходить в спам т.к. почта отправителя не является авторизованной для гугла.

Добавил проверки на состояние activity. Краш возникал из-за того что activity на которого был прикреплен fragment больше не был заним. Но в каком из потоков вызывался showSimpleAlert. И во время отсоединение fragment-а от activity вызывался метод showSimpleAlert в котором не было проверок на состояние activity из-за этого происходит краш. docker run -d --name gitlab-runner-android-client --restart always  --privileged -v /srv/gitlab-runner/config:/etc/gitlab-runner   -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock   gitlab/gitlab-runner:latest

root@gitlab-runner:~# cat /srv/gitlab-runner/config/config.toml
[[runners]]
  name = "Shared runner for buildindg android sdk for client"
  url = "https://gitlab.com/"
  token = "****"
  executor = "docker"
  [runners.custom_build_dir]
  [runners.docker]
    tls_verify = false
    image = "docker-dind"
    privileged = true
    disable_entrypoint_overwrite = false
    oom_kill_disable = false
    disable_cache = false
    volumes = ["/cache"]
    shm_size = 0
  [runners.cache]
    [runners.cache.s3]
    [runners.cache.gcs]
{code}

-
-
Довольно долго думал над данной проблемой так как действильно было не понятно "как это так баланс не обновляется"

Причем данная проблема проявлялась постоянно иногда чаще иногда реже иногда мы о ней вовсе не знали так как операторы это замалчивали.

h2. *Контекст:* 

у каждой модели Django ORM есть метод который позволяет сохранить изменения модели в базу данных `.save()`, данный метод просто берет всю модель со всеми ее полями просто берет и сохраняет в бд и не важно обновилось одно поле или же все в любом случае будут сохранены *ВСЕ* поля за исключением если не был явно указан параметр `update_fields` указав который можно контролировать какие поля будут сохранены в бд а какие нет.

h2. *Проблема*

Во время любого изменения модели DriverProfile в большинстве случаев при сохранении вызывается `.save()` без параметра  `update_fields` что в итоге и вызывает проблему не обновленного баланса водителя.


 МР https://gitlab.com/TaxiNamba/taxi-dashboard/merge_requests/625 В master 
-

 > В итоге вопрос, у нас всегда работает один минио, это нормально ?

Нет это не нормально) Ведать когда добавляли минио у него не был тогда кластерезеции и тогда никто не стал париться что бы самим синкать данных минио

Так же у нас настолько старый образ минио что его нет даже на докер хабе

> Раздел docker-shared нужен ?

Если он исользуется только для минио то можно сказать что он нуже) Ведь так? или я ошибаюсь Поговорил с Бутей он говорит что у новых версий минио появилась кластерезация и тогда надо как растаки поднять кластер из минио что бы не возникало проблем  > Нет это не нормально) Ведать когда добавляли минио у него не был тогда кластерезеции и тогда никто не стал париться что бы самим синкать данных минио 

Ага и придумали общий раздел в котором должны были хранится данные, а при необходимости переключать. 

> Если он исользуется только для минио то можно сказать что он нуже) Ведь так? или я ошибаюсь
Он вообще не используется. Задачу закрываю по причине чистки бэклога от залежавшихся задач
it's already fixed by the base64 files

Null pointer exception in headerScript.phtml should no longer appear.
Uploading occurs through the 3rd party extension. Configuration path 
{noformat}
stores - config - THAI'S EXTENSIONS - S3{noformat}
This happens every time admin adds a media file in category/block/page/etc.

  {noformat}
File: Thai\S3\Model\MediaStorage\File\Storage\S3.php
Methods: saveFile/copyFile/renameFile/etc
{noformat}
 
 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!  this is request [~denis.petrov]

 [^postman_collection.json]   !screenshot-2.png|thumbnail!  Magento is working fine and I can't reproduce this issue in local environment, however I was able to reproduce it on our staging. How it works:
 # push from kelly
 # product saved in magento
 # after 1 minute indexing occurs
 # after indexing cache will be cleared (if needed)

Normally there is no need to clean cache manually, as this will happen in step №4, but we are currently using multiple instances. So step №3 and №4 happens on instance #2, while magento works on instance #1. Cache is cleared on instance #2 and we don't see new product in catalog until admin manually refreshes the cache on instance #1.

As a temporary solution I changed index mode to "update on save" on production. It means that indexing will happen "on the fly" on the instance #1, after push from kelly, and admin doesn't need to clear cache manually. dear [~denis.petrov]. I think we need define a long-term solution for this issue:
_ What happend if i published 100 or more course in a day =>  System still can index and show course on edumall.vn.
_ Changed index mode to "update on save" on production have make any problem with another feature? [~tungtt5],
 1. 100 courses in a day is not a problem for current magento, even with "update on save".
 2. "update on save" is what you originally had. We changed it to "update on schedule" a few weeks ago for optimization purposes, but now I see we need to do some changes in infrastructure to make it work as it should. Speaking about problems, "update on save" is totally fine, unless you have huge catalog with dozens of content managers who constantly change something through admin panel/api (which is not our case right now). So, we can live with "update on save" for now, and should return to it later, when infrastructure will be ready.
 3. try to push new course on production, to confirm it works.

Фидбек обработали, служба передана
Добавил в docker-compose.yml 
В node-exporter

{code:java}
- --collector.textfile.directory
- "/opt/docker/prometheus-node/textfile_collector"
{code}

Добавил volume

{code:java}
- /opt/docker/prometheus-node/textfile_collector:/opt/docker/prometheus-node/textfile_collector

{code}

Сделал скрипт, для проверки раз в 10 секунд:


{code:java}
#!/bin/bash
i=0

while [ \$i -lt 5 ]; do
  ss -ln | grep 8080 | awk  '{print "ss_ln_check_connection " \$3}' > /opt/docker/prometheus-node/textfile_collector/connection_check.prom
  sleep 10
  i=\$(( i + 1 ))
done
{code}

Добавил задание в cron

{code:java}
* * * * * root /opt/connection_check.sh
{code}


 Сделал скрипт для добавления:

{code:java}
#!/bin/bash

mkdir -p /opt/docker/prometheus-node/textfile_collector

cat <<EOF > /opt/connection_check.sh
#!/bin/bash
i=0

while [ \$i -lt 5 ]; do
  ss -ln | grep 8080 | awk  '{print "ss_ln_check_connection " \$3}' > /opt/docker/prometheus-node/textfile_collector/connection_check.prom
  sleep 10
  i=\$(( i + 1 ))
done
EOF

chmod 0755 /opt/connection_check.sh

cat <<EOF > /etc/cron.d/connection_check
* * * * * root /opt/connection_check.sh
EOF

{code}

VPN для сервисов nambataxi расположен на сервере infra.swift.kg. 

Для создание нового конфигурационного файла с сертификатами для пользователя требуется сделать следующее:

1. Подключитесь по SSH:

```
ssh user@infra.swift.kg
```

2. Переключитесь на пользователя root:

```
sudo -i
``` 
3. Перейдите в каталог /etc/openvpn:`

```
cd /etc/openvpn/ 
```
4. Для создание нового конфигурационного файла для пользователя сделайте следующее:

```
bash gen_cert.vpn user_name
```
5. Скопируйте конфигурационный файл в свой каталог для скачивания с сервера, так: 
```
cp /etc/openvpn/clients_vpns/user_name.ovpn /home/user_name/
```
6. Скачать конфигурационный файл с сервера можно утилитой rsync:
```
rsync -zavP user@infra.swift.kg:/etc/openvpn/clients_vpns/user_name.ovpn
```
7. Не зыбываем удалить из своего домашнего каталога скопированный конфигурационный файл. 
```
rm /home/user_name/user_name.ovpn
```

Отзыв клиентских сертификатов. 

1. Подключитесь по SSH:

```
ssh user@infra.swift.kg
```

2. Переключитесь на пользователя root:

```
sudo -i
``` 
3. Перейдите в каталог /etc/openvpn:`

```
cd /etc/openvpn/ 
```
4. Отзыв сертификата:
```
bash revoke_cert.sh user_name
```
Созвонился с Маратом насчет симкарт. 
В итоге с Ксенией проверили. Симкарты были перепутаны местами. 
Изменили слот для рабочей симки, поместили ее в 32.
{code:java}
<action application="bridge" data="{absolute_codec_string=PCMA, line=0701976707}sofia/gateway/nt32/*320${3}0$4" />
{code}

Симка 0701976706 - не работает вообще. На телефоне также. 
{code:java}
 <!-- <action application="bridge" data="{absolute_codec_string=PCMA, line=0701976706}sofia/gateway/nt31/*310${3}0$4" />-->
{code}


С этой симкой 0701976705 - на телефоне авторизуется, но в GoIP не работает, ее также на замену. 

{code:java}
 <!-- <action application="bridge" data="{absolute_codec_string=PCMA, line=0701976705}sofia/gateway/nt30/*300${3}0$4" />-->
{code}

    2019121801; serial

Если в операторской перестал регистрироваться sip виджет (нет надписи "Зарегистрирован")
1. Войти на сервер voip1.swift.kg (Важно подключаться по внутреннему IP)

{code:java}
ssh 10.7.0.111
{code}


2. Открыть *fs_cli*

{code:java}
fs_cli 
{code}


3. Установить уровень логирования 7 

{code:java}
/log 7
{code}


4. Помониторить логи (выйти из *fs_cli* командой *ctrl d*)
Если обнаружены "Красные записи" с содержимым:

{code:java}
```2019-12-26 18:19:30.681926 [ERR] switch_core_sqldb.c:587 NATIVE SQL ERR [database disk image is malformed]
delete from sip_registrations where expires > 0 and expires <= 1577362770 and hostname='voip1'```
{code}


Значит побились внутренние БД фрисвича, нужно сделать следующее: 

5. Остановить freeswith (При остановке keepalived переключит выделенный IP на voip2 )


{code:java}
systemctl stop freeswitch
{code}


6. Удалить все БД


{code:java}
rm -rf /var/lib/freeswitch/db/*
{code}


7. Запускаем freeswitch 


{code:java}
systemctl start freeswitch

{code}

8. Проверяем создались ли БД, если их нет, проверяем логи freeswith. 


{code:java}
ls -lah /var/lib/freeswitch/db/
{code}


9. Если БД создались, подключаемся к  voip2 


{code:java}
ssh 10.7.0.112

{code}

10. Останавливаем keepalived 


{code:java}
ssh service keepalived stop
{code}


11. Проверяем наличие IP на voip1, IP появится на сразу, после остановки keepalived на секунд 20

{code:java}
ip a | grep 212.42.122.203
    inet 212.42.122.203/28 scope global eth0:tw1-MASTER
{code}



12. Если IP в течении 30 секунд  1 минуты не появился. На voip1 перезапускаем keepalived 


{code:java}
systemctl restart keepalived
{code}


13. Если IP есть, проверяем работу телефонии в операторской, если проблема сохраняется проверяем логи freeswith и ищем проблему.

я пушнул подготовленные  dockerfile в ветку digital-dashbpoard. В Jira Cloud я не нашел тебя, создай задачу для себя пожалуйста. Будут вопросы пиши
А вот шаги как я запускаю контейнеры:
Необходимо на стэйджинге развернуть два контейнера *(первый nginx, второй nodejs сервер).
Шаги как я собираю и запускаю контейнеры

# Все изменения лежат в папке {{digital-passport}}. Необходимо билдить и собирать только в этой ветке
# Сначала собираем и запускаем контейнер с nodejs сервисом. Он служит нам как Фэйк АПИ:

* $ cd fake-api
* $ docker build -t dashboard-fake-api .
* $ docker run --rm -p 3070:3000 dashboard-fake-api
По умолчанию экспоузится 3000 порт, для мира открыл 3070 (он буде нужен для контейнера с nginx)

# Собираем и запускаем контейнер с nginx

* $ cd resources/assets/hr-dashboard
* docker build --build-arg REACT_APP_BASE_API_URL=[http://localhost:3070|http://localhost:3070] -t hr-dashboard .
* docker run --rm p 8080:80 hr-dashboard
Сайт доступен по адресу {{<http://localhost:8080/}}>
В nginx (hr-dashboard) контейнере переменная REACT_APP_BASE_API_URL должна ссылаться на контейнер с nodejs (dashboard-fake-api) (edited)

# Тичерли пайплан - для digital
@Dmitrii Khalezin появилось новое приложение students, процесс поднятия такой же как и hr. только поддмен для него лучше new-students сделать.
Также нужно будет переменные для hr и студентов поправить.
теперь для hr
REACT_APP_BASE_API_URL=[https://fake-api.staging.teacherly.io/hr|https://fake-api.staging.teacherly.io/hr]
и для students
REACT_APP_BASE_API_URL=[https://fake-api.staging.teacherly.io/students|https://fake-api.staging.teacherly.io/students]

This parameters should be omitted:

{noformat}    {
      name  = "character_set_client"
      value = "utf8"
    },
    {
      name  = "character_set_server"
      value = "utf8"
    }
{noformat}

This parameter should be added ([https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/server-system-variables.html#sysvar_default_authentication_plugin|https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/8.0/en/server-system-variables.html#sysvar_default_authentication_plugin])

{noformat}default_authentication_plugin=mysql_native_password{noformat} Also I waiting from you to sync TF settings  for dev environment only. Because we need to test it before upgrade mysql in staging and production. We do not need to set default_authentication_plugin=mysql_native_password, the option is copied from the default template.

{{NoteDefault parameter groups are automatically created from a default parameter template when you create a DB instance for a particular DB engine and version. These default parameter groups contain preferred parameter settings and can't be modified. When you create a custom parameter group, you can modify parameter settings.}}

if Dockerfile have flags 

{code:java}
ARG BUNDLE_ENV="--without development test"
{code}

Need to fix dependenses in gemfile or use flag --without test

{code:java}
group :development do
  gem 'listen', '>= 3.0.5', '< 3.2'
  gem 'rubocop'
  gem 'spring'
  gem 'spring-watcher-listen', '~> 2.0.0'
  gem 'web-console', '>= 3.3.0'
end
{code}



{code:java}
#!/usr/bin/env bash

#SSH username
CONN_USER=ec2-user
#SSH hostname
HOSTNAME=52.56.186.127
#DUMP_NAME
DUMP_FILE=SH-dump-$(date +%m-%d-%Y).sql


create_dump() {
	local DB_USER=$(docker exec backend env | grep POSTGRES_USER | cut -d '=' -f 2)
	local DB_PASSWD=$(docker exec backend env | grep POSTGRES_PASSWORD | cut -d '=' -f 2)
	local DB_HOST=$(docker exec backend env | grep DB_HOST | cut -d '=' -f 2)
	local DB_NAME=$(docker exec backend env | grep POSTGRES_DB | cut -d '=' -f 2)
    
    docker exec -t backend /bin/bash -c "PGPASSWORD=$DB_PASSWD pg_dump -h$DB_HOST -U$DB_USER $DB_NAME" > $DUMP_FILE
}


echo "Create dump, please wait..."
ssh -T $CONN_USER@$HOSTNAME "$(declare -f create_dump);DUMP_FILE=SH-dump-$(date +%m-%d-%Y).sql; create_dump"
echo "Download dump"
scp $CONN_USER@$HOSTNAME:~/$DUMP_FILE ./
echo "Delete dump"
ssh -T $CONN_USER@$HOSTNAME "rm -f $DUMP_FILE"
{code}
 In order to create dump database from the server staging. You must have SSH access to the staging server. Access can be requested from the administrator.
Then download the script and execute it from user who has access to staging.


{code:java}
bash createdump_SH.sh
{code}

Policy for sh-backup-user

{code:java}
{
    "Version": "2012-10-17",
    "Statement": [
        {
            "Sid": "VisualEditor0",
            "Effect": "Allow",
            "Action": "s3:ListBucket",
            "Resource": "arn:aws:s3:::sorted-house-backups"
        },
        {
            "Sid": "VisualEditor1",
            "Effect": "Allow",
            "Action": [
                "s3:PutObject",
                "s3:GetObjectAcl",
                "s3:GetObject",
                "s3:PutObjectAcl"
            ],
            "Resource": "arn:aws:s3:::sorted-house-backups/*"
        }
    ]
}
{code}

Cronjob for prod server

{code:java}
1 1 * * * root aws s3 sync /opt/docker/sortedhouse/volumes/uploads s3://sorted-house-backups/production_backups > /var/log/s3backup.log
{code}


Cronjob for staging server
{code:java}
1 1 * * * root aws s3 sync /opt/docker/sortedhouse/volumes/uploads s3://sorted-house-backups/staging_backups > /var/log/s3backup.log
{code}

[~ducla5], can you please check the deployment plan?  [~kirill] I have some comments:
 * In this phase we need to keep both version of Magento, the new system is run with domain edumall.vn and the old system is run with domain old.edumall.vn. We should keep to avoid if the new system has problem, we still can switch to the old ones. I recommend we keep it at least 1 week before deciding remove the old system.
 * With this plan, how much time does it take to finish?
 * About the "Maintenance mode" page: how long must we wait to get out of this mode? As I knew, Magento already has Maintenance page so in this phase we can use it. [~ducla5]
 * We can leave the old system without any problems. After switching to a new production, I will change the domain name in DB
 But I will need your help to direct the old.edumall.vn domain to the old production. 
 I don't currently have access to edit the config files on Load balanser on DO

* Today I integrated varnish for the magneto, tomorrow morning I will test the new production. And I ask you to check if everything is okay. If no problems are detected, we will be able to carry out work on the transition to the new production. 
 * Operations that will take time is to create a snapshot of the database 15 min, deploy a new snapshot from the database 15 min, and a 20 minute deploy, and test new production.  That's about 50 minut. Can we switch domain [edumall.vn|http://edumall.vn/] to new Magento today?

[Dmitrii Khalezin DevOps(opens in new tab)|https://app.slack.com/team/U010DB92PN2]  [44 minutes ago|https://topicacompany.slack.com/archives/C011A487KUG/p1588834181083500?thread_ts=1588831815.074900&cid=C011A487KUG]

1. When building an AMI for a magento, the magento is connected to the database and updates are installed.
We cannot use the current database, as this will damage the current production.
2. We need to raise the exact copy of the database with the current changes, it takes time.
3. In order to avoid data asynchronization in databases, we need to close the production for a while.Maybe there's something else I don't know ?
 
!https://ca.slack-edge.com/T026ZLPJU-U010DB92PN2-g118b483658d-48!

[Dmitrii Khalezin DevOps(opens in new tab)|https://app.slack.com/team/U010DB92PN2]  [1 minute ago|https://topicacompany.slack.com/archives/C011A487KUG/p1588836728087100?thread_ts=1588831815.074900&cid=C011A487KUG]

[@ducleanh|https://topicacompany.slack.com/team/U010RMS02DR]
1. We can't use one database, because when we build a new magento, Radik changes will be added and it can kill the current production.
2. We need a copy of the database from which the magento will be build and the new prod will work.
3. Problems with rollback, take a snapshot from a new production  with Radik changes and rollback on the old production can not, because there are changes Radik, we need to rebuild the old prod (((( Or hope that nothing breaks.
4. In any case, when rolling back the old production, we will have the database's asynchronous.What can be done to avoid this?
1. Do not use Radik's changes.
2. Test the new product again for possible errors and problems to avoid rolling back to the old production.
 What do you think ?
What to do better ?
1. Old gitlab server, does not support downstream jobs with triggers.
2. We can separately trigger a pipeline in the qa repository, wait for execution assurance and trigger the job in the magento repository. 
In this case we have to run through the repositories to check the artifacts and execution of the pipeline. 
3. Option with cloning the qa repository and run tests in the same piping. In this case, the artifacts are saved from root, at the second build cleaning of the build directory causes errors with permissions. 
 * We can change rights for the solution, but then you need to give gitlab-runner sudo for chown.
 * We need to change the docker file for qa, in this case we can run processes in the node runner from another user. 
4. We can run a job on docker-runner, at that point we need to prepare an image to run which will docker-compose, git, and we also need to deploy key to clone the repository.

Made the fastest option 3, gave sudo rights to the user gitlab-runner, the option is not very, but working and the fastest.

As for the launch of tests, the tests should be run on a deferred basis, i.e. after depositing new AMIs in the staging. 
I create a file with commit name in the directory available nginx, wait for the file to appear, as the file becomes available, run tests.
Create dump without tables and gave them to Radik and Denis.

TRUNCATE TABLE customer_entity_text;
TRUNCATE TABLE session;
TRUNCATE TABLE mageplaza_smtp_log;


TRUNCATE TABLE customer_entity;
ERROR 1701 (42000): Cannot truncate a table referenced in a foreign key constraint (`ecommerce_mysql`.`amazon_customer`, CONSTRAINT `AMAZON_CUSTOMER_CUSTOMER_ID_CUSTOMER_ENTITY_ENTITY_ID` FOREIGN KEY (`customer_id`) REFERENCES `ecommerce_mysql`.`customer_entity` (`entity_id`))

I don't have such issue in local env. On stage.vn it can be related to amazon rds.

[~khalezin.d], I assume log_bin_trust_function_creators=1 will help to solve this issue.

More info here: [https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/knowledge-center/rds-mysql-functions/]

Let's try. Added for staging and working.  Enable  log_bin_trust_function_creators=1 for production. 

Reboot database.

{code:java}
CREATE USER 'magento_tl_staging_user'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'pasword';
GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ecommerce_tl.* TO 'magento_tl_staging_user'@'%';
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
SELECT path,value FROM core_config_data WHERE path LIKE 'web/unsecure/base%';
SELECT path,value FROM core_config_data WHERE path LIKE 'web/secure/base%';
SELECT * FROM core_config_data WHERE path LIKE "%admin/url/%";
UPDATE core_config_data SET value = 'https://magento-staging.edumall.co.th/' WHERE path LIKE 'web/secure/base_url';
UPDATE core_config_data SET value = 'https://admin-staging.edumall.co.th/' WHERE path LIKE 'admin/url/custom';
UPDATE core_config_data SET value = 'https://admin-staging.edumall.co.th/' WHERE config_id=568;
UPDATE core_config_data SET value = 'https://admin-staging.edumall.co.th/' WHERE config_id=567;
UPDATE core_config_data SET value = 'edumall_tl_staging' WHERE config_id=69;
UPDATE core_config_data SET value = 'http://10.0.8.63' WHERE config_id=67;
{code}

Cloudwatch 

[https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/edumall-tl/wikis/Check-magento-logs-from-Cloudwatch]

[https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/edumall-tl/wikis/Infrastructure-for-ETL]

Added user

[https://git.edumall.io/ecommerce/edumall-tl/wikis/How-to-add-user-to-check-magento-log]
Plan:

1. Increase resources for redis new production - cache.m3.medium
 2. Increase resources in gitlab-ci.yml for web instances and admin, change IT_PROD variable - t3a.xlarge, IT_PROD_ADMIN - t3a.large
 2.1 Remove from userdata changes nginx config
 2.2 Update DB name in PROD_DB_NAME
 2.3 Update prod url PROD_URL
 3. Prepare MR with new changes
 4. Manually change TG for TL-prod-LB with m-mode 
 5. In cloudflare direct the edumall.co.th domain to CNAME LA prod "
 ecommerce-magento-PROD-tl-LBF-1547476215.ap-southeast-1.elb.amazonaws.com
 "
 5.1 Direct admin.edumall.co.th to CNAME LA prod

5.2 Update rule LB for admin 80 443

6. Take a snapshot of the current production database.
 7. Run a new instance from production snapshot - make the instance type the same as on the production db.t3.medium
 7.1 Enable asg for disk 
 7.2 Enable multi AZ

7.3 Enable log_bin_trust_function_creators=1 for new prod
 8. Update the variables in Gitlab-ci to connect to the new database, the data to connect take from the current production.
 Do not forget to change DB-HOST
 9. Wait until the new database is complete.
 9.1 Change index prefix 
 SELECT * FROM core_config_data WHERE path LIKE "%elas%";
 69 | default | 0 | catalog/search/elasticsearch5_index_prefix | edumall_tl_prod

UPDATE core_config_data SET value = 'edumall_tl_newprod' WHERE config_id=69;

9.2 Create user for prod DB connect

mysql -h ecommerce-magento-tl-production-db-from-tl-prod-2020-05-24.ch6pq6ue9v6p.ap-southeast-1.rds.amazonaws.com -u ecom_master_user -p'ecom_master_user-edumall' ecommerce_mysql <<MY_QUERY
 CREATE USER 'ecommerce_user_prod'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY '43zzPQcTBU2LJe6n';
 GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON ecommerce_tl.* TO 'ecommerce_user_prod'@'%';
 FLUSH PRIVILEGES;

Create Snapshot new DB with name ecommerce-magento-tl-newprod-database-snapshot-create-date-1111

10. Run the build and the deploy from the prod branch.

11. Wait when production deployed
 12. Create a user on the prod 
 sudo php /srv/www/edumall/bin/magento admin:user:create --admin-user maduser --admin-password passwd --admin-email example@exam.io --admin-firstname maduser --admin-lastname maduser

13. Enable cloudflare proxy

14. Check the work of the CDN in the admin and check the urls for other services. Lms, Thresh production
 15. Verify authorization via SSO
 16. Check the addition of product to the cart
 17. Check developer console
 18. Check another pages

19. Enable cron for sitemap
-

The autoscaling worked, but there was an error because ami and snapshot were removed. Deletion occurs at the snapshot stage, and the deletion worked incorrectly.

Manually created a snapshot, from the web, created a launch configuration. Changed LC in ASG, the snapshot got up.

1. We need to add RAM for magento to work.
 2. We need to find out the reason for such high memory usage. 
 3) We need to fix the removal of snapshot and ami after deposition.

Already changed the instance type, added RAM.
 While removing the snapshot and ami, I'm going to fix it a little bit.

 
Before the deploy, turn on something for the Radik
https://jira.topica.vn/browse/EVAB-429

1. Close production, manually. 
 2. Switch on autoscaling disk for base and multi-az.
 3. Change the target group for the admin.
 4. Remove the custom url for sitemap.
 4. Remove redirect from http to https.
 5. Start the build production. 
 6. Wait until the deploy is over.
 7. Check the cache work 
 8. Enable proxy from cloudflare
 9. Check the work of the site, check the admin, check the possibility of adding changes. 
 10. Check page loading So far, I've been watching the production load.

Комуникация с Димой и Артуром по задаче. Пока работы приостановлены но закрывать нельзя.

Install [drow.io|http://drow.io] programm on my pc. Create new scheme for services. Communication with Dmitrii. Recreate scheme for used aws services. !Teacherly General (d266fc9b-298c-422f-ba94-f31255bdd5d0).png|width=1001,height=795!

Here is General Diagram of the Infrastructure which describes which resources will be used and who and how will operate with the infrastructure !Teacherly AWS (f91693ca-dee1-4e5d-b733-7635d475c871).png|width=1280,height=1159!

More detailed Diagram describing AWS resources layout !Teacherly Kubernetes (14113e54-cb4c-46d0-b73c-5e33da0636f9).JPG|width=905,height=1280!

Kubernetes layout, Namespaces on the left, and their services on the right
install docker and docker-compose on instance. Up container. It not work without https. Configure nginx proxy for container. 
Не поднимается haproxy, надо разобраться почему.  Нашел проблему. letsencrypt не генерирует сертификаты. В волюме /opt/docker/configs/nginx/certs пустые папки, попросил у Димы доступы на aerotaxi, зашел на сервер, там все сертификаты есть. Ресерчь по проблеме генерации сертификатов [https://community.letsencrypt.org/t/unable-to-renew-certificates/78310]
[https://medium.com/bros/enabling-https-with-lets-encrypt-over-docker-9cad06bdb82b] В логе вижу 
{code:java}
Dec 18 23:35:40 koltaxi docker/taxi-letsencrypt[456]: 2019/12/18 17:35:40 Contents of /app/letsencrypt_service_data did not change. Skipping notification '/app/update_certs'
Dec 18 23:35:40 koltaxi docker/taxi-letsencrypt[456]: 2019-12-18 17:35:40,952:INFO:simp_le:1356: Generating new account key
Dec 18 23:35:43 koltaxi docker/taxi-letsencrypt[456]: ACME server returned an error: urn:acme:error:unauthorized :: The client lacks sufficient authorization :: Account creation on ACMEv1 is disabled. Please upgrade your ACME client to a version that supports ACMEv2 / RFC 8555. See https://community.letsencrypt.org/t/end-of-life-plan-for-acmev1/88430 for details.

{code}

Использовал образ image: jrcs/letsencrypt-nginx-proxy-companion

для 
taxi-letsencrypt:
    container_name: taxi-letsencrypt
    image: jrcs/letsencrypt-nginx-proxy-companion

Ранее использовался 
 image: ${PRIVATE_REGISTRY}/taxi/taxi-letsencrypt

Должны сгененироваться сертификаты, сертификаты для nginx есть, для хапрокси нет fullchain_plus_key.pem
В шаблоне haproxy /opt/docker/taxi/configs/haproxy/haproxy.tmpl
  bind *:3000 npn spdy/2 alpn h2,http/1.1 ssl crt /etc/nginx/certs/{{ $value.Env.VIRTUAL_HOST }}/fullchain_plus_key.pem

Этого файла нет fullchain_plus_key.pem

Нужно разобраться кто его генерирует и как. 

Обновить образ ${PRIVATE_REGISTRY}/taxi/taxi-letsencrypt при необходимости. 

 	
Комуникация с Димой и Артуром. Создал суперпользователя, создал оператора support_operator. Менеджерская и операторская открываются. Почту суперпользователя указала admin@koltaxi.swift.kg , пароли скинул Артуру в личку в slack.
По примеру https://pm.maddevs.co/browse/NT-8868 выставил настройки для constance/config
Комуникация с коммандой Такси, запросил логотип. Разбирался с https://gitlab.com/taxi-hosting/koltaxi , логотип нужно будет поместить в config/logo и запустить пайплайн, нужен svg формат Получил лого.  [^kol taxi.svg]  Исправил лого под размеры, создал версию png [^kol_taxi_logo_original.svg]  [^kol_taxi_logo.svg]  !kol_taxi_logo.png|thumbnail! 
 	
В графане создал дашборду koltaxi.swift.kg в Папке Dashboards for allerts, из https://grafana.maddevs.co/d/bNR6WQUik/docker-and-system-partners-taxi скопировал панели, переписал во всех панелях строки запроса на koltaxi.swift.kg
https://grafana.maddevs.co/d/9jIXBXBWz/koltaxi-swift-kg?orgId=1
Получил доступы к бекап серверу 10.7.0.235, хранилище бекапов монтировано в /storage, занято 373ГБ из 499, свободно 101ГБ. 373ГБ используется для 8 проектов такси, значит в среднем 46.6ГБ на проект. koltaxi по объему схож с прошлыми проектами такси, предположим что он так же займет ~50ГБ на бекап сервере, отсюда следует что текущего свободного места хватает на koltaxi.



 На сервере бекапов добавил крон

45 4 * * * backup-server rsync --archive -e "ssh -i $HOME/.ssh/id_rsa -p 45087" backup-server@koltaxi.swift.kg:/mnt/backup/ /storage/taxi-instances/koltaxi/ && curl -fsS --retry 3 https://cron.monitoring.maddevs.co/ping/e1e83cd7-6640-4dbb-bd31-1ff8abb1daf2 > /dev/null
на cron.monitoring.maddevs.co добавил чек.
Тестово запустил сбор бекапов, сбор прошел успешно, чек отработал.

Warning: Interpolation-only expressions are deprecated

  on vpc.tf line 4, in resource "null_resource" "teacherly_subnets":
   4:   count = "${var.az_count}"

Terraform 0.11 and earlier required all non-constant expressions to be
provided via interpolation syntax, but this pattern is now deprecated. To
silence this warning, remove the "${ sequence from the start and the }"
sequence from the end of this expression, leaving just the inner expression.

Template interpolation syntax is still used to construct strings from
expressions when the template includes multiple interpolation sequences or a
mixture of literal strings and interpolations. This deprecation applies only
to templates that consist entirely of a single interpolation sequence.
