- Investigated  mass insert. Looked for Gulya's changes
- Implemented next logic, it was working fine

{code:java}
        $questions = $this->questions()->get(['data', 'idx', 'type_id', 'duration', 'answer']);
        $questions = $questions->map(function ($question) use ($clone) {
            $question['activity_id'] = $clone->id;

            return $question;
        });
        Question::insert($questions->toArray());
{code}
- Researched how to clone objects that are being cloned in loop inside question createClone method. Took some time
- Added new method to Question that prepares new question objects and inserts
- Code started failing with error

{code:java}
PHP Error:  Call to a member function roles() on null in /var/www/app/Models/Question.php on line 53
{code}
- Investigated errors, fount out that it is in attribute and that attribute is being appended to query response. Temporarily removed model append field
- Further investigation of other ways of mass insert
- Another error occurred when calling insert(Question::insert($questions->toArray());)

{code:java}
PHP Recoverable fatal error:  Object of class stdClass could not be converted to string in /var/www/vendor/laravel/framework/src/Illuminate/Support/Str.php on line 419

{code}


 - Investigated why studentanswer append breaks code. Temporarily commented it, will investigate usages lates
- The main problem was that when I was trying to prepare data and insert it(Question::insert($questions->toArray());) Error was occuring

{code:java}
PHP Recoverable fatal error:  Object of class stdClass could not be converted to string in /var/www/vendor/laravel/framework/src/Illuminate/Support/Str.php on line 419
{code}
- Localized error. It was because when I was transforming collection to array($questions->toArray())) --> nested object were not transformed and were causing errors. data fiels was still and std object
- Researched how to separately transform std object to array. But it was not working in collection map loop
- Investigated why toArray() method is not converting nested arrays. Found this article(https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60588796/why-collections-toarray-method-does-not-convert-nested-objects-to-arrays-when). Seems like it is working not correctly
- Reworked the way of updating activity_id field. Made it like this

{code:java}
$questions = $activity->questions()->get(['data', 'activity_id', 'idx', 'type_id', 'duration'])->toArray();
        foreach ($questions as &$question) {
            $question["activity_id"] = $clone->id;
        }
{code}
- Inside of loop was transforming data field into array

{code:java}
$questions = $activity->questions()->get(['data', 'activity_id', 'idx', 'type_id', 'duration'])->toArray();
        foreach ($questions as &$question) {
            $question["activity_id"] = $clone->id;
            $question['data'] = (array) $question['data'];
        }
{code}
- Above code was working, but not correctly saving data field + PHP warning occured
- Understood the proper way and was converting data field directly to json
- Prepared draft logic to clone question with single query
- Tested locally

- Now need to copy questionObjects and answers


 - Have been investigating how to clone question objects and fill question->answer field
- Tried to retrieve questions after insert by activity_id, but later it is hard to match original question to clone
- We need to create a questionObject in loop, but there we won't have question instance's id.
- For now have no idea how to clone question object within question clone. Tomorrow will discuss with team members - Refactored question model createClone method a bit(get rid of useless if checks)
- Get rid of QuestionType and QuedtionObjectType tables. 
Previously in database there were four entries in question_type table [multiple-choice, ordering, text_with_answer, free_text] and in question_object_type table [text, video, image]. Talked with frontend developers and researched myself. Currently, only multiple-choice questions are available on the platform with simple text answers. That means all of the questions are of type 1 in DB and QuestionObjects are of type 1 too. 
- Added single constant to each model(Question and QuestionObject). Later if new types will be added, new constants will be appended and mapping of [type=>value] if needed.

h4. Pattern: strangler fig application

The idea is that the old and the new can coexist, giving the new system time to grow and potentially entirely replace the old system.

When we implement this idea, we strive to not only take incremental steps toward our new application architecture, but also ensure that each step is easily reversible, reducing the risk of each incremental step.

h4. How it works

This may involve actually copying the code from the monolith (if possible), or else reimplementing the functionality in question. In addition, if the functionality in question requires the persistence of state, then consideration needs to be given to how that state can be migrated to the new service, and potentially back again.

Implementing a strangler fig pattern relies on three steps, as outlined in figure below. First, identify parts of the existing system that you wish to migrate. Then need to implement this functionality in new microservice. With new implementation ready, we need to be able to reroute calls from the monolith over to new microservice.

!image-20200513-101101.png|width=876,height=316!



!image-20200513-100703.png|width=585,height=256!

*Caution*

When migrating functionality, try to eliminate any changes in the behavior being moved—delay new features or bug fixes until the migration is complete if you can. Otherwise, you may reduce your ability to roll back changes to your system. h4. Pattern overview for our case:

!http-stragler.jpg|width=874,height=1143!
Waiting devops for new infrastructure. [https://kubernetes.github.io/ingress-nginx/examples/rewrite/|https://kubernetes.github.io/ingress-nginx/examples/rewrite/] Done with configuration

{noformat}location ~* ^/api/teacher/sections(.*)$ {
        #proxy_set_header Host $host;
        proxy_redirect off;
        proxy_set_header   X-Forwarded-For  $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header   X-Forwarded-User $http_authorization;
        proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
        proxy_pass https://canvas-api-staging.teacherly.io/sections$1$is_args$args;
      }{noformat}

[https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/apm/agent/go/current/builtin-modules.html#builtin-modules-apmgin|https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/apm/agent/go/current/builtin-modules.html#builtin-modules-apmgin]

So we need to extend current methods with context.

[http://html2canvas.hertzen.com/|http://html2canvas.hertzen.com/]

[https://medium.com/@jamesfuthey/simulating-the-creation-of-website-thumbnail-screenshots-using-iframes-7145269891db|https://medium.com/@jamesfuthey/simulating-the-creation-of-website-thumbnail-screenshots-using-iframes-7145269891db] [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] [~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6] 

Похоже, что основная проблема сейчас с элементами которые содержат ссылку на источник. Например добавив картинку в фазу в итоге получаю два http запроса на ее подгрузку (один для миниатюры, второй на фазе).  Простым решением может быть использование ленивой подгрузки контента (Lazy loading). Такая техника помогает подгружать контент изображений  уже после загрузки основной страницы не блокируя его.  Для этого существует нативный атрибут 

{code:html}<img src="myimage.jpg" loading="lazy" alt="..." />{code}

Более подробно про него: [https://habr.com/ru/company/ruvds/blog/448914/|https://habr.com/ru/company/ruvds/blog/448914/]

Но у него есть минус, он поддерживается не во всех браузерах и работает в хроме с 75 версии [https://caniuse.com/#search=loading|https://caniuse.com/#search=loading]

Есть и альтернативные способы сделать то же самое используя различные js библиотеки. Тут больше инфы про Lazy loading:

* [https://www.sitepoint.com/five-techniques-lazy-load-images-website-performance/|https://www.sitepoint.com/five-techniques-lazy-load-images-website-performance/]
* [https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/lazy-loading-guidance/images-and-video|https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/lazy-loading-guidance/images-and-video]

Что скажите? Создали задачу чтобы попробовать библиотеку [http://html2canvas.hertzen.com/|http://html2canvas.hertzen.com/]

{noformat}49) TopicGroupControllerTest::testIndexTopicGroupsFail

{noformat} [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] May you check MR please [https://gitlab.com/teacherly/teacherly/-/merge_requests/2938|https://gitlab.com/teacherly/teacherly/-/merge_requests/2938]
Found artisan clear-compiled command explanation [https://stillat.com/blog/2016/12/07/laravel-artisan-general-command-the-clear-compiled-command|https://stillat.com/blog/2016/12/07/laravel-artisan-general-command-the-clear-compiled-command]

Found source code [https://github.com/laravel/framework/blob/5.3/src/Illuminate/Foundation/ComposerScripts.php|https://github.com/laravel/framework/blob/5.3/src/Illuminate/Foundation/ComposerScripts.php|smart-link] 

It seems like using {{"Illuminate\\Foundation\\ComposerScripts"}}class do the same job, but it preferred and canonical way to do it.

More detailed explanation is here: [https://stackoverflow.com/a/35168719/3840005|https://stackoverflow.com/a/35168719/3840005] Composer output before composer.json update

{noformat}Generating autoload files
> php artisan clear-compiled
The compiled class file has been removed.
> php artisan optimize
Generating optimized class loader
The compiled class file has been removed.{noformat}

Output after composer.json update:

{noformat}Generating autoload files
> Illuminate\Foundation\ComposerScripts::postInstall
> php artisan optimize
Generating optimized class loader
The compiled class file has been removed.{noformat}

Swagger migrate to 5.0

{noformat}composer require zircote/swagger-php:2.0.*{noformat}

[https://github.com/DarkaOnLine/L5-Swagger/tree/5.0#migrate-from-3040-to-50|https://github.com/DarkaOnLine/L5-Swagger/tree/5.0#migrate-from-3040-to-50|smart-link] 

When run

{noformat}php artisan vendor:publish --provider "L5Swagger\L5SwaggerServiceProvider"{noformat} Needs to be checked:

* Eloquent: 
** -belongsToMany method signature changed-
** -Model is Method-
** -Model $events Property-
** -Relationship create Methods-
** -withCount Column Formatting-
** -Model Methods & Attribute Names-
* -Exception Format and Exception Handler-
* -Form Requests-
* -Queues: The dispatch Helper-
* -Blade php directive-
Refactoring errors like:

{noformat}// Convert this
return Restable::missing('Admin does not control any organisation')->render();
// into this
return response()->json(['message' => 'Admin does not control any organisation'], 404);{noformat} 

{noformat}return Restable::unauthorized('Admins can only view classes in their own organisation')->render();
// replace with
return response()->json(['message' => 'Admins can only view classes in their own organisation'], 401);

return Restable::bad('You have no permission to delete standard category')->render();
// replace with
return response()->json(['message' => 'You have no permission to delete standard category'], 400);

return Restable::success(trans('messages.deleted'))->render();
// replace with
return response()->json(['message' => __('messages.deleted')]);

return Restable::error('Cannot clone question as lesson does not belong to user', 403)->render();
// replace with
return response()->json(['message' => 'Cannot clone question as lesson does not belong to user'], 403);{noformat}
I will upgrade to 5.5.37, because 5.5.42 require lib carbon update. After updating carbon, jwt tokens stops working.
-
[https://mathiasbynens.be/notes/mysql-utf8mb4|https://mathiasbynens.be/notes/mysql-utf8mb4]
I’m not familiar with php dev environment, so found this video [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l0jb-N5H52A|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l0jb-N5H52A]. And this article [https://laravel-news.com/laravel-scheduler-queue-docker|https://laravel-news.com/laravel-scheduler-queue-docker].

{noformat} $ docker exec -i api php artisan migrate --force
 In ChangeColumn.php line 30:
                                                                                
   Changing columns for table "achievements" requires Doctrine DBAL; install "  
   doctrine/dbal". {noformat} Find in [https://laravel.com/docs/5.1/releases#laravel-4.1|https://laravel.com/docs/5.1/releases#laravel-4.1] and [https://laravel.com/docs/7.x/migrations#modifying-columns|https://laravel.com/docs/7.x/migrations#modifying-columns]

Doctrine DBAL

If you are using the {{renameColumn}} function in your migrations, you will need to add the {{doctrine/dbal}} dependency to your {{composer.json}} file. This package is no longer included in Laravel by default.
-
[https://github.com/PHPCompatibility/PHPCompatibility|https://github.com/PHPCompatibility/PHPCompatibility|smart-link] 

[https://blog.fortrabbit.com/php-testing|https://blog.fortrabbit.com/php-testing]

Also

[https://blog.jetbrains.com/phpstorm/2018/08/simplified-codesniffer-and-messdetector-setup/|https://blog.jetbrains.com/phpstorm/2018/08/simplified-codesniffer-and-messdetector-setup/]

[https://www.jetbrains.com/help/phpstorm/using-php-mess-detector.html#installing-configuring-mess-detector|https://www.jetbrains.com/help/phpstorm/using-php-mess-detector.html#installing-configuring-mess-detector]

[https://semaphoreci.com/blog/7-continuous-integration-tools-for-php-laravel|https://semaphoreci.com/blog/7-continuous-integration-tools-for-php-laravel]

After laravel 6.0

[https://laravelshift.com/opinionated-laravel-way-shift|https://laravelshift.com/opinionated-laravel-way-shift]
mcrypt dropped in 7.2 and dropped in laravel since 5.1.

php.ini dropped support for {{sql.safe_mode}} Need to check:

[https://www.php.net/manual/ru/migration72.incompatible.php#migration72.incompatible.json_decode-changes|https://www.php.net/manual/ru/migration72.incompatible.php#migration72.incompatible.json_decode-changes]

[https://www.php.net/manual/ru/migration72.incompatible.php#migration72.incompatible.warn-on-non-countable-types|https://www.php.net/manual/ru/migration72.incompatible.php#migration72.incompatible.warn-on-non-countable-types]

[https://github.com/laravel/framework/issues/20248|https://github.com/laravel/framework/issues/20248|smart-link]  Looks like there must not be problems with json_decode. Continue researching.

count() must be refactored. Will check endpoints where count function used. At least one test falling

* {{photo_asset}}

* {{socket_token}}
* {{google_user_id}}

php-cs-fixer conflicts conflicts with other dependencies, so I install it globally in docker and add rules ([https://gist.github.com/laravel-shift/cab527923ed2a109dda047b97d53c200|https://gist.github.com/laravel-shift/cab527923ed2a109dda047b97d53c200]). Need to find a better way to enable php-cs-fixer in dev’s IDE. And after add it to CI job

{noformat}php-cs-fixer fix --dry-run --diff{noformat}

 Will return to it a bit later. Command for CI

{noformat}./vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php_cs -v --dry-run --stop-on-violation --using-cache=no{noformat}

Example output:

{noformat}root@02a877868542:/var/www# ./vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php_cs -v --dry-run --stop-on-violation --using-cache=no
Loaded config default from ".php_cs".
.....................................F
Legend: ?-unknown, I-invalid file syntax (file ignored), S-skipped (cached or empty file), .-no changes, F-fixed, E-error
   1) www/app/Services/GoogleService.php (blank_line_before_statement)

-
Decide with [~accountid:557058:4d51e61f-f264-4dac-b7cd-d45ab512d07e] to remove all console commands, because nobody use it.
Testing structure

Laravel stores tests under the {{tests}} folder. Under the {{tests}} folder, Laravel has two subfolders: {{Feature}} and {{Unit}}.

These terms carry with them implications about the tests. Unfortunately, this is exactly the kind of quagmire you can get stuck in when starting to test. I'm intentionally going to skirt the issue. For today, *tests are tests*. The only distinction I will make is placing Laravel's HTTP Tests under the {{Feature}} subfolder as this is how the example tests are organized.

Organizing Your Tests

On the topic of subfolders, I encourage organizing your tests to mirror the {{app}} folder. So if you are testing the {{app/Http/Controllers/UserController.php}}, you should create the test as {{tests/Feature/Http/Controllers/UserControllerTest.php}}. Mirroring the folder structures avoids confusion on where (or if) a test exists.
[^log.txt]

Output of

{noformat}docker-compose -f docker-compose-backend-test.yml exec api vendor/bin/phpunit tests{noformat} [~accountid:5cee2d23919eaf0f2135ac64] 
Running single test outputs for LessonTemplateController outputs:

{noformat}docker-compose exec api vendor/bin/phpunit --filter testIndexSuccessfulResponse tests/Feature/Http/Controllers/Teachers/LessonTemplate/LessonTemplateControllerTest.php
PHPUnit 8.5.8 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

E                                                                   1 / 1 (100%)

Time: 1.25 seconds, Memory: 36.00 MB

It says error is caused during creation of topic inside LessonTemplate
LessonTemplateControllerTest.php


{noformat}$teacher = $this->createTeacherUser();
        $template = factory(LessonTemplate::class)->create([
            'user_id' => $teacher->id,
        ]);{noformat}

LessonTemplateFactory.php

{noformat}$factory->define(App\Models\LessonTemplate::class, function (Faker $faker) {
    return [
        'name' => 'Lesson Template '.$faker->randomDigit,
        'user_id' => function () {
            return factory(App\Models\User::class)->create()->id;
        },
        'subject_id' => function () {
            return factory(App\Models\Subject::class)->create()->id;
        },
        'curriculum_id' => function () {
            return factory(App\Models\Curriculum::class)->create()->id;
        },
        'qualification_id' => function () {
            return factory(App\Models\Qualification::class)->create()->id;
        },
        'topic_id' => function () {
            return factory(App\Models\Topic::class)->create()->id;
        },
    ];
});
{noformat}

It looks like as topic is trying to be created with random user id not related to user id passed in to LessonTemplate 



{noformat}desc lesson_templates;
+---------------------------+------------------+------+-----+---------+----------------+
| Field                     | Type             | Null | Key | Default | Extra          |

Though topic_id in lesson_templates is optional field. 
Removing topic_id from LessonTemplateFactory.php allows test to pass.

!image-20200720-064958.png|width=540,height=189!

в мандриле есть еще старый шаблон про 6 месяцев, который не обновлялся 3 года.

Set {{ASSET_URL}}env to prevent warning likes 

{quote}Mixed Content: The page at '[https://staging.teacherly.io/'|https://staging.teacherly.io/'] was loaded over HTTPS, but requested an insecure image '[http://staging.teacherly.io/images/logo.svg'.|http://staging.teacherly.io/images/logo.svg'.] This content should also be served over HTTPS.{quote}

{noformat}ASSET_URL=http://staging.teacherly.io
ASSET_URL=http://dev.teacherly.io
ASSET_URL=http://slate.teacherly.io{noformat}
Много однотипных проверок, похожих на костыль

{noformat}$org = Auth::user()->organisations()->whereRoleId(3)->first();
        if (! $org) {
            return Restable::missing('User is not a teacher of any organisation')->render();
        }{noformat}

В данном случае не понятно зачем проверять, что учитель находиться, в организации, если учитель не может быть создан без нее. В модели Curriculum есть атрибут в котором происходит кросс запрос.

{noformat}    public function getIsPreferredAttribute()
    {
        $isPreferred = false;
        $user = User::with('selectedCurriculums')->find(Auth::id());
        $user['data'] = json_decode($user->data);

        if (isset($user['data']) && property_exists($user['data'], 'curriculums')) {
            $isPreferred = in_array($this->id, $user['data']->curriculums);
        }

        return $isPreferred;
    }{noformat}

{noformat}$ time docker-compose -f docker-compose-backend-test.yml up -d api
real	1m40.597s{noformat} Also remove xdebug in production build [https://stackoverflow.com/a/3522356/3840005|https://stackoverflow.com/a/3522356/3840005] After discussion with teammates, we found bug. The database was inited before every tests class, when it should be inited only once. I'll fix it.  Now all tests tooks ~20 seconds Coverage is also slow [https://medium.com/@nicocabot/speed-up-phpunit-code-coverage-analysis-4e35345b3dad|https://medium.com/@nicocabot/speed-up-phpunit-code-coverage-analysis-4e35345b3dad]

-
-
{{DASHBOARD_TEACHER}} should be removed from CI envs. After pulling new changes, all php devs should review and sync environment variables in {{.env}} according to {{.env.example}} . Because some vars was renamed or deleted. Also do not use {{env()}} function for getting settings from environment variables, use {{config()}} instead, because after caching config, {{env()}} will not work. All project related settings can be placed in {{config/settings.php}} file.
-
-
After replacing testdb.sql import with {{RefreshDatabase}} trait. Full tests run takes ~5 mins.

Actual   :110
<Click to see difference>

# The {{saveAssetFileFromUrl}} is present in code, but I can’t find where it calls in UI. 
# The{{saveAssetGdriveFileFromUrl}}and {{saveAssetGdriveImageFromUrl}} use the same api url, what the difference between it?  [~accountid:5cee2d23919eaf0f2135ac64] 1. The {{saveAssetFileFromUrl}} call; [https://www.loom.com/share/e03b5b65742b47118751a016e86792b7|https://www.loom.com/share/e03b5b65742b47118751a016e86792b7]

-
Teacher login stop working after changes, need to check it.
The old method [elixir()|https://github.com/laravel/framework/blob/7.x/src/Illuminate/Foundation/helpers.php#L421] works like this

{noformat}>>> elixir('css/app'.config('settings.slate_js_version_name').'.css');
=> "/css/appany.css"{noformat}
Found {{TRUNCATE}} statements in some tests. The truncate statement force mysql to commit transaction. Since all feature tests wrapped with transaction, it was committed before the test ends. This was a reason for stale data in database.
Checking [https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/7454865?hl=en#|https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/7454865?hl=en#]

When I compare scopes in our sources

{noformat}scope: 'profile email https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.courses https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.profile.emails https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.rosters.readonly',{noformat}

with scopes allowed in OAth2

!image-20200925-124721.png|width=478,height=296! We need only courses list and student list

[https://developers.google.com/classroom/reference/rest/v1/courses/list#authorization-scopes|https://developers.google.com/classroom/reference/rest/v1/courses/list#authorization-scopes]

[https://developers.google.com/classroom/reference/rest/v1/courses.students/list#authorization-scopes|https://developers.google.com/classroom/reference/rest/v1/courses.students/list#authorization-scopes]

So this scopes will be enough:

{noformat}https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.courses.readonly
https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.rosters.readonly{noformat} [~accountid:557058:4d51e61f-f264-4dac-b7cd-d45ab512d07e] Ask for adding {{https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.profile.emails}} scope for importing user emails.

I suggest google verification with followed text

{quote}Приложение будет запрашивать данные из classroom через https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.profile.emails, чтобы пользователи (учителя) могли идентифицировать студентов по email.{quote}

!image-20200928-072234.png|width=572,height=192!
[http://mysqlserverteam.com/mysql-8-0-when-to-use-utf8mb3-over-utf8mb4/|http://mysqlserverteam.com/mysql-8-0-when-to-use-utf8mb3-over-utf8mb4/] Also find this solution [https://stackoverflow.com/a/42747508/3840005|https://stackoverflow.com/a/42747508/3840005]. Add migration to convert all tables



{code:sql}Migrating: 2020_09_28_054110_upgrade_database_to_utf8mb4

Migrated:  2020_09_28_054110_upgrade_database_to_utf8mb4 (65,934.88ms){code}
Found in laravel docs. Starting with MySQL 5.7, {{0000-00-00 00:00:00}} is no longer considered a valid date. As documented at the [+Laravel 5.2 upgrade guide+|https://laravel.com/docs/5.2/upgrade#upgrade-5.2.0], all timestamp columns should receive a valid default value when you insert records into your database. You may use the {{useCurrent()}} column modifier (from Laravel 5.1.25 and above) in your migrations to default the timestamp columns to the current timestamps, or you may make the timestamps {{nullable()}} to allow null values.
[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] 

I received email from google “OAuth Verification Request”. They ask for app demonstration video, can you help? 

|Dear Developer,
Your app needs to follow some extra requirements so you can continue with verification. Please reply directly to this email when your app meets all of these requirements:
*App Demonstration Video*
Respond directly to this email with a YouTube video link that meets these requirements:
* Video is *publicly accessible.*
* OAuth Consent Screen is *in English.*
* OAuth Consent Screen shows the *App Name.*
* URL bar of the OAuth Consent Screen fully displays the *Client ID* in your project which contains the [*project_number*|https://cloud.google.com/resource-manager/docs/creating-managing-projects] (This is not required for native Android and iOS apps).
* Video shows the *OAuth grant process* that users will go through.
* Video shows *how the data will be used* by showing functionality for each sensitive and restricted scope you've requested.
* Video shows *how data is accessed* on each OAuth client.
* If you cannot fulfill the above requirements because users are currently seeing the "*Sign in disabled*" screen, make sure you provide us with an email address so that we can temporarily disable the warning screen, allowing you to demonstrate all of the above video requirements.
* If you cannot fulfill the above requirements because your app is an *add-on* that has not yet been published to the *GSuite Marketplace*, please reply to let us know.
You must follow these requirements to continue with verification. If you don't follow these requirements, we may have to reject your request.
You can find more information in the[ OAuth Application Verification FAQ|https://support.google.com/cloud/answer/9110914].
To make sure we don't miss your messages, reply directly to this email to continue with the verification process. Any new email sent to [api-oauth-dev-verification@google.com|mailto:api-oauth-dev-verification@google.com] won't go to our team.| Without following sensitive scopes, the google classroom api returns {{email}} and {{photo_url}} as {{null}}.

* {{https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.profile.emails}}
* {{https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.profile.photos}} I think we need a sync call at next week to discuss it. [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6]  Submit this video [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M1bX76V0tG4|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M1bX76V0tG4] and text for google review.

{quote}We plan to use scopes email and imageUrl so that on our educational platform [teacherly.io|http://teacherly.io/] teacher can import class and students from Google Classroom. With import the teacher adds students to the classroom, where they can then assign assignments.{quote} App is verified

To fill the {{subscription_prices}} table need to run this code:

{noformat}$priceService = app(PriceService::class);
$priceService->refreshPricesFromStripe();{noformat}
Some {{phase_commands}} rows has {{null}} value in {{data}}(text) column. Need to find where it come from. May be need to check validation and stop accepting null values. В общем я добавил валидацию на поле data, теперь оно обязательное и должно быть объектом.

[~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc]  можешь на канвасе проверить работу элементов добавлять/подвигать/удалить/undo сделать? При этом можно смотреть во вкладку dev tools network, чтобы там не было ошибок, все запросы должны быть со статусом 200.

Without following sensitive scopes, the google classroom api returns {{email}} and {{photo_url}} as {{null}}.

* {{https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.profile.emails}}
* {{https://www.googleapis.com/auth/classroom.profile.photos}}
Changelog:

* Browsersync replaced with webpack-dev-server
* Added webpack-cli (required webpack-dev-server)
* {{HtmlWebpackPlugin}} and {{index.ejs}} removed since we do not need for index.html
* {{webpack.NoEmitOnErrorsPlugin()}} removed from config plugins. Webpack use it [by default|https://webpack.js.org/plugins/NoEmitOnErrorsPlugin/] 
* Remove exposed 3001 port from {{front}} service in docker-compose
* Fix HMR with setting properly {{entry}} and {{output->publicPath}} setting for {{react-hot-loader}} 
* Remove unused html-webpack-plugin, webpack-dev-middleware, webpack-hot-middleware
* Use {{eval-cheap-module-source-map}}. No {{.map}} file emitted. File name displayed correctly. Line number displayed correctly. The file referenced by the error: The original source code is displayed. 
!image-20201007-055232.png|width=1020,height=176!

* Remove unrelated options in {{MiniCssExtractPlugin}} and shorter test pattern.
* Remove {{ws_nodemodules}} volume. Remove {{npm run stop-ws}} from ws service, it make no sense.
* Remove {{WS_HOST}}, {{WS_PORT}}, {{REDIS_HOST, REDIS_PORT}} envs, because it unused.
* Remove {{SENTRY_DSN}} from webpack dev envs, because it should not be used in development.
-
-

Instructions after pulling new changes

{noformat}docker-compose down
sudo rm -rf node_modules
docker-compose build --no-cache front
docker-compose up -d front{noformat}

After it yarn will collect only ~5k files [https://stackoverflow.com/a/43728476/3840005|https://stackoverflow.com/a/43728476/3840005]

[https://blimpup.io/blog/common-docker-compose-mistakes/|https://blimpup.io/blog/common-docker-compose-mistakes/]
Facker package is missing in production build, so I install it manually

Found this package [https://github.com/mehdi-fathi/eloquent-filter|https://github.com/mehdi-fathi/eloquent-filter|smart-link]  and medium post for it [https://medium.com/@mehdifathi.developer/making-the-advanced-query-filter-with-eloquent-filter-in-laravel-18ddf96c9739|https://medium.com/@mehdifathi.developer/making-the-advanced-query-filter-with-eloquent-filter-in-laravel-18ddf96c9739].

Also this blog post is usefull [https://pineco.de/filtering-eloquent-queries-based-on-http-requests/|https://pineco.de/filtering-eloquent-queries-based-on-http-requests/] (same post in russian [https://habr.com/ru/post/485520/|https://habr.com/ru/post/485520/])

Script for tinker

{code:php}use App\Models\Asset;
use App\Models\PhaseCommand;
use App\Models\PhaseCommandObject;

// Select object id's in phase commands where data field hold wrong json.
$objectIDs = PhaseCommand::withTrashed()
    ->where('type_id', PhaseCommand::TYPE_DELETE)
    ->where('data', 'null')
    ->pluck('object_id')
    ->unique()
    ->toArray();

// Select related object id's that was restored.
$restoredObjectIDs = PhaseCommand::withTrashed()
    ->whereIn('object_id', $objectIDs)
    ->where('type_id', PhaseCommand::TYPE_RESTORE)
    ->pluck('object_id')
    ->unique()
    ->toArray();

// Final object id's that should be removed
$finalObjectIDs = array_diff($objectIDs, $restoredObjectIDs);

$phase_commands = PhaseCommand::whereIn('object_id', $finalObjectIDs);

// Optional step
print("Phase Commands selected. Processing assets...");
$asset_ids = [];
foreach ($phase_commands->cursor() as $command) {
    $data = json_decode($command->data);
    if (isset($data->asset_id)) {
        array_push($asset_ids, $data->asset_id);
    }
}
$asset_ids = array_unique($asset_ids);
print("Total assets: ".count($$asset_ids));
// Save and use this asset_ids to remove data from S3
print(implode(', ', $asset_ids));

// This will remove rows in phase_objects table and related rows in phase_commands table.
$result = PhaseCommandObject::whereIn('id', $finalObjectIDs)->forceDelete();
print("Deleted {$result} phase objects");

$result = Asset::withTrashed()->whereIn('id', $asset_ids)->forceDelete();
print("Deleted {$result} assets");
{code}

*Endpoints which can be removed from backend:*

GET  {{/teacher/lesson-templates/:id/activities}} (frontend already uses {{/teacher/lessons/:id/activities}})

{{GET /teacher/lesson-templates/:id/state}} (frontend already uses {{/teacher/lessons/:id/state}})

POST {{teacher/lesson-templates/:lessonId/theme/:themeId/apply}} (frontend already uses {{teacher/lessons/:lessonId/theme/:themeId/apply}})

GET {{/teacher/lesson-templates/:id}}

POST /teacher/lesson-templates (not used on frontend)

DELETE /teacher/lesson-templates (not used on frontend)



*Endpoints which are used on frontend with lesson-templates prefix:*

{{/api/teacher/lesson-templates/:id/save-to-collection}} (Add to my templates)

“role” - user role int    → тут непонятно, что надо передать в поле ‘role’,   role_id ?  [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] да role_id Call-resume with Danik:

Так как текущий логин работает через redirect intended, решили что бэк создаст новую точку, сгенерит токен и отдаст фронту, в свою очередь фронт будет хранить токен у себя   Текущий статус обсудили в слаке [https://teacherlyio.slack.com/archives/GKHPQV151/p1591273001145500|https://teacherlyio.slack.com/archives/GKHPQV151/p1591273001145500]

Необходимо добавить JWT токен в заголовки запросов. Пример заголовка:

{noformat}Authorization: Bearer {token}{noformat}
Fixed
Created a repo [https://gitlab.com/teacherly/google-classroom-client|https://gitlab.com/teacherly/google-classroom-client]
Created main.go file for now. 

Used gorilla-mux for routing. Used go modules for dependecies. 

Used testify for testing purposes.

Defined Dockerfile and run server and tests in Docker. 

Maybe docker compose files are redundant,because we have only one service. If so, we need to create separate Dockerfile for testing. But there are opinions that this is bad practice. 
-
Teachre ID param spec:

|
{{string}}
Restricts returned courses to those having a teacher with the specified identifier. The identifier can be one of the following:
* the numeric identifier for the user
* the email address of the user
* the string literal {{"me"}}, indicating the requesting user| Issue not relevant. The functionality will be developed in the main application.
-
-
Добавил объект Text на слайд:

{{POST https://staging.teacherly.io/api/teacher/phases/33785/commands}}

Payload:

{code:json}{
    "object_type":"DraftJsText",
    "object_id":null,
    "object_index":0,
    "data":{
        "position":{
            "x":972,
            "y":636,
            "zIndex":106
        },
        "dimensions":{
            "width":200,
            "height":100
        }
    },
    "type":"add"
}{code}

Response:

{code:json}{
   "id":637244,
   "phase_id":33785,
   "type_id":1,
   "object_type_id":7,
   "object_id":83139,
   "data":"{\"position\":{\"x\":972,\"y\":636,\"zIndex\":106},\"dimensions\":{\"width\":200,\"height\":100}}",
   "created_at_timestamp":1589445572.4244,
   "created_at":"2020-05-14 08:39:32",
   "updated_at":"2020-05-14 08:39:32",
   "type":{
      "id":1,
      "name":"add",
      "created_at":"-0001-11-30 00:00:00",
      "updated_at":"-0001-11-30 00:00:00",
      "deleted_at":null
   },
   "command_object":{
      "id":83139,

*Teacher*:

* Create Lessons
** Edit lesson content (Canvas)
* Create Templats
** Edit template content (Canvas)
* Standards
* Classes
* Teams
* Profile
** Add certificates
** List of standards

*Student*:

* Classes
* Lessons
** Study lesson (Canvas view mode?)

** Show progress on each lesson

*HR*:

* CRUD for:
** Classes
*** If delete class, lessons will be gone too
** Teachers
** Students
** Curriculums
** HR managers
* School params Read this article about [using domain analysis to model microservices|https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/microservices/model/domain-analysis#example-drone-delivery-application].

Checked FAQ about [Self-contained System|https://scs-architecture.org/faq.html].

Created docs for writing plan, currently in russian - [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mk4BgN19rkSQm7Qp9st6mXQqTH02E6sVr2yJb7t7ny8/edit?usp=sharing|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mk4BgN19rkSQm7Qp9st6mXQqTH02E6sVr2yJb7t7ny8/edit?usp=sharing|smart-link]

Started to create Domain Diagram in MIRO, not finished yet.

It’s hard to understande boundaries because everything is related to Lessons.

Need to check this article - [https://microservices.io/refactoring/|https://microservices.io/refactoring/] By adding definitions and drawing some schemas it became clear the Lesson is a part where Canvas and Teacherly connected and that should be removed.

Drew diagrams in Miro that shows how things are related. Update doc. Also translated to English.

Had a talk with Andrew, he shared his vision on how to separate canvas as a service in technical terms. Andrew advised to check term Operational Transformation if we are going to impove current collaborative work in canvas. Updated doc by adding AS-IS and AS-To-Be diagrams to show how we need to separate canvas from monolith. Modified diagram that shows how canvas is as part of Teacherly. Add description. Next step is to provide detailed info about API and DB parts to be decoupled.

Got problem. I copied {{createClone}} from LessonTemplate model to Lesson model, ran tests and got errors. Lessonable.php also has such method which is used in it’s own endpoint. 

Currently checking the difference betwenn two methods to find the way to unite them. After sync with Ulan and Gulya we found what is differences between two methods. I deleted createClone from LessonTemplate model and updated method from Lessonable trait to remove unused params.

Linked related tasks to updated other functions where this function is used.

{{return $this->hasMany(\App\Models\Lesson::class)->where('is_template', '=', '1');}}

-
{{subject()}} relations are different in template and lesson models. Lesson uses one that is described in Lessonable trait:

{code:php}        return $this->belongsToThrough(\App\Models\Subject::class, \App\Models\Topic::class);{code}

But LessonTemplate model has it’s own:

{noformat}return $this->belongsTo(Subject::class);{noformat}

Didn’t find any usages of LessonTemplate model subject() method, so will remove it. Bellow methods are specified in Lessonable and do not needs to be created in Lesson model:

* {{topic}}
* {{selectedOutcomes}}
* {{selectedStandards}}
* {{curriculum}}
* {{selectedInputFields}}
* {{selectedChoiceFields}}
* {{selectedSubChoiceFields}}
* {{selectedStrands}}
* {{subjects}}
* {{topics}}
* {{selectedMasterySkills}}
* {{assessmentTopics}}
* {{atlSkillOptions}}
* {{qualification}}

I am not deleting these methods from LessonTemplate method because we need to run migration.

{{team}} is already in Lesson model.
This method is called in {{\App\Models\LessonTemplate::exportFromLesson}} which funcitons are implemented in new method {{applyTemplateToLesson}} of Lesson model in [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6319|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6319|smart-link]. So no need to create new getClonedPhaseSections method inside Lesson model.

      - teacherly-app-files:/var/www:nocopy

Set up PHPStorm configuration to work with both docker-compose and docker-compose-dev files.

{{front}} container exited because of missing some lock file. Probably something is missing in volumes. Need to figure out how to properly configure volume. If you are not able to debug errors because of permissions problem, like this:

{noformat}UnexpectedValueException: The stream or file "/var/www/storage/logs/laravel.log" could not be opened in append mode: failed to open stream: Permission denied{noformat}

you can solve it by adding 

{noformat} sync_userid: '1'{noformat}

then restart docker-sync Most problems related with CPU were fixed in new Edge release [https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/3499#issuecomment-678384952|https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/3499#issuecomment-678384952|smart-link]  I keep facing problem with slow tests running locally on macOS.

Had a working session with Gennady to figure out what’s going on. Here is summary.

In latest release of Docker for Mac Edge they changed file sharing system from {{osxfs}} to {{gRPC-FUSE}} which should increase file sharing very much. But I can’t see any real difference. Running all current ~480 tests takes about ~20 minutes which is too much time.

We found that turning off debug locally gives good boost. To turn off debug need to run following command in container: {{mv /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/docker-php-ext-xdebug.ini /usr/local/etc/php/conf.d/docker-php-ext-xdebug.ini.disabled }}To turn debug on do the backwards. Gennady will figure out something to making turning on/off debug easier, via environment variables. 

But still tests ran much faster on linux machine of Gennady then on macOS. For example unit test {{PreSignUrlRequestTest}} on linux runs for 6ms, on macOS about 300ms. We excluded PHP and CPU from suspects, because PHP image is the same, and other macOS developers with better CPUs have also such problem. So the reason is still Docker.

By checking docker daemon logs:

{noformat}cd ~/Library/Containers/com.docker.docker/Data/log/host
tail -n 5 -f {vm,host}/*.log{noformat}

we can see such error:

{noformat}time="2020-09-03T15:39:38+06:00" level=error msg="Unable to query mutagen state: list failed: connection error: desc = \"transport: Error while dialing dial unix /Users/belek/.docker/mutagen/daemon/daemon.sock: connect: no such file or directory\""{noformat}

which can leed to this issues threads [https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/4655|https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/4655|smart-link] & [https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/1592|https://github.com/docker/for-mac/issues/1592|smart-link] 

We though that this error happens because we have marked our volumes with {{delegated}} mark and it tries to use Mutagen which is removed. We removed this from compose file, removed volumes and re-run containers.

For checking we took {{\Tests\Feature\Http\Controllers\Teachers\Unit\UnitControllerTest}} with 27 tests. With turned on debug on my machine they pass 26-27 secs tests. Without debug they pass 18-19 secs. But Mutagen related errors still occurres in logs.

All tests pass 5 mins the previous 20 mins.

That is better then nothing. So all macOS developers need to upgrade Docker for Mac to the latest Edge version. Turn off debug, and turn it on only when need to debug. [~accountid:5cee2d23919eaf0f2135ac64] [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:5b044dd827dd77348bacbf34] [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53]  ^ Also need to check this articles to understand what’s going on:

* [https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/osxfs/#performance-issues-solutions-and-roadmap|https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/osxfs/#performance-issues-solutions-and-roadmap]
* [https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/osxfs-caching/|https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/osxfs-caching/]
* [https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/mutagen/|https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/mutagen/]
* Check changelogs and issues for Docker for Mac [~accountid:557058:49abf63e-994b-4f7b-9758-23477860728f] I also create task for disabling xdebug by default. With disabled xdebug php performance increased by ~30%.

[~accountid:5b044dd827dd77348bacbf34] [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] we need your feedback about current docker performance. Do we solve problems? [~accountid:5cee2d23919eaf0f2135ac64] [~accountid:557058:49abf63e-994b-4f7b-9758-23477860728f]

435 of phases are not deleted.

Only 70 belongs to not deleted lessons:

{code:sql}select count(*) from phases inner join lessons on phases.lesson_id = lessons.id where phases.phase_section_id is null and phases.deleted_at is null and lessons.deleted_at is null;{code} Didn’t found any place where {{null}} is written in the field.

All phases with null phase_section_id were created before 2020-05-07. First phase section was created 2020-05-12. 2515 of these phases were deleted. There are 435 not deleted records, but they are from 2019 year and manually I can’t see any commands on these phases.

So we can delete these records from DB and make a migration to make field not nullable.
Что бы получить состояние фазы сейчас происходит следующее:

Для каждого из 11 типов объектов:

# Поиск объектов, к которым были применимы команды.
## Для каждого объекта поиск последних команд.
### Для каждого из 17 типов команд 
#### поиск последней команды к выбранному объекту
# Далее строится результат состояния по каждому объекту. How  {{/sections}} endpoint was rewritten and optimized in canvas-api project on golang - [https://gitlab.com/teacherly/canvas-api/-/blob/master/storage/mysql/repository.go#L61|https://gitlab.com/teacherly/canvas-api/-/blob/master/storage/mysql/repository.go#L61|smart-link] 

We can try to do the same thing here. Discussed with Gennady that it’s better to try optimize code implementation whether redesigning DB schemas.

Currently /{{sections}} endpoint runs by PhaseSectionController@index method, where we have some Response and Repository classes that are purely implemented. In response class we have format() function which calls Phase->getState() method.

I am going to remove that Response class and avoid calling getState method at all. Checked loading of phase sections on staging and dev on two different lessons with same amount of data:

Staging [https://staging.teacherly.io/teacher/templates/3038/edit|https://staging.teacherly.io/teacher/templates/3038/edit] about 2 - 2.5 seconds

Dev [https://dev.teacherly.io/teacher/templates/1/edit|https://dev.teacherly.io/teacher/templates/1/edit] about 400-450 ms.

Can’t understand yet why it’s happening. The problem was in factories in test. 

Event updates lesson from phase section, but in test I was checking lesson from phase, and it was different from phase section. Need to update PhaseFactory so it will create phase with same lesson value in section an in itself. Found that if we use touches atrribute it will fire exactly each time when phase updated. This is not what we want when we, for example, update multiple phases in one endpoint: update indexes will run 20 queries instead of 8  in {{test_reordering_after_phase_deleting}} test. Closing task.

- Investigated how to user mockery in tests
- Below is the draft version, though mock is still not working. Cannot understand why, there is even the same implementation in other test

{code:java}
public function testGetClonedPhaseSections()
    {
        $mock = Mockery::mock(PhaseSection::class)->makePartial();
        $mock->shouldReceive('createClone')->once();
        app()->bind(PhaseSection::class, function () use ($mock) {
            return $mock;
        });
        $teacher = $this->createTeacherUser();
        $template = factory(LessonTemplate::class)->create([
            'user_id' => $teacher->id,
            'is_private' => false,
        ]);

        $template->getClonedPhaseSections($template->phaseSections, $template->id, 'LessonTemplate', true);
    }
{code}
- And the method(getClonedPhaseSections()) itself is really strange

{code:java}
private function getClonedPhaseSections($phaseSections, $lessonable_id, $lessonable_type, $idx)
    {
        $clonedPhaseSections = [];

        if ($phaseSections) {
            foreach ($phaseSections as $phaseSection) {
                if ($idx) {
                    $clonedPhases[] = $phaseSection->createClone($lessonable_id, $lessonable_type, $phaseSection->idx);
                } else {
                    $clonedPhases[] = $phaseSection->createClone($lessonable_id, $lessonable_type, null);
                }
            }
        }

        return $clonedPhaseSections;
    }
{code}
- It always returns empty array 
- It is private, so in order to test it, I have redeclare it to public(Need to discuss consequences with someone)

But first we need to create data migration from {{LessonTemplateComment}} table to {{LessonComment}} table - [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6964|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-6964|smart-link] 
- Investigated difference between create() and model new() -- save()
- Found out that create method is just a wrapper that includes new() and save()

{code:java}
public static function create(array $attributes = [])
{
    $model = new static($attributes);

    $model->save();

    return $model;
}
{code}
- Ran time consuming tests locally. Refactored lesson and comment creation both using create() and model new -- save()
create() on a single lesson template entry [0.94; 1.03; 0.93; 0,91]
model new -- save() on a single lesson template entry [0.94, 0.9; 0.91]

create() on a 7 lesson template entries [4.31; 4.25, 4.19]
model new -- save() on a 7 lesson template entries [4.32, 4.31; 4.25]

- TIme difference is really slow, so I decided to to go with model new() save() approach

Issue not relevant. The functionality will be developed in the main application.

Current infrastructure should be changed, so after that we can configure deploy stage to staging and production in future.
The {{background_image}} field is returned by Asset class through url method. So to implement it we should know how to work with assets and s3. The {{background_image}} not used in current api, it replaced with {{background_source}} and {{background_type}}.
[~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] 

В REST API, PUT метод предполагает, что весь присланный контент будет обновлен у объекта. В исходниках, есть код с [правилами валидации|https://gitlab.com/teacherly/teacherly/-/blob/develop/app/Http/Requests/Teacher/Phase/PhaseUpdateRequest.php#L25], но код в контроллере все равно проверяет наличие полей в теле запроса. Меня это настораживает. Эти проверки похоже избыточны. Так ли это?

Также перед обновлением значения {{background_image}} происходит запрос в бд, зачем?

{code:php}if( Asset::whereId($request->get("background_image"))->count() <=0 ) {
                return Restable::unprocess("Asset not found")->render();
            }{code}

В бд {{background_image}} описан как {{bigint}} и остается только догадываться, что же там храниться. {{'background_type' => 'string|in:hex,link'}} тут тоже не понятно, что такое hex и link.

Попробовав добавить background image на стейджинге я столкнулся с ошибкой:

!image-20200612-123215.png|width=1916,height=770! [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] [~accountid:5cee2d23919eaf0f2135ac64] 

# по поводу поля {{background_image}}, по мне он вообще не юзается на данный момент. По поводу проверки в update ее можно выпилить. [~accountid:557058:4d51e61f-f264-4dac-b7cd-d45ab512d07e] поправь пжл, если я не права. 
# Юзаются {{background_type}}, {{background_source}} (они использутся в фиче для бэкграунда фаз). 

сам бэкграунд фазы может быть 2х типов:

* link - это когда на фазу картинку вставляем 
* hex  - это когда цвет вставляем

 поле {{background_type}} хранит в себе тип (выше отписала какие бывают)

поле {{background_source}} хранит в себе:

*  source(то есть линк (ex: [https://s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/teacherly-prod-ablf07-ew2-static-assets/assets/teacherlydemo/production/0d7955678c109cc0fa40fe17c6e74924.jpg|https://s3.eu-west-2.amazonaws.com/teacherly-prod-ablf07-ew2-static-assets/assets/teacherlydemo/production/0d7955678c109cc0fa40fe17c6e74924.jpg] ) 
* или же hex-color (ex:#ffffff) [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] да. Нужно удалить этот код и проверить в местах где используется это поле. Так же миграцией грохнуть эту колонку из таблицы. [~accountid:557058:dc97fe24-bdda-4965-9046-7974ad38ae38] поменял статус код на 204
This endpoint use [createClone()|https://gitlab.com/teacherly/teacherly/-/blob/develop/app/Models/Phase.php#L83] method to duplicate selected phase and all related content of the phase. It has many coupled dependencies and can’t be moved as is. Need to hold this task and first of all define how operations with phase content works. [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] Клонирование фазы, это по сути вызов метода {{createClone}} у модели Phase.

{code:php}// Clones into supplied lesson, or within same lesson (if lesson_id null)
    // If cloning in same lesson, use supplied idx to say what position to clone into
    public function createClone($idx, $phase_section_id)
    {
        $clone = new Phase();
        $clone->name = $this->name;
        $clone->duration = $this->duration;
        $clone->background_image = $this->background_image;
        $clone->background_type = $this->background_type;
        $clone->background_source = $this->background_source;
        $clone->theme_layout_order = $this->theme_layout_order;

        if ($idx) {
            $clone->idx = $idx;
        } else {
            $clone->idx = $this->idx;
        }

        if ($phase_section_id) {
            $clone->phase_section_id = $phase_section_id;
        } else {
            $clone->phase_section_id = $this->phase_section_id;
        }

        if ($clone->save()) {
            $outcome_ids = $this->selectedOutcomes()->pluck('outcome_id')->toArray();
            $clone->selectedOutcomes()->sync($outcome_ids);

            // get activity ids for this phase and also keep track of cloned activity ids
            $activityIds = $this->activities()->pluck('id')->toArray();
            $clonedActivityIds = [];

            foreach ($this->activities as $activity) {
                $clonedActivity = $activity->createClone($clone->id);
                $clonedActivityIds[] = $clonedActivity->id;
            }

            // create an associative array from old and new activities
            $newActivityIds = array_combine($activityIds, $clonedActivityIds);

            $object_transforms = [];

            foreach ($this->commands as $command) {
                if(!in_array($command->object_type_id, [8])) {  // copy all commands, except comment
                    $command->createClone($clone->id, $object_transforms, $newActivityIds);
                }
            }

        }

        return $clone;
    }{code}

Тут по незнанию возникают вопросы, что такое Outcomes, Activities и почему нужно их нужно скопировать.  Также пугает последний итератор по командам. Я планировал начать работа по переносу команд канваса после API фаз, а тут имеем зависимость от них. Предлагаю пока не переносить этот endpoint. [~accountid:5cee2d23919eaf0f2135ac64] думаю, здесь можно избавиться от outcomes, его визуально с фронта убрали. Outcomes - это те самые selected_outcomes, которую мы убрали из всех endpointов phase CRUD.

А activities при создании есть конкретная привязка к фазе, точно не знаю почему, отдельно его можно отрефакторить и избавиться от этой зависимости, потом вернуться сюда и убрать эти клонирования.

В рамках команды, все что надо сделать - создать копию элементов фазы от которой мы клонируем в новую фазу. историю команд не нужно дублировать.

Да, думаю, имеет смысл пока оставить этот endpoint.

[~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc] 

работала над фиксом, походу запуталась и возникли вопросы:

*teacher circle* - это комменты, которые оставляют учителя в уроках, сейчас они тянуться независимо от выбранного воркспейса. 

Вопрос, надо тянуть комменты уроков, которые были созданы в выбранном воркспейсе?  

[https://www.loom.com/share/50179ea89317469fbfb63f1f6a9b6c95|https://www.loom.com/share/50179ea89317469fbfb63f1f6a9b6c95] [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] Верно, в teacher circles должны отображаться комменты к урокам только из текущего воркспейса [~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc] 

залила фиксы, теперь комменты тянуться взависимости от активного воркспейса, 

надо проверить на стэйжэинге

[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc] 

# The problem is related with our schedule problems([This|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-7165])
# The problem appeared because initially we incorrectly implemented the logic and the date was written like this - today's date -> the beginning of the day (00:00) -> transfer to the UTC (-6 for Bishkek). Therefore, these lessons were delivered at 18-08-2020 18:00. We have already identified this problem and now everything should be correct (for new and updated assignments). The old assignments will not change.

[~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c], [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937], в рамках текущей задачи Рома поменял логику сохранения названия темплейта и секций, теперь работает так:

* Название сохраняется при нажатии на Enter или при клике снаружи поля ввода, а не при печатании, как это было раньше
* Если пользователь стирает название полностью и жмет Enter или кликает снаружи, то в название назначается ранее сохраненное значение (так же как и при нажати esc) Approved the next logic with [~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc]

Cancel after Key(Escape)

[https://www.loom.com/share/280af60a23bd4df39c91d637e4845ef4|https://www.loom.com/share/280af60a23bd4df39c91d637e4845ef4]

There error comes from incorrect datetime in db To reproduce it. Assign a lesson to student with a current date (today) - tomorrow [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] front provides wrong date-time on assignment creation

November, 6 - November, 7 was picked in assignment dialog.

!assignment_front_wrong_dates_on_creation.png|width=1251,height=901!

[~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] explained that dates are correct - we *need* to handle all dates in UTC format. So this comment not actual.
[~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc] FYI:

* fixed case when student can be invited as collaborator
* fixed case when teacher, that logically can’t view template, can open it by direct link (from invite email too)

Now we have 2 collab invite logic: for registered and for unregistered users (both by email).


* In first case user will get email with direct link to the lesson. So button caption{{Accept invitation }}is incorrect, i believe.
* In second case, user (email) will get link, that redirect him to the registration page with pre-filled email. After registration he will be attached to the lesson as collaborator.



About redirect for unregistered:

If teacher add unregistered user as collaborator, this email will got different link, that will heading to registration page.
So if already registered and logged in user opens that link → he will be redirected to self dashboard, without attaching as collaborator to the lesson. This is logically correct behaviour.
If logged in teacher will log out from self account and opens that link → he will be redirect to the registration page, when he can register new account and become collaborator in that lesson.

Behaviour, when you click on the link and system will automatically log you out and redirect to the registration page is incorrect, i guess.

[~accountid:557058:7ae9d263-27ab-437c-9306-d8fad371f87c] FYI if you need some explanation or if i miss something, we can sync.

[https://www.figma.com/file/f3Jjyhjwnb9XJgWr9wtppn/Teacher?node-id=1043%3A0|https://www.figma.com/file/f3Jjyhjwnb9XJgWr9wtppn/Teacher?node-id=1043%3A0]
🤗👋 - сосиска машет ручкой а в другой руке папка. Облачко “Hi”
💻- сосиска за нотником активно печатает, можно показать в очках.
😀☺️😊 - радостная сосика с поднятыми руками и счастливым лицом.
😴- спящая сосиска за столом. Zzzz буковки рядом.
🤩- воодушевленная сосиска как кот из шрека с огромными глазами. Отправлять когда что-то очень понравилось.
🥳🎊🎉 - сосисочная вечерина. На главном плане сосиса с колпаком и штукой изо рта. Летают конфети. По бокам еще 2 персонажа чуть меньше.
🤓🧐- сосиска батан. Конечно в очках 2мя зубиками и с книжкой в руках. Одна рука поднята, типо, «я знаю ответ, ща скажу, слушайте меня внимательно».
☕️ - сосиска обнимает кофе и глаза домиком, типо счастлива. Кофе на вынос с дымком сверху.
😍❤️ - сосиска машет сердцами и глаза зажмурены от счастья.
😎 - дерзкая сосиса в очках от солнца и костюме.
😏- хитрый сосисон знающий решение и поднимающий пальчик, типо щас скажу.
🤔- недовольный сосисон с рукой у подбородка. Смотрит с призрением.
😨💊🦠 - заболел и лежит в кроватке под одеялом пушистым с градусником во рту и в поту.
📝 - сосиска пишет активно в тетради.
📖📚 - сосиса читает книгу
👏 - сосиска с флагом в руке с лендоса.
🔥 - сосиска в огне, готовая порвать и воодушевленная.
🤦‍♀️ - сосиска прикрывается книгой
😭- плачет, слезы на все тело и в лужу перетекают.
😂🤣 - ржущая сосиска, катающаяся по полу, как будто пресс качает.
😜🤪- крейзи рожа сосиски
🍔🍟🍕-сосиска между еды, огромная еда и сосиска между бургером, пиццей и колой с фри.
⚽️🏀🏐 - сосиска в форме, с повязкой на голове и с мячом - го катать.
🎮 - сосиска геймер с джойстиком перед теликом, показываем со спины.
🚀 - сосиска супермен, летит с плащом.
💡 - сосис читает и над головой 3 лампочки, пришли идеи.
💸💵💰 - сосискафсидит на горе. Денег в очках и сложенными руками - дерзкая
🚰🚽🛁 - сосиска в шапочке для бассейна выглядывает из шторки стоя ванной. Типо мыться)
👍🏻- сосиска показывает лайк, вся такая дерзка я и потокам стоят 2 других персонажа со сложенными руками на груди - типо одобряют.
🦾🦿 - сосиска айрон мен, машина, все могу все сделаю.
🧠 - сосиска в работе за лэптопом во круг цифры, формулы и буквы с теоремами. Вор хард

Notes:

{noformat} [~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6] изменения висят в {{TILT-7820}} ветке, пока не пушил (сломается весь фронт).

Будет круто если фронт сделает свою ветку с обновлёнными хендлерами для пагинации + списком точек, я потом солью и порезолвлю конфликты для бэка (они будут скорее всего, много файлов затронуто). Потом потестим смоуком на дэв сервере.

В идеале захендлить все эндпоинты, которые отдают список чего-то, что логически пагинируется. Я в списке выше мог упустить/пропустить некоторые места, слишком много точек. [~accountid:557058:dc97fe24-bdda-4965-9046-7974ad38ae38] отдаю на тебя задачу. Нужно созвониться с [~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6] , он расскажет детали. [~accountid:557058:1ea93978-7189-478c-802a-3ba4422731a6] обновил список в описании таски, все изменения лежат в TILT-10085

структура респонсов одинаковая везде:

{noformat}"data": [
        // some data array
    ],
    "meta": {
        "limit": 2, // limit
        "offset": 3, // offset
        "next": true, // is next page available
        "total": 5, // total pages can be retrieved with current limit
        "count": 9 // total items can be retrieved with current limit
    }{noformat}

Все ендпоинты из списка поддерживают параметры

{noformat}limit - int, min:1, max:100
offset - int, min:0{noformat}



Ещё будет пару итераций - добить что остались + поискать новые эндпоинты (добавляли с октября). Handled:

[~accountid:5d41b93199fa080dac248d12] target - Lesson: My Best Lesson, а что за target? [~accountid:557058:dc97fe24-bdda-4965-9046-7974ad38ae38] 

!image-20200921-130134.png|width=313,height=312!

Lesson “Main Template“
Workspace “Mad Devs School“ Я так понял это отдельно от общего текста хендлится. *Нотификации в тичерской:*

# Collaborate lesson invite:
#* type_id - 1
#* message - Some One {{invited you to work on the lesson.}}
#* target - Lesson: My Best Lesson
#* link (если есть) - teacher/templates/4174/edit
#* token - no
# Collaborate lesson template invite:

* type_id - 3
* message - Some One {{invited you to collaborate.}}
* target - Lesson: My Best Lesson
* link (если есть) - teacher/templates/4174/edit
* token - no

3. Invite collaborate to lesson template(*устарел*)::

* type_id - 4
* message - Some One {{invited you to collaborate in lesson template.}}
* target - Template: My Best Template
* link (если есть) - no
* token - no

[~accountid:5d41b93199fa080dac248d12] вот эти три вида нотификейшна, по сути, одно и то же: 1, 3, 4. Можно их объединить в один тип

4. Invite to team(*устарел*):

* type_id - 5
* message - Some One {{invited you to the team.}}
* target - Team: My Best Team
* link (если есть) - no
* token - no

[~accountid:5d41b93199fa080dac248d12] Invite to team - можно избавиться

5. Unshare lesson:

* type_id - 16
* message - Some One {{unshared the lesson with you.}}
* target - Lesson: My Best Lesson
* link (если есть) - no
* token - no

6. Unshare template(*устарел*):

* type_id - 17
* message - Some One {{unshared the template with you.}}
* target - Template: My Best Template
* link (если есть) - no
* token - no

[~accountid:5d41b93199fa080dac248d12] Unshare lesson и Unshare template тоже можно объединить и оставить только Unshare lesson

7. HR update|reject|approve document:

* type_id - 15
* message - Some One reject/update/approve {{your onboarding document.}}
* {{record_status}}-reject/update/approve
* target - Documents: {{Document management}}
* link (если есть) - {{teacher/account/document-management}}
* token - no

8. Workspace invitation:

* type_id - 18
* message - Some One accepted/declined {{your invitation}}
* target - Workspace: {{Workspace name}}

* link (если есть) - {{no}}
* token - no

9. Workspace invitation with action:

* type_id - 19
* message - Some One {{invited you to join the workspace.}}
* target - Workspace: {{Workspace name}}

* link (если есть) - {{no}}
* token - yes

10. Workspace invitation with action finished:

* type_id - 19
* message - Some One {{invited you to join the workspace.}}Invite accepted.
* target - Workspace: {{Workspace name}}

* link (если есть) - {{no}}
* token - yes

[~accountid:5d41b93199fa080dac248d12] HR и Workspace нотификации делал [~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6] , я могла что-то упустить тут, но в целом, такие виды нотификейшнов *Нотификации в HR:*

# Teacher created onboarding document:

* type_id - 13
* message - Some One {{uploaded new onboarding document.}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{/teachers/${id}/documents/management}}
* token - no

2. Teacher updated|rejected onboarding record

* type_id - 14
* message - Some One {{updated onboarding document.}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{/teachers/${id}/documents/management}}
* token - no

[~accountid:5daf4d1679a9390c30c734e6] проверь, правильно ли собрала *Нотификации в студенческой:*

# Lesson is available:

* type_id - 20
* message - {{Lesson "some lesson" is now available}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}}}
* token - no

 2. Lesson in progress:

* type_id - 21
* message - {{Lesson "some lesson" has started}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}}}
* token - no

3. Lesson finished:

* type_id - 22
* message - {{Lesson "some lesson" has finished}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}}}
* token - no

4. Lesson missed:

* type_id - 23
* message - {{You have missed "some lesson" lesson}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}}}
* token - no

5. Student was added to class:

* type_id - 24
* message - {{You have been added to this "some class" class}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{{`/classes/${notification.groupClass.id}`}}}
* token - no

6. Student was assigned to the lesson:

* type_id - 25
* message - {{You have been added to this "some class" class}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) - {{{`/classes/${notification.groupClass.id}`}}}
* token - no

7. Lesson start date changed

* type_id - 26
* message - {{Date for "some lesson" lesson is changed to ”assignment date”}}
* target - No
* link (если есть) -{{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}}}
* token - no

8. One day left lesson to be finished

* type_id - 27
* message - {{You have unfinished "some lesson" lesson.}} It’s only 1 day left to take this lesson
* target - No
* link (если есть) -{{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}}}
* token - no

9. One day left lesson to be finished

* type_id - 28
* message - {{You have not started "some lesson" lesson.}} It’s only 1 day left to take this lesson
* target - No
* link (если есть) -{{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}}}
* token - no

10.  Student can retake quiz

* type_id - 29
* message - {{You have "number of attempts" attempts left to retake "some activity name" quiz in lesson.}} 
* target - No
* link (если есть) -{{/lessons/${lesson.id}/assignments/${lesson.assignment.id}/quizzes/${activity.id}`}}
* token - no

смержила 2 часть рефакторинга, надо пройтись смоуком по след:

* Lesson standards selection in canvas ( убедиться что стандарты линкуются с уроком на канвасе, в визарде)
* Lesson mastery skills selection in canvas ( убедиться что мастери скиллы линкуются с уроком на канвасе)
* Store media comments in canvas ( убедиться что аудио, видео комменты добавляются)
* Quizzes store/display in canvas (создание, редактирование квиза, убедиться что все ок)
* Apply theme in canvas ( зааплайть тему, лэйауты на канвас, убедиться что все ок)
Fixed
Remark - in this version lesson’s state was get from {{/api/teacher/lesson-templates/{id}/state}}, we have task to change request endpoint for the {{/api/teacher/lessons/{id}/state}} \[TILT-7467]. [~accountid:557058:aa0d475c-712d-4039-803e-4f5df9c3da53] и [~accountid:5b044dd827dd77348bacbf34] занимаются этим. После того как они зальют свои изменения - эта проблема пропадет. Уже все обсудили, таск неактуален.
В ответе {{lessons/{id}/state}}приходит {{organisation_id}} (к которой относится урок).
Управление коллабораторами - читай добавление + удаление.

Флоу проверки (допуска) на управление коллабораторами:

# Если {{organisation_id}} урока == {{active_organisation_id}} тичера - проверяем permissions (can/can not {{invite_collaborators}}).
# Если {{organisation_id}}урока \!= {{active_organisation_id}}тичера - запрещаем управлять коллабораторами.

Второй пункт флоу о том, что тичер *не может* управлять коллабораторами, если его позвали коллаборатором в урок, но *может* управлять ними, если урок в воркспейсе, где тичер editor/owner, при условии что этот воркспейс сейчас активный для тичера.



Через данный флоу невозможно захендлить смену активного воркспейса на другой вкладке, а так-же удаление тичера из воркспейса. 
Эта проблема должна решаться комплексно, вместе с [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8224|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8224|smart-link] , [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8226|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8226|smart-link]  Upd:
обновлённые ответы от 
{{PUT /api/teacher/lessons/{id}/collaborators}} 
{{DELETE /api/teacher/lessons/{id}/collaborators}}
тут [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8124|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8124|smart-link]  (коммент про {{403 responses}})
Problem found, described.
Problem has same root causes as linked \[TILT-8122] bug
Will investigate deeper. В ответе {{lessons/{id}/state}}приходит список коллабораторов.
Так же приходит {{organisation_id}} (к которой относится урок).

Флоу проверки (допуска) на редактирование канваса:

* Если текущий учитель *в* списке коллабораторов - разрешаем canvas edit.
* Если текущий учитель *не в* списке коллабораторов:
** Если {{organisation_id}} урока == {{active_organisation_id}} тичера - проверяем permissions (can/can not edit lesson).
** Если {{organisation_id}}урока \!= {{active_organisation_id}}тичера - запрещаем редактирование.

Через данный флоу невозможно захендлить добавление/удаление тичера как коллаборатора, смену активного воркспейса на другой вкладке а так-же удаление тичера из воркспейса. 
Эта проблема должна решаться комплексно, вместе с [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8226|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8226|smart-link] , [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8224|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-8224|smart-link]

Main idea - extend unique settings (background color, background-image, position, is_published) into the different table with 2 pointers on user_id - created user, and template_id - lesson template id. 

Cons - additional table.

Pros - remove unnecessary columns in lesson templates, transparence logic, fast search (quck templates will be on main, fast response required).
What we need:

* Quick template customization CRUD - for creation wizard + options ability.
* Publish (make visible on main page).

Template creation steps can be used as and from ordinary lesson template.

Canvas edit can be used as and from ordinary lesson template.

Create lesson can be extended from ordinary lesson template. New API endpoints:

# Create QT
# Publish QT
# Unpublish QT
# Update QT parameters (title, icon, background color)
# Create lesson based on selected QT. We can use current cloning template functions. After sync with Dima found out that need API for turning smiple template into quick template.

Templates gets cloned when:

* saving to collection
* cloning to public
* cloning to team

In second case cloned template got

{noformat}public = false{noformat}

Need to add field 

{noformat}(bool)is_navigator_template (false by default){noformat}

, then we can determine and mark templates which 

{noformat}is_navigator_template = true 
public=true{noformat}

 with ribbons.

Notifications flow:

* Registered user has been invited by workspace-admin from invitation modal:
** Teacher will receive “You requested to join in \{workspace-name} workspace” with Accept / Decline buttons.
** On accept, workspace-admin will receive “\{name, profile link} has been accepted your invite request in \{workspace name} workspace“.
** On decline, workspace-admin will receive “\{name, profile-link} has been rejected your invite request in \{workspace name} workspace“.
* Non registered user has been invited via email by workspace admin from modal:
** Send email (need to create mandrill template).
** After registration teacher must be added in workspace.
* Teacher attempts to join from Join to Workspace modal:
** Workspace admin will receive “\{name, profile link} wants to join in \{workspace-name} workspace“ with Accept / Decline buttons.
** On accept, teacher will receive “Join request in \{workspace-name} has been approved“.
** On decline, teacher will receive “Join request in \{workspace-name} has been rejected“.
We need to add {{workspace_link}}(nullable, unique) field into organisation table.
Also update organisation creation endpoint - set {{workspace_link}} on creating.
Also update organisation creation during teacher registration.

[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] [~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc] 
FYI


Most of endpoints got middleware with some permission. Now these endpoints can return 403 if user has no rights to do something (related operation). 

Commit can break front-end logic (403 status instead of empty or ordinary response), so need check dashboard flows. 

Fastest hotfix can be done via workspace-permissions.php editing (just put true instead of false and make note about problem in task). Workspace admin cannot remove user or resend invite from team on free plan.

[https://www.loom.com/share/078331ddaa004770bbc87cf5d2e52465|https://www.loom.com/share/078331ddaa004770bbc87cf5d2e52465] Problem above irrelevant for current task, need separate task for front.

add viewer (+0)
add editor (+1)
set viewer as editor (+1)
remove editor (-1)

1 + 0 + 1 + 1 - 1 = 2 subscriptions (first one - me as owner)

!test_charging_1.png|width=2806,height=982!

!test_charging_2.png|width=2776,height=1106!


Грубо говоря - когда мы удалим урок, фронт крешнится если ему прилетит нотификация, которая была связана с этим уроком, так как в нотификации не будет полей да и вообще объекта урока. Например “коллаборация урока“, “вас пригласили в воркспейс“ и т.д.

С точки зрения логики, нотификация это что-то что случилось, и удалять её не самый лучший вариант, наверное.

Отсутствующие данные можно хэндлить фронтом, можно бэком.
Можно порефакторить нотификации, чтобы они записывали заготовленный текст + какие-то данные и возвращали его на фронт (тогда отпадёт проблема вообще дорабатывать новые типы нотификаций фронтом).
-
-
done with [https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-7734|https://lumicislate.atlassian.net/browse/TILT-7734|smart-link] commits.

[~accountid:70121:78d951cd-952b-49d7-b2fc-0f0edf03b8dc] ветка зальётся вместе с фронтом TILT-7821, пока тестить не нужно.
Migration added in separate branch for now, to unblock tomorrows huge lesson_assignments migration deploy.
In {{short-profile}} request added restriction {{workspace_num}}.

If user has plan different to {{free}} - {{workspace_num}} will be {{null}}, that means user can create unlimited amount of the workspaces.

If user has plan {{free}} - {{workspace_num}} will be {{integer}} and corresponds to how many user can create workspace for this moment. If {{workspace_num = 0}}, that means user can’t create workspace.

Also, {{PUT /teacher/organisation}} will return 403 if user can't create workspace.

{{short-profile}} response:

{noformat}...
currency: "gbp"
subscription_restrictions: {
  ...
  template_num: 10
  workspace_num: 1
  video_record_length: 40
  ...
},
...{noformat}
