```
With all clarification, status flow changes, test updates, documentation updates.
some updates will be required to the algorithm as well Предлагаю изменить реализацию управления статусами работы.
 Перенести логику управления статусами с фронта полностью на бэк. 
 Фронту с бэка будут приходить название доступных действий в зависимости от статуса работы.

Данные действия будут приходить в поле {color:#de350b}`actions`{color}  в виде массива. Они будут внутри объекта либо {color:#de350b}`Job`{color} либо {color:#de350b}`JobQuote`{color}, полученные по GET запросу на ***/api/v1/records/:job_id/model=Job*** для Кастомера и ***/api/v1/records/:job_quote_id/model=JobQuote*** для Провайдера.

Формат для {color:#de350b}actions{color} будет вот таким:
 **"actions"=>[\\{"complete"=>"Complete"}, \\{"cancel"=>"Cancel Job"}]**

где {color:#de350b}"cancel"{color} это ключ, который нужно будет отправить назад бэку, если пользователь выбрал это действие.
 а {color:#de350b}"Cancel Job"{color} это название для отображения действия на фронте.

Фронт будет отправлять PATCH запрос на бэк с указанием выбранного `action` пользователя на следующие маршруты:
   *`/api/v1/customer_jobs/:job_id`*для Кастомера, 
   *`/api/v1/provider_jobs/:job_quote_id`*для Провайдера.

Парамерты ответа для соблюдения единного стандарта необходимо отпрвлять в
 таком виде:
 для Провайдера:
 `

{ data:      

{ attributes:     \{ action: "cancel"   }}

}` 
 для Кастомера:
 `

{ data:   

{ attributes:      \{ action: 'cancel',     job_quote_id:   }}

}`

Также есть предложение отправлять текст вопросов для отображения на фронте в зависимости от статуса, чтобы в дальнейшем можно было его вынести в админку для управления. 
 В дополнение к этому предложено передавать цвет кнопок для `action`. [~vasily.toropchin] please write down in English. My comments:
 # Frontend still don't know how to represent these buttons, you need to put some marker for style of the button(confirm, cancel, neutral)
 # The following is for Customer instead I guess?

{ data:      
{ attributes:      action: "cancel"   }
}

 # For providers I don't under the last job_quote_id mention in the end:
`
{ data:   
{ attributes:      action: '',     job_quote_id:   }
}`

 # Please provide a way you give the text to be shown by the frontend
 # Please provide a way you to show several providers  (job_quotes) to the customer for selection actions: \{  { 'yes': 'Yes give me more', 'style' : 0} , \{ 'no': 'No, thank', 'style': 1 } }

where 'yes' is action, that is sent back.

          'Yes give me more' - button title
           Style - button style
job_message: 'Show me on the page'
Button styles :
0 = positive

1 = negative
2 = neutral.

У нас есть эндпоинт. *GET* {{/api/v1/jobs}}

Необходимо добавить к нему параметры для эндпоинта для сортировки по полю
 # job-state
 # title
 # provider-full-name
 # deadline
 # created-date

и так же параметр сортировки

Например /api/v1/jobs?field=title&sort=desc

Сортирует по полю title в обратном порядке если нам нужен алфавитный порядок, то параметр sort=desc не указываем

По дефолту сортируем по полю date

For example 

Install aws cli 

[https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/userguide/install-cliv2.html]

 

Export cred 

 
{code:java}
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID="aaaaa"
export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY="aaaaaaaaa"
export AWS_DEFAULT_REGION="eu-central-1"
{code}
 

Upload files 

 
{code:java}
aws s3 cp ~/Documents/download.png s3://sorted-house-staging-bucket/
upload: Documents/download.png to s3://sorted-house-staging-bucket/download.png

{code}
 

 

Ls files 

 
{code:java}
aws s3 ls s3://sorted-house-staging-bucket/
2020-06-08 11:19:48       2164 download.png

{code}
 

External URL for staging bucket

[https://sorted-house-staging-bucket.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/download.png]

 

External url for test bucket 

[https://sorted-house-test-bucket.s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/download.png]

I properly configured aws s3 settings but for some reason files were saving locally.

I investiagated the problem and found that storage was hardcoded in tramway gem.

I removed hardcode: [feature/SOR-515|https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/tramway/-/merge_requests/1]

I tried to upload files and got *AuthorizationHeaderMalformed* error.

I asked DevOps Dmitrii to check settings inside aws s3, so I could connect and check that everything works.

I also removed .env file from index, so nobody could get private credentials.

[^Sorted API Call 29062020 Feedback.rtf] As discussed and agreed with my good friend Vasily

 

Customer sign up process. 
 # Initial creation of record.
 # Completed sign-up.
 # Change of information (marketing preference).

 
 Provider sign up process
 # Initial creation of record.
 # Completed sign-up.
 # Change of information (new service, postcode)
 # Change of status - active / inactive / waiting (verification).

 
 Job status
 # Creation of record - customer only.
 # Job completed - post to relevant Provider record.
 # Paid. 
 # Rating.

  Example accepted post provided from Vasily and processed via the API.   Success :)

At the point a job is marked as complete (by either a customer or a provider) the provider should receive a notification reminding them to pay us our fee (Notification 4 and 27). This can be set up as an Internal, SMS and Email notification and we can pause whichever we want. We will likely use a lot of email and internal to save money on SMS expenditure).7 days after the job has been marked as complete, another notification should be sent to state that payment is overdue and, if the fee is not paid in 7 days, then their account will be paused and no new job leads received. The wording for these notifications is as follows:*Email*: “It has been 7 days since we were told that this job was complete. Please follow the link below to make a payment for our fee for this job. If we don’t receive a payment in the next 7 days, your account will be placed on pause, meaning you won’t receive any new job leads until you make the payment. If you have any issues with this job or making payments, please contact us on [info@sortedhouse.com|mailto:info@sortedhouse.com]. Thank you for using Sorted House.”*SMS*: “Please pay our fee for this job to avoid your account being paused in 7 days”*Internal*: “Please pay our fee for this job to avoid your account being paused in 7 days”13 days after the job has been marked as complete, a second reminder reiterates the message sent after 7 days. The wording for these notifications is as follows:
 ** 
*Email*: “As of tomorrow, your debt to sorted house will have been outstanding for 14 days. Please make payment within the next 24 hours or your account will be paused and you will no longer receive further job offers. If you have any issues with this job or making payments, please contact us on [info@sortedhouse.com|mailto:info@sortedhouse.com].”*SMS*: “Please pay our fee for this job now to prevent your account being paused in 24 hours”*Internal*: “Please pay our fee for this job now to prevent your account being paused in 24 hours”14 days after the job has been marked as complete, the provider’s account is put on pause and they can only un-pause the account by making payment for the outstanding fee. The wording for these notifications is as follows:*Email*: “Your account is now paused due to lack of payment. You will not receive further job leads until this debt has been cleared. Please follow the link below to make a payment for our fee for this job. If you have any issues with this job or making payments, please contact us on [info@sortedhouse.com|mailto:info@sortedhouse.com].”*SMS*: “Your account has now been paused. Please pay our fee for this job to receive job leads again.”*Internal*: “Your account has now been paused. Please pay our fee for this job to receive job leads again.” Make deadline default time as 09:00 for the date user put. We need this to send proper notifications to provider and customer about deadlined jobs last comment is not in place [~samat.jukeshov], 
It is here in those lines. I've made it a bit different. Now it doesn't matter what time the deadline, only date matters.

`jobs = with_job_state(:under_review, :job_pending, :in_progress).where('deadline <= ?', Date.current.end_of_day)` LGTM
As a provider during the sign up we are adding documents like in [https://www.figma.com/file/qFVEfR6nar8QYuGmU7oasp/sortedhouse?node-id=282%3A230]

or   [https://frontend.sortedhouse.com/acc/381e6f3d-4280-4950-988b-c6b6c86d1ce3/Provider?activeTab=info] ([nehaca@getnada.com|mailto:nehaca@getnada.com] / 123456) and there we need ability to store all files provider added, so we would have a history of them. Right now we store only the latest files for a provider like in [https://backend.sortedhouse.com/admin/records?model=Document&scope=all] and [https://backend.sortedhouse.com/admin/records/559?model=Provider] (Company incorporation certificate, Photo identification, Employee liability insurance certificate, Company address). We need to store and show all of them in Provider's page on admin panel [~vasily.toropchin] we reassign this to you, so [~salamaudavid] could work on other Tramway related issues  Show providers documents history

Commit: [https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/backend/-/merge_requests/160/diffs?commit_id=d1205f68f03eaf9e05d5855e42741f8f6a1cb238] [~hektodaleky] According to the task frontend updates should be implemented.

For the payment request new parameter _transaction_type_ with the values:
 * manual_job_payment
 * online_job_payment

 

*POST /api/v1/payments*

_For manual payment request:_

{
  "data": {
    "attributes": {
      "job_id": ["766a88a3-4d9b-4a3e-bdd5-a51af9c0c24b"],
      "transaction_type": "manual_job_payment"
    }
  },
  "payment": {}
}

 

 

_Response:_

{
  "data": {
    "id": "afb9ddad-8c24-4b5e-bc87-ded76825d7b1",
    "type": "transactions",
    "attributes": {
      "invoice-url": "/system/uploads/job/invoice/766a88a3-4d9b-4a3e-bdd5-a51af9c0c24b/afb9ddad-8c24-4b5e-bc87-ded76825d7b1.pdf",
     "status": 200
    }
  }
}

 

_For online payment request:_

{
  "data": {
    "attributes": {
      "job_id": ["766a88a3-4d9b-4a3e-bdd5-a51af9c0c24b"],
      "transaction_type": "online_job_payment"
    }
  },
  "payment": {}
}

_Response:_

{
  "data": {
    "id": "3de8bbcd-304c-4994-8255-ee8dd3f6a378",
    "type": "transactions",
    "attributes": { 
      "payment-page-url": null,
      "status": 401
    }
   }

'task[SOR-37]: address formatted' [Almasbek uulu Kairat|https://gitlab.com/kairatalmasbekov] mentioned this issue in [a commit of sortedhouse/frontend|https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/frontend/commit/24c75c4fe87c88ac8f867306d6035765ab2e2e6e]:
'task[SOR-37]: address specified correctly' Создание работы и статусы работы
1. Работа создается Кастомером.
  После того как Кастомер отправил запрос на создание работы, у работы появится статус - created.
  Это изначальный статус работы.
2. После этого запускается алгоритм поиска подходящего провайдера для работы.
  Алгоритм поиска запускается каждые 5 минут (сейчас такие настройки).
  В это время работа статус работы меняется на - searching.
3. В случае если провайдер не найдет, статус работы изменяется на - providers_not_found.
  Кастомер получит уведомление о том, что невозможно найти провайдера для работы.
  По сути, дальше поиски не продолжаются. Возможно, следует извинится перед Кастомером и предложить попрбовать еще раз.
4. В случае если провайдер найдет, тогда работа менят статус на = providers_found.
 И создается job_quote (запрос на выполенение), который связан с работой и отправляется провайдеру.
 Провайдеру приходит уведомление о том, что поступил запрос на работу, а также появляется запись о приглашении на выполение работы (job_quote). У данного запроса на работу статус = requested. Для провайдера здесь необходимо будет проверить наличие запрос на работу.
 Теперь провайдеру нужно предоставить выбор - либо принять запрос на работу и озвучить цену, либо отклонить его.
 Кастомеру также приходит уведомление, что отправлено приглашение на работу.
4.1. Если провайдер отклоняет приглашение, тогда статус job_quote = refused.
    У самой работы статус не меняется. Поиск провайдеров продолжается.
    Кастомер получит уведомление, что не приняли запрос на работу.
4.2. Если провайдер принимает приглашение, тогда статус job_quote = given.
  т.е. нужно будет со стороны Провайдера нужно будет отправить update на job_quote с указанием
  цены и состояие статуса (см. доку)
  У работы также меняется статус job = accepted.
  Кастомер получит уведомление, что приглашение на работу принято. [Almasbek uulu Kairat|https://gitlab.com/kairatalmasbekov] mentioned this issue in [a commit of sortedhouse/frontend|https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/frontend/commit/d7b8a32f3e028b4f1580f9da0de43a73dceb9c36]:

'task[SOR-37]: load cats' [Almasbek uulu Kairat|https://gitlab.com/kairatalmasbekov] mentioned this issue in [a commit of sortedhouse/frontend|https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/frontend/commit/b095e01e0ad5b2ef711e017e3d827a4d0144b722]:
'task[SOR-37]: load cats' [Almasbek uulu Kairat|https://gitlab.com/kairatalmasbekov] mentioned this issue in [a commit of sortedhouse/frontend|https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/frontend/commit/00fe74fd504e4cd03939cdaafa734473230cb992]:

[~saul.gowens] [~iain] decide to get rid of this functionality and just put consent to the moment when new file will be uploaded {panel:title=Slack conversation}


[Iain Dalby|https://app.slack.com/team/UM47ZDRE2]  [5:20 PM|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/archives/CLQM6JGM9/p1581938408014700]

[@Samat Jukeshov|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/team/UM23B5J4Q] and [@Saul G|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/team/UM3UT9GCF] - I've just spoken to [@Andy Burrell|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/team/UM47ZD9BQ] regarding our conversation on the pictures requiring consent from the customer before upload. We need to stick to our original plan of gaining consent from the customer. Andy reminded me that one of our selling points that we will push once we launch is that our reviews (in the form of photos) can't be faked. If we change to what we discussed this morning, and put our trust in the provider, then we open ourselves up to potential issues.We will speak to our providers once they come on board and tell them that, when they do a job and take photos of it, they should upload them ASAP (ideally when they are with the customer and the job is complete) and then the customer can react to the notification asking them to verify the photos (whether this be by an email link or a link via SMS?) which will help to avoid the customer potentially ignoring/missing the request.We could still keep the disclaimer that Saul wrote, to keep ourselves very safe?When a customer has been matched with a provider and they looks at the provider's portfolio, there should be a message at the top stating: "All photos in this portfolio are verified by customers and are taken from actual jobs that were completed via Sorted House."We would still like to retain the ability as an Admin to upload photos to a provider's portfolio (which is especially helpful when they are newly registering an account)
 
 
[Samat Jukeshov|https://app.slack.com/team/UM23B5J4Q]  [5:23 PM|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/archives/CLQM6JGM9/p1581938605016400]

[@Iain Dalby|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/team/UM47ZDRE2] how we have to differentiate photos from Sortedhouse jobs from photos Provider send during his sign up then? We need to show completed work images in some different place or what?
 
 
[Iain Dalby|https://app.slack.com/team/UM47ZDRE2]  [5:26 PM|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/archives/CLQM6JGM9/p1581938804019400]

For photos submitted when the provider signs up, these are still "verified by Sorted House" photos as they form part of our on-boarding verification. The onus is on us to ensure that they are genuine photos and find their source when we are vetting the provider.Would it make sense to differentiate between the two in some way? So initial uploaded pictures are verified by Sorted House and further photos submitted from jobs we have sent them fall under "verified by Sorted House customer"?
 
 
[Samat Jukeshov|https://app.slack.com/team/UM23B5J4Q]  [5:38 PM|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/archives/CLQM6JGM9/p1581939519020600]

[@Iain Dalby|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/team/UM47ZDRE2] so we have to stop giving opportunity to provider add any photos except our Jobs? Basically Provider won't be able to add new images into his Portfolio after he was activated?
----new messages
 
 
[Iain Dalby|https://app.slack.com/team/UM47ZDRE2]  [6:43 PM|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/archives/CLQM6JGM9/p1581943383022100]

Yes - once registered, the only way the provider wold be able to add images to their portfolio would be to complete a job and then getting the customer to verify the photo when they uploaded it at the end of the job. Admin should still have the ability to upload images to a provider's portfolio for them, as obviously they may not upload any on initial registration.{panel} [~vasily.toropchin] would you please clarify how and where Provider can upload these files at all?

[https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/backend/-/blob/develop/docs/api.md#publishing-photos-after-compliting-job] I don't see endpoint for images upload at all [~samat.jukeshov] in the system there two different objects. 
First one is called PreviousWorks, which is available for initial uploading of files during registration, from Provider Profile or from Admin Panel, if needs be. And it has limit of only 5 pictures.
The second one is called ReviewFile, and it is connected to the job completed by the Provider. These files should be actual pictures of work completed and they are supposed to be published only with the consent of the Customer. So, they have states which indicates if the certain file is allowed to be published. And if it doesn't then the frontend will not show them. I just need to consult with [~kalashnikovisme] how we've implemented this option. 
It turned out that the system is missing endpoint to return all ReviewFile by Provider or Customer. 
However, endpoint to add ReviewFile is in the system. And there is a description for it in the API doc. 
Here is the endpoint to add ReviewFile:
### Review Files

## Create

**POST** `/api/v1/records?model=ReviewFile`

Params structure:

```
\{
  data: \{
    attributes: \{
      job_id:,
      file:
    }
  }
}

Так, следующие выводы: 

Если указать переменную: 

NODE_ENV=production

Возникает ошибка:
Step 12/15 : RUN  yarn run build
  ---> Running in 10a1ea96faa5
 yarn run v1.21.1
 $ craco build
 /bin/sh: 1: craco: not found
 error Command failed with exit code 127.
 info Visit https://yarnpkg.com/en/docs/cli/run for documentation about this command.
 The command '/bin/sh -c yarn run build' returned a non-zero code: 127
 ERROR: Job failed: exit code 1


Нужно разбираться с зависимостями 

Ecли использовать 
 
NODE_ENV=development

Ошибки не возникает.


В Dockerfile добавил переменные: 

ARG REACT_APP_API_V1_URL
ARG REACT_APP_BACKEND_URI
ARG NODE_ENV=development

ENV REACT_APP_API_V1_URL=$REACT_APP_API_V1_URL
ENV REACT_APP_BACKEND_URI=$REACT_APP_BACKEND_URI
ENV NODE_ENV=$NODE_ENV

При сборке в пайплане для нужного стейджа указываю нужные аргументы.  old ticket to close

{panel:title=Комментарий от Эмира}
привет, у меня походу не получится завтра, не оч со здоровьем. Я просто распишу по пунктам, что нужно сделать, чтобы не было косяков.

1) линтер и форматирование

Нужно настроить линтер используя следующие конфиги: eslint-config-airbnb, eslint-config-prettier, eslint-plugin-react-perf.
Дополнить хуком для автоформатирание через Prettier (pretty-quick с husky) и проверку линтера (я Алисе уже показывал, она в своем проекте уже должна была это сделать)
В пайплайн добавить проверку линтером, не прошел = не замерджил.

И при этом очень важно проверять, что ошибки линтера просто так не берутся и не отключаются построчно.

2) Мусор в проекте

Нужно удалить абсолютно все, что не используется. Под чистую. Судя по проекту у вас должно быть из кода только:
- реакт
- линтеры/форматирование
- какие-то css тулзы
- верстка
- роутер

И все. Какие-то утилзы, клевые штуки для импортов, сторы вам пока вообще не дались.

3) Структура проекта

Уже миллион раз придумали штуки как Atomic и т.д. Посмотрите/спиздите/решите как лучше структурировать код.

4) дока 
добавьте документацию. Как раз расписывая, что используете и главное нафига вы поймете, что нужно, а что нет.


Если сделаете эти четыре пункта, то сразу считайте, что решили косяки с аудита, а в дальнейшем это вам поможет лажать меньше.
Так же стоит устроить пост-мортем почему так произошло и обсудить это с Владом. Возможно вам нужна помощь.

 # Make Bookings first tab Customer see by default
[~vasily.toropchin] could you please pinpoint to place where frontend developer should get Customer Location for a job exactly? [~samat.jukeshov], so the concept here is that Job has it is own location. So the Job object with have the location related object in it. And there is information regarding the job's location.
So, when a fronend requests a job it will get all the related information in respect to the location. Of course, if the location was added. I think that guys could use either Postcode itself, or more likely they will user coordinates in locations with X and Y in it. Where X is latitude and Y is longitude.

In addition, there is a county and town. But not always present.
 However, I don't know exactly what is needed for frontend. [~samat.jukeshov] probably, we should add some info for location in the Admin panel, like coordinates, county and town. What do you say? При использовании селекта добавил вывод сообщения, но есть две проблемы:

'Merge branch 'SOR-361' into 'develop'' *Home Page*

Please change the text in the banner to: Find a local tradesperson

At Sorted House, we put the word out to tradespeople in your area and you’ll automatically be recommended our top-rated provider who is available to do your job.

 

*Home Page/Sub Service Pages*

In terms of UX, we have had a couple of users confused when testing the search as they haven't realised they can type in the Services box. Can you copy the style seen here at Checkatrade - [https://www.checkatrade.com/] ? So, a user clicks in the box and a cursor flashes, no drop down is presented. As soon as the user hits the first key, the dropdown menu appears.

 

*FAQ Section*

In the FAQ mentioning what tradespeople need to apply, please change the number of references required from 5 to 3.

 

*General Question*

In the back end, how do we drop in tracking codes for Google Analytics like we previously did on the WordPress site?

 

See attached file for 'services' page for discussion tomorrow.

*042*
 On the provider’s Information page, there is a line of text that states “Please provide us with the following information” but the files are there, so this line of text is unnecessary. Can the title and menu entry be changed from “Information” to “Documents”, please? 

*043*
Can the title and menu entry be changed from “Qualification” to “Qualifications”, please?

*045*Change the “Seeing is Believing” text to:In today's world of fake news and paid for reviews, it's not always easy to know who you can trust.At Sorted House, our tradespeople leave photos of work completed through jobs we've sent them, which are then verified by the customer.We don't use a star rating review system and at Sorted House ratings can’t be faked. When you submit a job through us, we send it to our list of vetted providers to find you our top-rated recommendation. Описание сервиса, что за проблему решает и как решает
2. Описание архитектуры, как оно работает
3. Описание какие решения были выбраны для реализации (какая архитектура в мобилках, на беке и все остальное. Используемые технологии)
4. Все сомнительные решения и костыли должны быть задокументированы в коде и расставлены подсказки для будущих поколений
5. Архитектурные схемы будут плюсом
6. Дока по инфре и эксплутации
7. Кастомные процессы разработки должны быть тоже задокументированы

[~iain] please clarify the following feedback:
 # - Text when confirming email address - Needs changed. *What Changes?*
 # - The Terms and Conditions displayed are for a provider, not a customer. *Would you please send me Terms & Conditions for Customer then?*
 # - Following on from above, it has pulled the address through with only a number and the postcode. Google Maps had a popup saying it wasn't configured correctly, but the location is correct on the map. If I choose to edit the address, the same form from Sign Up is present. It is asking me to manually add an entire address into one box - not User Friendly (e.g. as both fields are mandatory, it's possible to add postcode twice as it feels natural to add you entire address into the bottom box since that what it asks). - I know we need to talk about Google Maps from a post you put on the board the other day - [@Saul G|https://sortedhouse-maddevs.slack.com/team/UM3UT9GCF] was wanting to talk about this I think? I don't know if we need the level of integration (e.g. being able to move the map around, zoom etc.), we were just wanting a picture of the map that the User (provider) could click on and it would take them externally to Google Maps (which they could then use for directions if they were using their phone, for example). *Google Maps are not expensive at all, do you want to talk about it cause of the cost or some other reason?*
 # - Notifications are turned on as default but we didn't ask this during the sign up process. I think this was discussed at some point for providers but not sure if this is allowed for customers by GDPR (mainly the Marketing emails option). For SMS, it can be argues that these are service messages so must be kept on, but I think we had addressed this for providers. Currently a customer could turn these off which would mean it would be hard for us to get in touch with them? *I didn't understand your point, what do you want after all? Do we need to bring back these notifications into Sign Up?*
 # - Customer can add a profile picture/avatar but the popup box addresses the User as if they are a provider (text has been shared from provider account). However, we aren’t sure if we need to give customers the ability to add a photo. These wouldn’t be monitored by Sorted House or require approval, so we think this option should be disabled. *When provider gets a job or something we want to show the Customer's avatar or photo, do you really want to remove functionality which already works?*
 # - When supplying references, same issue with input of Contact Number- **We need to supply GDPR text for this** *Would you please provide the text and exact place you want to put it in?* 1. **

Please change "_The input is not valid E-mail!_" to "Please enter a valid email address"

Please change "_The input is not valid E-mail! Two emails that you enter is inconsistent!_" to "The email address entered does not match"

3. 

Can you give us an idea on the cost? I will talk further on this point with Andy and Saul if you can give me a rough estimate.

 

4. 

As with 3, I will discuss with Saul the best route on this, as I am worried that we won't be able to turn on email notifications without consent first. I could be wrong on this however, so will confirm how we want to go ahead.

 

5.

Potentially we want to remove this as we are unsure if customers would want any picture of themselves being available to tradespeople. As it would not be monitored, it would be open to abuse (explicit/illegal images etc.). The only way round this would be to give the customer a selection of default avatars to choose from to prevent it from looking blank when the provider viewed the job? I think we will want to remove this but, with 3 and 4, please let me discuss and confirm first.

I will collaborate with Saul on this one and provide text.

'SOR-321 - feedback fixes' # Apologies if there has been confusion caused on this with my explanation. If you would rather we discuss it on Friday so we are clear, we will be happy to do so. I will try and explain more what I mean here though to give you a better idea. I have attached an example which is extremely common for address entry on a website. You can see that Postcode is asked for first, and they have the option to find address, which then normally just requires a user to enter their door number/building name. I know we don't have that functionality (as I presume it is a paid extra) and I am also aware that full postcode is our primary piece of information. However, the current format used in the design is confusing in its layout. Can we add the individual cells for each part of the address (as shown in the attachment) and make them all mandatory, keeping postcode entry first? It is clear to the User that they need to give us the full address and prevents a confusing UX (it wasn't clear to me how to write the full address into the cell in the current design)._!Sorted House - Address Example.JPG|width=402,height=389! _                                                                                                               
 # I tried to upload a variety of files, all of which had extensions that were permissible, and after clicking submit it attempted to upload them and failed. This happened each time I tried with the same files. I was only able to upload one type of extension (.jpg) successfully to get past this stage of the process.

 

 # I see. I should be able to click the link and be taken straight through. Are you able to confirm what my password is, in case it is auto-filled incorrectly, causing an issue?

 

_I have a couple of answers to previous questions having spoke with Andy:_

*Google Maps*: For our providers, particularly those using the service on their mobiles, the normal practice we want is that a provider can click on the location in the from of a map image which will them open in their maps app (Apple Maps or Google Maps) which then gives them the ability to have it act as a Sat Nav. This is good UX for providers to be able to use it to find the location, which wouldn't work if they have an interactive map, as it wouldn't open externally. We had this feature in our previous native iOS app and it was popular with providers as when they are out and about, they can quickly get an idea of where the customer is located and plan their work diary accordingly.

*Customer Images*: I can confirm that we want to disable the ability for customers to have images and keep the feature for providers.

 

 

Still awaiting confirmation:

Customer Notification Permissions:  I am still discussing this with Saul but a potential solution might be to split the permissions in the account between service emails and marketing emails? SMS notifications are service only (again, we may have to explain this in writing in the account). Will confirm this with Saul fully after we discuss it.

*GDPR text:* As above, I am waiting for confirmation from Saul on this, but the line of text will read something like: "Under GDPR, you must ensure you have consent from your references for Sorted House to contact them." only 1 sub-ticket is waiting for resolution. Change Text: We need to update you with job alerts and job related notifications. For the best experience, please select your preferred method of notification. You need to select one to proceed.


Missing step: < when does the mobile number verification apply >?

backend, can we add an extra +5 miles to the selected distance. ie. 25 at the front = 30 in the back end. 


Screen 14: Typo (Milles Radius) > (in miles) 
backend, can we add an extra +5 miles to the selected distance. ie. 7 at the front = 12 in the back end. 


Screen 15: Can we show the selected postcode + radius please. So the user knows what they are confirming.


Screen 18: Add text. “Please tell us about any relevant qualifications or certificates you may have to support your application. Don’t worry if you don’t have anything relevant to submit as we understand not all services require qualifications or certificates”

Please add ‘skip’ option in the same way it is applied on Screen 25

_Screen 26 - what format (jpg, png) or max size (MB?) or preferred orientation (e.g. portrait or landscape?) is suggested for the images_ Design is good, just one question. Since a provider could be a big company who have a number of divisions, they may offer multiple services which different people work for. E.g. they have a garden division who can work in a 50 mile radius of NE32 5JA but also have a plumber who can only work in a 25 mile radius of NE32 5XZ. How is this shown to the provider within their account, so they know the right radius is selected for the right service, or if they want to increase or decrease the radius? ready, steady, go

[~Yann] maybe this task can be done in Admin Panel [~leonov.rs@gmail.com], here [~r.krasnov] is asking:

During the execution and testing of redirects, I found that redirects do not quite fit.
I would like to clarify about redirects.
Magento has the ability to do semantic urls and redirects, but they work in different ways.
There is a request path - this is teacher/name, and the target path is teacher/view/id
if you set a 301 redirect, then when you click on the teacher/name link, it will redirect to teacher/view/id.
If the request path and the target path are reversed, then nothing will be received, since the redirect will happen on a nonexistent page.
I need to understand why a 301 redirect is needed. If this is so critical, then perhaps a solution will have to be a router (this is not a difficult task).
But, if we take products in Magento as an example, then each product has an original path catalog/ product/view/id, which can have a semantic path tackets/jacket-yellow/. The main code in the magento on the pages contains exactly catalog/product/view/id, which goes as a target path.
To generate tackets/jacket-yellow/  in the address bar and on the pages Urls rewrites are used, but not redirects.
Therefore, it is important to understand why redirects are needed. If they are needed, I will try to add a router. If they are not needed, then I do everything by analogy with the products. We discussed the task with [~leonov.rs@gmail.com] and [~r.krasnov], and we decided that [~r.krasnov] will test his solution before implementing and discuss it with Roman. 

  [~r.krasnov], please see https://jira.topica.vn/browse/EVAB-190 and https://jira.topica.vn/browse/ETBA-29 [~luandv] Hi! Could you please tell me do we have automatic generation of teachers in sitemap.xml?

*2. Why the same products have different URLs:* 
Example:

[https://edumall.vn/phan-mem-ke-toan/ke-toan-quan-tri]

[https://edumall.vn/chien-luoc-kinh-doanh-online/ke-toan-quan-tri]

According the task about Updating URL structure, product should have just one URL with its category!!! [~leonov.rs@gmail.com] Does this case have a lot? [~leonov.rs@gmail.com] 

i have redirect 301 for two case follow:
 # base_url/\{productname} ->  base_url/\{last_category}/productname
 # base_url/course/\{productname.html} ->  base_url/\{last_category}/productname}

 with the case

[https://edumall.vn/phan-mem-ke-toan/ke-toan-quan-tri]  -> base_url/\{parentcategory}/\{productname}-

[https://edumall.vn/chien-luoc-kinh-doanh-online/ke-toan-quan-tri] -> base_url/\{last_category}/\{productname}

is there new case.

So, have alot of case. i'll redirect this case to true url

!image-2020-06-04-15-13-00-819.png! [~leonov.rs@gmail.com][~alec@topica.asia]
Hello! Please pay attention for this comment how to set up this task on production.
So to make this blog working correctly do the following:
1. Go to the admin here *Content > Better Blog > Configuration* and  set this fields in *General tab*:
   1.1. Delete *URL Suffix* not to show .html in the end of URL.
   1.2. Set *Display Blogs Mode* as *Grid View*
   1.3. set *Choose blog's color* as *#3e3d3c*
   Open *Comments tab* and set:
  1.4. *Type of comment *as *Disable Completely*
  Open tab *Social Sharing* and set:
  1.5. *Enable* as *No*
  Open section *Blog Home Page Open Graph* and set all fields for open graph tags. Image should be this value 
https://dvch1hlupt.cdn.hostvn.net/default/default-thumbnail.png

See screenshot  !screenshot (2).png|thumbnail!  !screenshot (1).png|thumbnail!  !screenshot.png|thumbnail! 

2. Open Content > Better Blog > Manage Tags > open tag:
Set this values to show open graph and meta tags as shown on screenshot
 !screenshot (3).png|thumbnail! 

3. Open  Content > Better Blog > Categories > open category
Set everything as show on the screenshot
 !screenshot (4).png|thumbnail!

!image-2020-07-07-12-56-01-614.png! [~puzanov@gmail.com] I have checked the issue with mobile version on the screenshot and found that this big gap is because of this code in jquery app/design/frontend/Edumall/winstrike/web/js/main.js
 !Screenshot from 2020-07-07 11-16-12.png|thumbnail! 

So when we load the page in desktop screen size it shows this styles for all media breakpoints. But if we reload the page it will work normally.
This is because JS is triggering when we loading the page. I think that we can leave this as it doesn't brake the page when we load it on real phone.
This shows broken page just during resizing screen in the browser.

{code:java}
fastcgi_buffers 4 32k;
fastcgi_buffer_size 32k;

Copy configs [vpc.tf|http://vpc.tf], [outputs.tf|http://outputs.tf] and some content from old configs in master branch. When deploy vpc have a problem with s3 backend, fix it by creating bucket 



{noformat}provider "aws" {
region = "eu-central-1"
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "terraform_state" {
bucket = "terraform-up-and-running-state-2020-testing"
# Prevent accidental deletion of this S3 bucket
lifecycle {
prevent_destroy = true
}
# Enable versioning so we can see the full revision
#history of our
# state files
versioning {
enabled = true
}
# Enable server-side encryption by default
server_side_encryption_configuration {
rule {
apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
sse_algorithm = "AES256"
}
}
}
}

and change state tf file
terraform {
  backend "s3" {
    bucket  = "terraform-up-and-running-state-2020-testing"
    key     = "global/s3/terraform.tfstate"
    region  = "eu-central-1"
    encrypt = "true"
  }
}{noformat}

{noformat}output "teacherly_vpc_id" {
  value = module.teacherly_vpc.vpc_id

output "teacherly_private_subnets" {

}{noformat} change [vpc.tf|http://vpc.tf] as old file in master branch 

{noformat}data "aws_availability_zones" "available" {}

resource "null_resource" "teacherly_subnets" {
  count = "${var.az_count}"

  triggers {
    # calculates private and public(offset 100) subnets and availability_zones by availability zone count
    private_subnets     = "${cidrsubnet("${var.cidr}", 8, count.index)}"
    database_subnets    = "${cidrsubnet("${var.cidr}", 8, count.index + 100)}"
    elasticache_subnets = "${cidrsubnet("${var.cidr}", 8, count.index + 150)}"
    public_subnets      = "${cidrsubnet("${var.cidr}", 8, count.index + 200)}"
    azs                 = "${data.aws_availability_zones.available.names[count.index]}"
  }
}

module "teacherly_vpc" {
  source = "../terraform-modules/aws-vpc"

  name = "${local.name}"
  cidr = "${var.cidr}"

  azs                 = ["${null_resource.teacherly_subnets.*.triggers.azs}"]
  private_subnets     = ["${null_resource.teacherly_subnets.*.triggers.private_subnets}"]
  public_subnets      = ["${null_resource.teacherly_subnets.*.triggers.public_subnets}"]
  database_subnets    = ["${null_resource.teacherly_subnets.*.triggers.database_subnets}"]
  elasticache_subnets = ["${null_resource.teacherly_subnets.*.triggers.elasticache_subnets}"]

  enable_nat_gateway   = false
  enable_vpn_gateway   = false
  enable_dns_hostnames = true
  enable_dns_support   = true

  tags = {
    Name        = "${local.name}"
    Environment = "${terraform.env}"
  }
}
{noformat}

get an error

restore content in previous value with some additional blocks



{noformat}data "aws_availability_zones" "available" {}

resource "null_resource" "teacherly_subnets" {
  count = var.az_count
  
  triggers =  {
    # calculates private and public(offset 100) subnets and availability_zones by availability zone count
    database_subnets    = "${cidrsubnet("${var.cidr}", 8, count.index + 100)}"
    elasticache_subnets = "${cidrsubnet("${var.cidr}", 8, count.index + 150)}"
    public_subnets      = "${cidrsubnet("${var.cidr}", 8, count.index + 200)}"
    azs                 = "${data.aws_availability_zones.available.names[count.index]}"
  }


}

module "teacherly_vpc" {
  source = "../terraform-modules/aws-vpc"

  name = "${var.name}"
  cidr = "${var.cidr}"
  
  azs             = ["eu-central-1a", "eu-central-1b"]
  database_subnets    = ["10.0.21.0/24", "10.0.22.0/24"]
  elasticache_subnets = ["10.0.31.0/24", "10.0.32.0/24"]
  public_subnets  = ["10.0.101.0/24", "10.0.102.0/24"]

  enable_nat_gateway   = false
  enable_vpn_gateway   = false
  enable_dns_hostnames = true
  enable_dns_support   = true

  tags = {
    Name        = "${local.name}"
    Environment = "${terraform.workspace}"
  }

}{noformat} Check configs, commit in repo create MR sync with Dmirii

'Merge branch 'SOR-211' of https://gitlab.com/sortedhouse/frontend into SOR-212'
* Rewrite installation section
* Update .env.example, add missing, unused envs. Also correct few values.
* {{BIT_SRC_AUTH_TOKEN}}and {{BIT_DEV_AUTH_TOKEN}} remove from docker build arguments, don’t need to use it now.
* New installation guide will allow to correctly autoload database dump
* The default hostname is changed to localhost for all occurence.
[https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36154281/get-files-signed-url-from-amazon-s3-using-filesystem-laravel-5-2|https://stackoverflow.com/questions/36154281/get-files-signed-url-from-amazon-s3-using-filesystem-laravel-5-2] Aws sdk used directly in 

* {{app/Models/Asset.php}}{color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Models/OnboardingForm.php}}{color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Models/OnboardingRecord.php}} {color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Http/Controllers/AssetController.php}}{color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Http/Controllers/Api/AssetController.php}}{color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Http/Controllers/Students/Api/AssetStoreController.php}}{color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Http/Controllers/Teachers/Lesson/LessonCommentsController.php}}{color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Http/Controllers/Teachers/LessonTemplate/LessonTemplateCommentsController.php}}{color:yellow}*[ SHOULD BE REMOVED ]*{color} 
*  {{app/Http/Controllers/Webhooks/AddPipeController.php}} {color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color} 
* {{app/Services/S3Service.php}}
* {{app/Services/Student/UploaderService.php}} {color:green}*[ DONE ]*{color}  Need to set appropriate {{AWS_URL}}it should replace {{STATIC_URL}} setting. Need to remove {{STATIC_URL}} after deploy to production
Following was discussed with [~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] and MadDevs management:

* *Listen to the opinions of the team about the “painful spots” in the project.* Their opinions are far more important than any external analysis. They know their code better than analysts.
* *Systematic backend code review and cleaning.* In some places the same code is found, for example {{/teacher/teams}}. This adds unnecessary things to autoloading and makes it harder to track changes.
* *If the session driver is files, then it should be changed to InMemory / Database.* Files work much longer than other options, and they don't scale well. This should be checked in production.
* *Move to MySQL 8.* Our DevOps stated that in theory there should be no problems. This will allow filtering by JSON fields without the need for PHP loops.
* *Check database queries step-by-step*:
** Check the performance of {{WHERE id IN (SELECT ...)}} versus {{WHERE EXISTS ()}}
*** {{WHERE EXISTS ()}} exits early as soon as it finds the first match. There is no need to complete the fetch / scan of the entire table. But this may depend on particular cases.
** Stop using {{SELECT *}} when all data is not needed. Dragging extra data and wasting time / memory that way.
** Where possible, use BATCH / BULK INSERT instead of planting records one at a time in cycles.

[~accountid:5b67bcd8e6dba529eefda937] also noted that there is a stategically beneficial issue, that wasn’t completed previously: *decoupling frontend and backend components*. This would improve developer quality of life and will allow us to boost developer productivity, also make an API data exchange to be expicit.

We are considering to start an implementation during the technical debt sprint in the start of September. Related thing for me is to test database backup restoration on MySQL 8 local server and report any issues. [^Teacherly.io Software Ecosystem (1bfc5da2-fd41-4162-84b0-beb9f49a5eb4).xmind]

!Teacherly.io Software Ecosystem (868976df-18bd-4fb3-8be8-db77d1700bf1).png|width=7839,height=3997!

В данном случае больше всех жрет модем, потом камера. 
Ускорим передачу через модем - уменьшим потребление в целом. 

Работы ведутся в направлении модема.

clients are happy with a design
I have read the neo4j documentation and also I was able to get all users by using the MERGE clause.  I learned how relations work in the cypher language.  And I added relationships for:
 User->Channel (or Group)
 User->Message
 Message->Channel I'm working on add replies to existing messages.
-
-
I encountered a problem with access to `/users/:id/emails` endpoint. 

As GitLab API documentation says I need to have an `admin` role but now I was checking group where I'm `owner`. I have learned that `users/:id/emails` endpoint available only for self-managed Gitlab instances. 
However, we already have users` emails according to project commits. Hence, we may use them for matching. 

But we wouldn't know about the user`s email until he pushes a commit.

[~chaka] fyi We have decided with Andrew to set member's email manually 'cause currently, we have to show up to our main graph.
